summary:
Take control of a funny creature that lives in any computer.
The host's computer has been captured by an evil virus and all hope is on you.

name: Bombagun
summary: A deceptively simple, post-apocalyptic style card game that you can play both online and offline!

name: Bomb
summary: Winning won't come easy in this fast action death match game.

name: Boxing Club Manager
summary: You've waited long enough. Boxing management is now in your gloves. Winning fights is your goal. Running the best gym is your future. Take control. Train and steer your boxers to glory in the ring! Build up your gym, make it World class!

name: Boom Wars
summary: Boom Wars is an Action Multiplayer Game , Drop bombs, destroy blocks, pick up power-ups, eliminate other players and earn trophies to win .

name: Bounty Hunters
summary: Bounty Hunters is a Third Person Shooter set in a Cyberpunk themed City It uses a Horde/Firefight type game system to throw waves of bad guys at the player, your job is to survive and kill the boss.

name: Bomber Blok
summary: It's time to get dirty! Equipped with your legendary jackhammer, and a bit of TNT, dig your way down into the puzzling underground caves of an hazardous alien planet abounding in marvelous gems.

name: Bouldeurdache
summary: Bouldeurdache is a remake as a tribute to the old Commodore 64 classic game released in 1984. 100 caves on 5 levels available and 2 turbo modes!

name: Bounce Ball: Neon Party Arcade
summary: Bounce Ball: Neon Party Arcade is reimagining a videogame classic: Play virtual table tennis with up to 4 players in a futuristic visual style using new gameplay elements like power ups and randomly generated arenas.

name: Boss Beek-Beekeeping Simulator
summary: Boss Beek is a beekeeping game that allows you to play the role of a beekeeper! You'll have hours of entertainment building hives with the best parts you can find to house the best queens and make the best honey!

name: Bone's Cafe
summary: Bone's café is a fast paced cooking game. Customize the layout of your kitchen to guarantee your success. Specialize your menu in ingredients and recipes to design your ultimate restaurant. Raise your customers from the dead, or invite your friends in this 4 player cooking adventure.

name: Bomberpet
summary: Bomberpet is a game about bombers who like to blow up everything in their way. Blow up, collect power-ups and win.

name: Boss of the Mafia
summary: Boss Of The Mafia is a side-scrolling game in which you play as the boss of the mafia! In this incredibly difficult platformer you have to get through all the obstacles and dangerous traps in order to complete this game to the end. Cool relaxing jazz music will help you with this!

name: Bomb Club Deluxe
summary: If you have a knack for explosives, the Bomb Club welcomes you! Meet new bombs, uncover new challenges, and create awesome chain reactions in this explosive puzzle game!

name: Bomb Pong
summary: An arcade action-packed strategy game. Move the 'Pong Ball through perilous waves of Paddles, Balls and BOMBS! Don't explode and don't get hit! With three modes in BOMB Pong, you'll always be occupied.

name: Boom Company
summary: BOOM COMPANY is a top-down, twin stick space-shooter with roguelite mechanics. Engage in frenetic combat. Complete missions for maximum profit. Upgrade vessels and weaponry with tech from rival factions.

name: Bobby
summary: You can't trust anything in this game! Every step you take, you risk losing your head, failing, being burned, eaten, trampled, broken morally and physically. But don't worry — you won't know it until you take this step!

name: Boxville
summary: Boxville is an adventure puzzle game about speechless cans living in the city of boxes and drawing doodles on cardboards to tell the stories. Made in Ukraine.

name: Boomerang Woman
summary: This is an orthodox horizontal scrolling 2D action game 'Platformer'. A player will control 'Kyoko Senbonbashi', who always stands on the side of justice, to defeat an evil organization 'Dokuro-dan' by using a boomerang thrown to 8 directions and passing all 8 stages.

name: Bouncy Cube
summary: Bouncy Cube is an arcade game where you keep the balance of a cube on moving platforms.

name: Bobalicous
summary: A Juicy Treasure Hunting Game. Search for the Gem Chest. Search for the Key. Unlock the Gem Chest with the Key. Bring the Gem back to the Gem site.

name: Bongo Quest
summary: bongo quest - a bright colorful platformer for lovers of prehistoric adventures is waiting for you! Embark on an unforgettable journey through an ancient world inhabited by dangerous plants and aliens, hidden in the foliage of a primeval jungle.

name: Bossa Presents
summary: Play prototypes created at Bossa's game jams and help decide which ideas should go into production, becoming real games launched on Steam – with your help and feedback!

name: Book Hunter
summary: In this stealth adventure game you'll guide ArgentoBOT through an ancient library to find the hidden treasures resting inside of it. Survive the dangers crawling in the shadows, use objects to stun or distract your enemies end use strategically the lights to hide from threats.

name: Bongirl
summary: Bongirl is a classic game to find the differences in the images. Find all the differences on the sexy girls, gradually undressing them. Find the differences, unlock new levels and get access to animated galleries with beautiful girls!

name: Bomb It
summary: Bomb It is an amazing Bomberman game that lets you battle out intense competitions by yourself or together with a friend. Place your bombs strategically to blow up the enemies and destroy objects. You can pick up power-ups that will give you various advantages, such as increase your maximum life and freezing the enemies. Have fun!

name: Bomb It 2
summary:
Bomb It 2 is the second instalment of this awesome arcade series that takes inspiration from the original and iconic Bomberman game. In this game you must move around a map littered with obstacles and platforms and try to destroy the other players in the game using your deadly bombs!

Bomb It 2 builds upon what made the first title so popular and provides a range of exciting new game modes. When placing your bombs, be sure to have an escape route so you do not destroy yourself. Also, try to trap enemy players by forcing them into a corner and providing them with no way to evade your bomb. This game is a heap of fun and you will find yourself racing around the maps plating bombs for hours!

name: Bomb It 3
summary:
Bomb it 3 is the third instalment of the hugely popular Bomb It series. This title builds upon everything that made the original titles so popular and adds some new features and levels. The gameplay remains the same – you control a single character and you must move around each level and try to eliminate all other opponents by planting bombs on the ground.

Try to place bombs strategically to catch your opponents unawares or trap them in a corner, but at the same time avoid getting caught short and being trapped yourself. This third title brings a whole host of new game modes and levels to play across, plus some awesome power-ups and special abilities. Do you have what it takes to conquer the Bomb It arena?

name: Bomb It 4
summary:
Bomb It 4 is the fourth version of this fantastic Bomberman style game in which you must test out your bomb dropping skills on a myriad of different levels. The gameplay remains the same as the previous versions - you control a single character and you must move around each level and deploy bombs to try and destroy your enemies without being killed yourself.

In this episode, you can actually customize your character and kit them out with a range of different cool outfits. Furthermore, enjoy several new game modes including co-op mode in which you can fight with a friend against AI opponents.

name: Bomb It 5
summary:
Bomb it 5 is the fifth instalment of this epic platform game that takes gameplay elements from the original and iconic Bomberman series. If you have played any of the previous Bomb It episodes then you will already love the frantic arcade gameplay and the fun bombing action. In this instalment you can take part in a number of new game modes and battle across new levels.

As usual you must move around the map and attempt to plant bombs to destroy your opponents. Be careful and avoid becoming trapped as you could end up blowing yourself up or being cornered by another player. Don’t forget to smash the blocks to get power-ups to improve your damage and survivability. Can you conquer Bomb It and show off your destructive skills?

name: Box Rush
summary: The Magic Kingdom was attacked by fantastic monsters who erected siege structures around the entire island.

name: Botborgs
summary: The Borgverse is a Sci-fi themed multiplayer game built on a multi-planetary system.

name: BomberGuys
summary: BomberGuys is a top-down multiplayer game with simple controls. In fact, apart from movement, the player only has one ability: placing bombs. Each bomb explodes in four directions, the explosion can destroy enemies or destroy brick blocks. In the blocks you can find bonuses that increase the range of the explosion, you can place additional bombs or increase the speed of your character. The goal of each player is to destroy all enemies and remain alone on the field.

name: Bounty Game
summary: Do you have a dream of becoming rich overnight? Then come and make that dream come true in The Bounty Game!!!

name: Boom Bears on Stream
summary: Auto-Battler Battle Royale for Twitch Chat! Let your viewers fight it out on stream.

name: Boardwalk Memories
summary: Enjoy a casual stroll on the boardwalk and play some classic boardwalk games, including the always popular Fascination.

name: Bonk's Adventure: Arcade Version
summary: Developed by Kaneko and released in 1994, Bonk's Adventure: Arcade Version is based on the original Bonk games for the TurboGrafx-16 and PC Engine. However, the gameplay and level design are drastically different to suit arcade style play.

name: Booze Master
summary: In Booze Master, you play the role of a brilliant moonshiner. Grow plants, harvest crops, produce alcohol and build your booze empire.

name: Boomerang King
summary: Sling your boomerang and smash the fruits! Avoid Bombs and Hungry plants Fun, fast and addictive, put your skills to the test!

name: Bouldering Robot 3D
summary: Bouldering action game!This robot can neither walk nor jump.Only hang and shift its weight.Swing and Jump as you head for the goal at the top!Total 9 stages

name: Boris the Sloth
summary: Channel your inner sloth in this challenging nature-based puzzle platforming adventure game. Transition between the world of the living and the spirit realm where you will use your abilities to move objects, alter gravity, and warp time in order to solve puzzles and fight off dangerous animals.

name: Bowman 2
summary: Become a master of archery in Bowman 2! You need to define the shooting angle and aim carefully. Your mission is to eliminate the opponent by successfully hitting them. Have fun!

name: Bolt Action
summary: A small, comedic zombie shooter that requires both twitch and strategic skills...One genetically enhanced man along with an inept, insulting, and cowardly scientist must save the World from the invading mutated hordes!

name: Bounty Below
summary: Bounty below is an idle adventure game about mining and smithing items. While your units are mining for you delve into the endless dungeon to gain even more ore!

name: Box Cats Puzzle: Halloween
summary: Halloween is coming. Our great lord witch cat comes here. Faithful servants, hand over your candy quickly. The witch cat will give you happiness ~!

name: Boomer Slayers
summary: Boomer Slayers is an old-school top-down shooter with modern low-poly graphics and badass gameplay. Join friends in local co-op to slay enemies together!

name: Boomshine2x
summary:
Boomshine2x is a game written in Fenix and available for the GP2x and the GP2x Wiz handhelds. It’s an authorised clone of the flash game Boomshine by Danny Miller.
It was one of the games released built-in on the GP2X Wiz portable console.

name: Boku no Mirai ha, Koi to Kakin to.: Charge to the Future
BokuRobo: Boxed Cell Robot Armies
summary: The game is an auto-battler game with voxel robots that is both comically and tactically challenging.

name: Box Cats Puzzle: Cat Year 2022
summary: Box Cats Puzzle - The year of tigeris a small physics game. You need to stack multiple cats of different shapes on top of each other, so that you can pass the level by keeping them from falling for a certain period of time.

name: Bootèe
summary: Bootee is a platform homebrew for the NES with a mature theme.

name: Boreal Tenebrae

name: Bokura
summary: Bokura is a puzzle adventure game for 2 players only. Each player will be two boys who have run away from home, and will work together to overcome the wall and aim for "somewhere far".

name: Bomb Sweeper: Mine Finder
summary: Do you want to play and compete with your friends ? Finally there is a brand new bombsweeper with Steam Leaderboards! Complete all stages and try to go RANK 1 of all 100 STAGES!

name: Boxnigma
summary: Move the boxes from each level correctly and simultaneously to move to the next challenge in this minimalist and retro 2D puzzle game!

name: Bookworm Wordy Wonder Bundle
summary:
Bookworm Wordy Wonder Bundle is a compilation that contains the following games:
Bookworm Deluxe
Bookworm Adventures
Bookworm Adventures Volume 2

name: Box Dash
summary: Box Dash is a platform game that trains your concentration. In the game, you need to focus your attention to avoid obstacles and destroy as many monsters as possible to get stars. The game is divided into training mode, normal mode and extreme mode, with dozens of levels. It may be difficult to play the game at first, but once you get used to it, you will appreciate the fun.

name: Bok-Bok: Hen Tie Club
summary: Take the role of Henry Cock once more in this tough as nails platformer featuring a unique 3-flap movement mechanic.

name: BoingBoingOuch
summary: This is the story of a man with a thirst to never be fulfilled to get all of the eggs, the Easter Bunny has. But to say the least the Easter Bunny isn't happy.

name: Bootstrap Island
summary: Stranded in the 17th century after a brutal shipwreck, you awaken alone on a deadly tropical island. To survive, you’ll need to learn fast - facing wild beasts, nature’s wrath, and uncovering secrets hidden deep in the jungle. Every step is a fight for your life.

name: Box Knight
summary: A funny, silly and irreverent action RPG roguelike. A mix of ‘the Office’ and ‘Lord of the Rings’ with a comic like aesthetic.

name: Boyfiends
summary: A selfish genius and a polite hero complain about their neighbor's taste in music in a car.

name: Bombardier
summary: Bombardier is a quick and chaotic online multiplayer game which supports up to 8 players in an arena, or play locally with up to 4 of your closest friends and battle to be crowned the ultimate Bombardier!

name: Boneraiser Minions
summary: Amass an army of deamonic undead to fight endless waves of heroes intent to end your boneraising ways! In this gothic-horror auto-battle roguelite, use the bones of slain heroes to raise your minions, collect powerful relics and spells, and unlock meta upgrades, all to survive King Gigald's crusade!

name: Bones and Magic
summary: Bones and Magic is a tower defense game in which the player uses towers and traps to stop enemies. Use your magic wand and build various traps and towers to eliminate all enemies. Collect crystals from enemies and buy upgrades for your traps.

name: Boooost!!!!
summary: Boooost!!!! is a skill-based, sci-fi themed action platformer with some narrative driven elements and some minor puzzle elements.

name: Boy and the Seagull
summary: Join the boy's journey to the Seagull Island. In this hand-drawn children book your child can meet the seagull, octopus and the giant stingray, swim with the fish and visit the mysterious Seagull Island.

name: Borneo: A Jungle Nightmare
summary: Borneo: A Jungle Nightmare is an interactive horror graphic adventure, with the direction and script of Ruggero Deodato. Take control of different characters in a desperate expedition to the virgin jungles of Borneo.

name: Bomberman Max: Ain Version
summary: A limited edition of Bomberman Max: Blue Champion distributed only in Japan. It has all the unlockables without the need of having the other version.

name: Bomberman Land
summary:
Bomberman Land is a theme park filled with people and different attractions. As in top-down RPG games, the player controls a character who can interact with the NPCs and objects on the map. Various spots give access to the attractions, in the form of mini-games. In some games, the player must pick-up sheep and lock them out of the field, complete jigsaw puzzles, look at equations and answer if they are true or false, etc. Completing various tasks will reward the player with numbered coupons that give access to new areas of the theme park.

In addition to the solo play, some games can be played in up to four players battles, or in a tandem cooperative mode.

name: Bomberman Blast
summary: The international version of Bomberman Blast differs from the original Japanese version due to the lack of the Story Mode.

name: Bomberman Online Japan
summary: An online Bomberman released only in Japan for PC.

name: Bomberman: Panic Bomber
summary:
The Neo Geo port of Panic Bomber. It is a "falling blocks" puzzle game based on the Bomberman franchise. The goal of the game is essentially to cause your opponent to lose by causing their gameplay field to fill to the top with objects. You do this by causing chains of bombs to explode, sending useless rubble over to your opponent's field, which they must then remove themselves. Bombs are earned by causing chains of three identical blocks to disappear. Bombs can only be blown up with an explosion from a lit bomb, which falls from the top of the screen every so often. If the player causes enough damage, they can eventually earn a giant bomb, which will remove a large amount of debris from the playing field, and cause their opponent a good deal of trouble.

The game's regular story mode revolves around Bomberman's hunt for the Golden Bomber statue. During his trek, he fights against several different odd characters, like Drifty the balloon, or Cecil the tiger. However, all that can really be earned from playing through this mode is a harder difficulty level, earned by finishing the entire story at the "hard" difficulty level.

name: Bomberman 3D
summary: Bomberman 3D or 3D Bomberman, is an action 3D game released for mobile phones.

name: Bomberman
summary: Bomberman is a free multiplayer game for mobile phones (iOS and Android) available in the Google Play Store, developed and published by Konami, exclusively in Japan. The game features a single or multiplayer battle mode, as seen in many other entires in the Bomberman series.

name: Bomberman Kart 3D
summary: Bomberman Kart 3D is a 3D racing game developed by Matrix Software and published by Hudson Soft and released for mobile phones on October 10, 2005 in Japan. It is the sequel of the mobile game of same name.

name: BoomBoard!
summary: A timed puzzler where you try to defuse all the bombs via number based clue information before the timer runs out.

name: Bomberman Chains
summary: Bomberman Chains is a puzzle game released for mobile phones (iOS) in 2011 in Japan. Tone, style as well as genre is significantly different from other games in the Bomberman series.

name: Bomberman Baseball
summary: Bomberman Baseball is a baseball video game released for mobiles phones in Japan.

name: Bomberman Pinball
summary: A pinball game in the Bomberman franchise, released for mobile phones.

name: Bomberman Jetters Vol. 1
summary: Bomberman Jetters Vol. 1 is a 2D platformer based on the Bomberman Jetters anime made by Hudson Soft and which was released on mobile phones.

name: Bomberman RPG
summary: Bomberman RPG is a video game released on mobile phones (i-Mode, Yahoo! Mobile and EZweb mobile), exclusively in Japan.

name: Bomberman: Disney Stitch Edition
summary: Bomberman: Disney Stitch Edition was an action game developed by Hudson Soft and published by D2 Communications and released on mobile phones in August 2, 2010 in Japan. It features the Bomberman gameplay and the visuals of Disney's Lilo & Stitch franchise, more specifically the Stitch! anime series, with the alien Stitch as the playable character and the game is a timed score attack challenge.

name: Bomberman Next Gotochi Kanto-hen
summary: Bomberman Next: Gotochi Kanto Hen is a portable Bomberman game released on mobile phones in Japan in 2005. It was released along with Bomberman Next Gotochi Kinki Hen.

name: Bomberman Next Gotochi Kinki-hen
summary: Bomberman Next: Gotochi Kinki Hen is a portable Bomberman game released on mobile phones in Japan in 2005. It was released along with Bomberman Next Gotochi Kanto Hen.

name: Bomberman Land: Battles
summary: Bomberman Land: Battles is a Bomberman video game released in 2007 on mobile devices. Although the name features Bomberman Land, gameplay-wise, the game doesn't have to do much with the Bomberman Land series.

name: Bomberman
summary: In 1997, a Bomberman-themed LCD game was released by Bandai. The game is played much like the original Bomberman games, with the player having to destroy blocks in a grid-like maze in order to find the entrance to the next level. The game also features sound effects and music.

name: Bomber Panda
summary: Help the 'Bomber Panda' save his species from extinction by... blowing stuff up! This fun and challenging game has 31 levels of increasing difficulty for you to blast through. Collect power-ups to increase your bomb capacity, explosion size and walking speed. Avoid or blast the aggressive enemies while you try to find the exit.

name: Bomberman Kart
summary:
A racing game using simulated 3D in the vein of OutRun or Rad Racer, now with a rainbow of Bombermen in the drivers' seats! Race against five opponents across three difficulties of Grand Prix, for a total of six courses. Racers can collect items from question mark panels, ranging from projectiles such as bombs, missiles and Slime Bombs, to situational items like landmines, shields and nitro boosts. There are six different colours of Bomberman and three karts to choose from, each with their own unique stats.

Alongside the Grand Prix, you can race any track alone in the Time Trial mode and aim to beat your personal beat. Records for both Grand Prix and Time Trial can be uploaded to a national server.

name: Bomberman Kart Special Mini
summary: A compact version of Bomberman Kart (Special in Japan), which was released at lower price.

name: Bomberman '08
summary: A remake of Bomberman '94 for mobile phones. The game boasts remastered and reshaded graphics, applying the modern designs to Bomberman and Louie. There also appear to be altered level designs, but outside of being refitted for a mobile phone interface, no sources note the changes in full.

name: Bomberman for Gree
summary: A free-to-play "social game" distributed on GREE SNS, designed to be accessible to veterans and newcomers alike. Players proceed through single-player stages, battling enemies, collecting items, and encountering bosses at the end of each area.

name: Bomberman Act:Zero Mobile Type
summary: The mobile port of Bomberman Act:Zero.

name: Bomberman 2004
summary: A port of Bomberman GB2 released only in Korea.

name: Bomberman Reprint
summary: A remaster of the NES Bomberman game.

name: Bomberman 3D BT Wide-ban
summary: An updated version of Bomberman 3D which adds widescreen and Bluetooth multiplayer support.

name: Bomberman Legends
summary: Bomberman Legends, also known as Jaguar Bomberman, is an unreleased action-maze video game that was in development by Genetic Fantasia and planned to be published by Atari Corporation for the Atari Jaguar. It was going to be a unique entry in the Bomberman franchise, featuring its own dedicated single-player and multiplayer modes, with the latter having support for up to eight players by using two Team Tap adapters.

name: Bonelab
summary: Sentenced to death, you embody an outcast escaping fate. Discovering a pathway to a hidden underground research facility. A series of challenging experiments and discoveries await. A road to the truth calls from the void.

name: Boy's Active
summary: Boy's Active is a handheld device.

name: Bo Jackson Football and Baseball
summary: Handheld electronic game released on 1990. The players hold the side they want to play.

name: Bounters
summary: Bounters is a multiplayer looter shooter game. Setup your loadout, fight, loot, take bounties, and exit the field to claim all loots and bounties you got!

name: Botty: Paper tales
summary: Botty: Paper tales is an atmospheric adventure made entirely of paper. Botty's little robot faces a different illusion to get out of the paper world.

name: Bounda
summary: A 2D physics game. In the game，you will control a red panda or cat to defeat cunning greedy enemies, and protect kind animals and beautiful nature, by press release and drap mouse. Press left button of mouse or "P" key to pause game.

name: Boating Simulator 2022
summary: You would think that the day would never come where a simulator game could make you want to go out and buy a boat, or better yet actually take up boating as a hobby, you were wrong. ~Joystick compatible~

name: Border Town
summary: 2D top down view open world sandbox survival farming game. Survive, adventure, hunt, gather resources, craft, build, farm, fish, trade, become an adventurer, complete various tasks and explore this fantasy world.

name: Bound in Time
summary: A heroic journey through time making friends along the way. Starting in the 1990s and launching yourself into the past and future. Full of nostalgic trips backwards and hopeful tomorrows. A love letter to the best JRPGs from the SNES era.

name: Boba Tale
summary:
Welcome to Boba Tale! You are now a proud owner of a bubble tea shop! Start your adventure by making drinks for the folks in town, and upgrade your shop and drink recipes to build your boba empire.
Don't know where to start? Just follow your boba pals, and they will help you get started with your journey. Boba Tale is a relaxing and non-competitive boba life adventure. The world is yours to explore with endless upgrade combinations and town characters to meet.
Can you make millions by selling bubble teas? Let's see!

name: Bomber Boom
summary: Bomber Boom is a multiplayer game It is played between 2 - 4 players in an arena on which player it is, this player beats by placing bombs and it is played in 3 rounds The last one left in the arena wins the first round the first to accumulate three rounds in a row wins the game

name: Bounty of One
summary: Survive to hundreds of bounty hunters and increase your reward until no one is strong enough to claim it! Bounty of One is a casual game with roguelite mechanics set in a fun western/fantasy setting. Choose your upgrades well and overcome your challengers.

name: Bots Can Feel Too
summary: Jake is an internet bot. After he had served his purpose, humans deleted him. Now, he is trapped in the Recycle Bin and has 30 hours left before he is destroyed permanently. Together with your help and the help of his new friends, Sam, Chloe, Otto, Maggy, Joy, Ziggy and Danny, he must rush through dangerous paths and fight malicious spambots to save himself and his fellow bots before the clock reaches zero. Their fate is in your hands! Survive. Together.

name: Boxing Manager
summary:
Become a Boxing Manager!
Build your stable, develop your fighters, manage your gym trainers, make the right fights, guide your fighters to the world titles.

name: Box Rush 2: Ice Worlds
summary: An icy winter has come to the magical kingdom and ice monsters have invaded your kingdom. The little prince must once again take up arms and repulse the enemies. Take advantage of all the bonuses that were before and those that have appeared again!

name: Bobbi Adventure
summary: This is a kind dwarf Bobby, who travels through a fantasy world.

name: Boo!
summary: Exciting missions and crazy shootout with numerous and interesting opponents. Assembling abilities will allow you to complete tasks in a variety of ways. Collect and combine upgrades to suit your playstyle. Make your way to the end of the story to find out the secret and save humanity from monsters.

name: Bowling Cross: Final Frame
summary: BOWLING CROSS: DARK LEGACY OF THE DEVIL BOWLER (FINAL FRAME) is the complete version of BOWLING CROSS, a weird GBC-style Battle-Bowling Action RPG - play as a roaming adventurer, using Custom Battle-Bowling Balls to knock down your enemies!

name: Bomb It!
summary: Bomb It! is a action packed multiplayer game. How it works? Drop bombs, destroy blocks, pick up power-ups, eliminate other players and earn trophies to win

name: BoomCrash
summary: BoomCrash is a small physics-based game aimed at destroying buildings and other architectural structures using explosives.

name: Boo Men
summary: Boo Men is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. You and your crew of burglars are tasked with stealing the items on a list. Just remember to stay in the light because you never know what is lurking in the dark...

name: Bocce Time! VR
summary: It's time to head to the park for some VR bocce action! Bocce Time's various courts will have you throwing, bowling and spinning to win in online matches of up to 4 friends or single player against AI. Closest to the pallino wins, folks! It's Bocce Time!

name: Bonfire
summary: You’re Scout 817, a member of the not so elite Space Force. You’ve just crashed your spaceship on a strange planet. Your only tools for survival are a fading bonfire, a robot and a limited supply of nourishment cylinders. And what's that sneaking around out there in the dark alien jungle?

name: Bokehme
summary: Bokehme is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for the Dream Diary Jam 5. The game starts with Bokehme in her bedroom, who refuses to leave. The game tells you to collect dolls scattered around the dream world.

name: Bookstore Simulator
summary: This is a realistic Bookstore where you can read real books of several different topics. Interested in learning about business communication, world history, Rome, Greece? Into fiction and romance? Find and read any book in this realistic virtual bookstore.

name: Bong
summary: A cranky table-tennis mini-game

name: Boot & Shoot
summary: Shoot. kick. dodge. kill. improve. die. repeat.

name: Boogie Woogi Jungle
summary: Boogie Woogi Jungle is an action game, where your character must collect a number of objects scattered around each screen before the timer runs out. Most of the objects are on ledges, requiring climbing up ladders and across rope bridges. Other characters are also running around the screen, and must be avoided to prevent losing a life. Graphically and game-play wise, it is very similar to Lode Runner, except that instead of digging holes to temporarily trap your pursuers, you can fire either horizontally or vertically to stun them.

name: Bowerwhelm
summary: Bowerwhelm is an FPS Rogue-like game with minimalist graphics. Kill until you die, upgrade the skills, make powerful builds, and kill more!

name: Bonelords
summary: Build up yourself & your defenses in Bonelords! Defend against waves of enemies! Attack using a large variety of weapons & tools! Scale your power, and face the great hordes of Spegroon!

name: Bot Brigade
summary: Dexter and Mandark are preparing for battle in the Bot Arena. They each possess an arsenal of high-tech robots programmed to smash each other to pieces. Playing as Dexter, launch your bots across the board and try to break through Mandark`s barrier on the other side. Once you`re throught the barrier, you win!

name: Boxerpunk Stories
summary: Boxerpunk Stories is a Story based 2D Pixel Art Game.

name: Boku to Kare no Kiken na Doukyo Seikatsu
Boom!
summary: Oh no, you have lost your legs! Use your sci-fi gun to rocket jump your way up, but be careful; one wrong move and you might just fall right to where you started.

name: Bots Crusher Arena
summary: Bot Crusher Arena is an open top-down shooter where the player takes on the role of a cyborg participating in an arena elimination with other cyborgs. The task is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies. Don't let the enemies hit you.

name: Boxman Adventures
summary: Boxman Adventures is a fun platformer game about a friendly box-headed creature. Complete various levels in various different environments, including forests and deserts.

name: Bonfire Peaks: Lost Memories
summary: Three chapters of DLC for this critically beloved puzzle game, each with new mechanics and new puzzles.

name: Boltcraft
summary: Enter an adventure with dynamic combat by choosing a class and specialization, where you can create hundreds of possible combinations of spells to face the enemies of the dungeon. Unlock passive skills for unique perks and gain more power with items you find on your journey.

name: Bouhou Koumakyou 2
summary: Boho Koumakyou - Scarlet Family 2 is the third game of the series - preceded by Boho Bouyoumu, Reitaisai 9 - starring the cast of Touhou Koumakyou, but mainly are Remilia and Hong Meiling. Boho Koumakyou 2 is a free roaming, two dimensional platformer games with an emphasis on an exploratory action-adventure structure. Set in a massive underground maze, the map is largely contiguous, offering no breaks in play and unlocked as the player progresses through the game.

name: Bouhou Youyoumu
summary: Bouhou Youyoumu is a dungeon exploring action platformer, sequel to Bouhou Koumakyou ~Scarlet Family~, developed by Marokaka.

name: Bouhou Koumakyou: Scarlet Family
summary: Bouhou Koumakyou ~Scarlet Family~ is a dungeon exploring action platformer developed by Marokaka.

name: Bomb Meirin
summary: This game appears to be based on Bomber King.

name: Bounty
summary: Bounty is a fast-paced and brutal top-down action RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world populated by humanoid blobs. As a scavenger, it's your job to sift through the wreckage of this strange dystopia. What will you find?

name: Bowling Ballers
summary:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

In most endless runners, you want to avoid objects. Bor-ing! Play Bowling Ballers and knock down as many of those pesky pins as possible.

Bowling Ballers is a bowling endless runner that includes a level-based mode. Actively hit objects rather than avoid them. Mechanics include skateboarding, flying and more, all with simple, intuitive gameplay.

name: Board
summary: Board is a minimalist puzzle game that offers a relaxing short experience.

name: Bogdan's HeartQuest: The Invader Slayer
summary: Princess Marcela is cursed! Bogdans is a knight trying to cure and protect his beloved girlfriend from reckless people that would do any thing to win the generous prize Marcela's desperate father offered for those who find a solution.

name: Bolu
summary: Bolu is a simulation, survival and building game with a short story set in Lake Abant.

name: Bonza Boom
summary: Bonza Boom is a new turn-based battle shooting game. Shooting each other to get a glory victory and collect golden crowns! Use them to unlock different battle scenes to challenge other players in all places around the world and get exceptional card prizes!

name: Bout
summary: Tap in the arrows on the screen as fast as possible to win.

name: Bob Ross: The Joy of Painting
summary: Enjoy making happy little trees with this, the game based on Bob Ross' television paint show, The Joy of Painting.

name: Boulder Island
summary: The game is a first-person survival battle game, which requires players to defeat the enemy in the game through operation and collection.

name: Boushoku no Gaburion: The Good Eater
Boggle
summary:
A computer version of the classic word finding game. 16 lettered dice are rolled and arranged in a square. The player then has a limited amount of time to find as many words as possible in the grid.

New game variations for the computer include a 4X4X4 cube of dice for finding words, a head-to-head game where players place the dice themselves before looking for words, and two tetris-like games where players must find words among onrushing Boggle dice.

name: Boot Camp Tycoon: Built for Victory
Bottle Buster
summary: Very loosely based on the carnival game, Bottle Buster asks you to knock down all the bottles in each level.

name: Bounce Out Blitz
summary: Bounce Out Blitz is a straightforward tile-matching game where the player has to make matches of three or more rubber balls of the same type.

name: Bounty Hunter 2099 Pinball
summary:
The scum of the earth has taken to the stars... and the Fugitive Retrieval Agency has selected you to bring it back home and face justice.

Bounty Hunter 2099 is an exciting, fast-paced, futuristic pinball game for your Pocket PC. Steer the ball to obtain the more lucrative contracts, blast off to Hideout Majoris and make your capture!

name: Bokujou Monogatari: Shiawase no Uta
summary:
Bokujō Monogatari: Shiawase no Uta is the fourteenth title of Bokujō Monogatari series to be released for Gamecube. It was never released outside of Japan.

The game was updated eight months later with the release of Bokujō Monogatari: Shiawase no Uta for Wārudo. Natsume localized the updated version of the game under the name Harvest Moon: Magical Melody.

The game contains several differences:

Jamie is not marriageable.
Smaller capacity for the shelf and the fridge.
The game balance has not been readjusted.
Contains several bugs and freezes.

name: Boiling Over
summary: Live your best life while combating the horrors of customer service and transphobia.

name: Bouncy
summary: A bouncy ball simulator.

name: Boy with Cat
summary:
A cat's inquisitive look interferes with the pleasurable sensations of a boy while masturbating.

A game based on the short film Boy With Cat (1966) from Donald Richie.

name: Book Recommendations
summary: A short game by Stephen Lavelle.

name: Bombs Away
summary: Are you mentally prepared for bombs away? Choose one of 8 different styles of tanks to battle your friends from invisibility to flame throwing tanks. You'll need quick reflexes and some carefully planned strategy to be successful in battle. Good luck, and see in you in Bombs Away!

name: Bomjtown
summary: The game is a novel in a remote Soviet village. The game is packed with humor, so you will have fun playing it. It is important to carefully read the dialogues to choose the correct answer, there may be several of them. To select the answer, control the arrows and press enter.

name: Box to the Beat VR
summary: Box to the Beat is a fast and rhythmic boxing game that is focused around Indie artists of all genres

name: BoxLoop
summary: Dive into the world of Time Loop and Evil Boxes.

name: Bots City
summary: Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only a Hero can stop this madness. The Hero's goal is to get to the main computer and disable it, thereby disabling all robots. Our hero has only one weapon, but that won't stop him!

name: Box to the Box
summary: The box is running. The box follows after the box. The box follows after the box after the box. The box follows after the box after the box after the box. The box follows after the box after the box after the box after the box.

name: BoxMan Rising
summary: Dominated by gangs, the Boxman World is infested with disorder, crime and chaos. You’ve been training hard for a very long time. It’s finally time to get rid of them. However, the gangs won’t be that easy to deal with. Must get stronger, Must learn more skills, And I must be the world’s strongest fighter.

name: Boom Mania
summary: Boom Mania is an action-adventure game where you hunt down a variety of enemies while trying to save the goblin world. Explore nine beautiful hand-crafted environments and prove your bomber-goblin skills! All levels are procedurally generated, so each run is a unique experience.

name: Box to Box
summary: A fun platform puzzle game. 20 levels are waiting for you to challenge. Gamepad

name: Book Quest
summary: Book Quest is an action adventure RPG presented in retro pixel art style featuring cinematic cutscenes and dialogue. Throughout this medieval fantasy, gameplay alternates between top-down and side-scrolling perspectives.

name: Bow-Bots
summary: Bow-Bots Is a VR Multiplayer Bow and Arrow Shooter.

name: Bokura no Keshigomu Otoshi Shin Gakki
summary: Play more! Hit it! Poke it off! The new school year begins with our Eraser Droppers! Battle anytime, anywhere!

name: Boku no Bottakuri Bar 3: Sekai shinshutsu-hen
Booty Farm
summary: Congrats, you just inherited a farm and your hot neighbors will not let you be! Erotic hijinks ensue on your neverending quest to expand your farm! Discover spicy romances and intertwining stories in this bizarrely relaxing farm simulator.

name: Bob: A thousand lives
summary: Discover Bob's variable and unique world, get to know his story and support him to reach his goal which is non other than finding his ultimate peace. Be a part of the cycle in which death and reborning are present countless times almost at the same time.

name: Box Runner!
summary: "Box Runner! " is a 2D platform jumping game, the game is simple to operate, the atmosphere is relaxed, and the cartoon picture is suitable for casual play for a while.

name: Bolt Bot Screwy Viruses
summary: Take control of a robot named Bolt in over 50 levels of 3D platforming fun inspired by 90's and early 2000's classic platform games. It is a collect-a-thon at heart and rewards the player constantly in an evolving hub world!

name: Bonds of the Skies
summary: A fantasy RPG with a story of friendship between humans and gods! Eil and Nogard set off to look for the demon who cast the town into a sea of flames, and to find other Grimoas in order to put a stop to its violence!

name: Bounty Star
summary: Bounty Star is an over-the-shoulder 3D action game that marries mech combat and customization with farming and base building. The player takes on the role of a broken but powerful ex-soldier named Clem, a war veteran, talented fighter and expert mech pilot.

name: Bomb Disposer
summary: A game released for the Mega Duck/Cougar Boy in 1993.

name: Bomber Quest
summary: Bomber Quest has elements of both strategy/puzzle game and RPG. Each of the six girls has a different scenario, accessible from the beginning. Each scenario puts the player character into a top-down environment. Shounosuke has to build a maze to access its locations. The maze is built from small pieces taken from Tetris. The player can rotate the pieces and then place them onto the ground. The goal is to build a maze that would cover possibly large ground, gaining access to important locations and items. Visiting uncovered locations in the right order leads to cut scenes, which advance the plot.

name: Boku wa Chiisai
summary: Boku wa Chiisai is an Action game, published by Victor Interactive Software, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Born Anew
summary: Born Anew is a 2D Platformer set in an Open world Life Simulator set in a Fantasy Medieval world full of Adventures to be had, the game has many ways to play it and it will NOT have a main Story line. Build your own Fate and Future.

name: Boxel Golf
summary: Boxel Golf is a multiplayer golf game packed with challenging courses, custom hats, and a powerful level builder.

name: Boooooooooobs
summary: Boooooooooobs is a match 3 puzzle game with many levels and cute boobs. No matter what size is your preference, you'll find the right one in our collection. Big boobs and small tits, big nipples and perky nipples, whatever you pick out, you will have a nice time playing!

name: Boxception
summary: What would happen if boxes were used for more than just storage? What if they could float? Be controlled at a distance? Or even rewind through time? Boxception gives you plenty of different boxes to overcome puzzles with.

name: Bounce Classic
summary: Bounce is a 2D platformer in which you need to control a red ball. Dodge sharp spikes, use special abilities to collect all the rings scattered on the map and then you will open the way to the next interesting levels. Feel a sense of nostalgia and classics!

name: Bounce Castle
summary: Control powerful heroes in a magical fantasy world to defeat monsters that threaten the kingdom. This turn-based physics/strategy game will have you bouncing and booping enemies using a mixture of precision and chaos to save the realm from all kinds of hand-drawn baddies.

name: Botland Chronicles
summary: It has been 200 years since the aliens landed and destroyed human civilization on Earth. Cities lay in ruins. Weird creatures and rogue AI run rampant. Somewhere in a dark warehouse, a small combat bot, merely a prototype, is accidentally switched on. Beep boop... What the heck?!

name: Bomb Viking
summary: It is a run game. You must use a mouse and keyboard. Run for a high score

name: Book Collector
summary: Book Collector is a game about books and zombies.

name: Bounce your Bullets!
summary: Your bullets get stronger and stronger after they bounce enough times. Bounce your Bullets! is a casual top down shooter where you survive for as long as possible against growing waves of enemies.

name: Bob the Goose
summary: Bob the Goose is an old school FPS with roguelike elements. It's about a goose searching for his human friend who was kidnaped by lame Old People.

name: BountyHeart
summary:
BountyHeart is a mobile roguelite puzzle RPG that combines Match 3 with Tactics. You play as Tobi, a criminal who has been sent to the island of BountyHeart, fabled to contain the Legendary Bounty. The only ticket to freedom is to capture the Legendary Bounty!
Assemble the perfect crew by befriending those you meet along the way, or defeat them for their bounty and strengthen your party.

name: Bomba: The Explosive Hero
summary:
Bomba is an out-dated superhero from uneXplosive.com, a company that produces and stores special effects for computer games. Due to the very strict regulations and official orders, the effects are not allowed to be violent or politically incorrect in any way.
As everyone knows, no money can be made with boring and nonviolent stuff. That's why uneXplosive.com's laboratories and storages are full of illegal effects.
But secret investigations gave the authorities a strong suspicion. So yesterday morning heavy-armed officers of the MAV (Ministry for Absence of Violence) appeared at uneXplosive.com demanding entrance.
Now only one can help and save his company from being deleted: Bomba! But he has to remove all kinds of explosive material without leaving any evidence.
A dangerous mission, even for a superhero...

name: Bobby
summary: A simple puzzle-game.

name: Box Party
summary:
Box Party is a cartoony retro FPS where you shoot foods and go to parties.

Along the way you'll find cool weapons to use, fellow partygoers to talk to, optional side quests to complete, and more importantly, plenty of food to fight.

name: Botanical TD
summary: Defend against monsters with a variety of plants in this Tower Defense. Monsters are getting stronger and stronger and you have to choose their power-ups!

name: Boomer
summary: Help Boomer dash and float through this precision platformer above the clouds. Collect fragments to unlock shrines and rebuild his world. Hand crafted challenges, unlock secrets and piece together an adventure through bright, colorful and an inspiring pixel art alongside an 8-Bit Synth Soundtrack.

name: Boo!
summary: Boo! was a unreleased game that was planned for release on the SNES, Genesis and Amiga computers. It was a Mario/Sonic-style platform game.

name: Bowser's Jumping Challenge
summary: Super Mario Bros. Bowser’s Jumping Challenge is a SMB1 hack for the NES.

name: Bowling Hills
summary: Bowling Hills is an exciting golf/bowling mashup! Each lane offers a new set of hills and hazards that requires you to change your approach. There's a surprising amount of strategy and skill in this unique bowling experience!

name: Bounce racing car
summary: Bounce racing car is a sideboard jump racing game with simple controls and challenging enemy chases. How to play: Press the space bar and the vehicle will activate the built-in super magnetic system and bounce over obstacles.

name: Bone Lover
summary: Hide & seek game with horror elements. Get into the role of kidnapped teenagers, and escape the psychopath’s house. Look for items that will help you get out. Will you succeed, or will the characters meet their doom?

name: BornWild Versus S1: Prologue
summary: 2053, biotech searchers are abducted, two skilled mercenaries have to extract them. BornWild • Versus is a video-based visual novel with a thrilling action/ sci-fi story. Experience the series in two ways: Watch & Chill or collect every detail and make the best choices in Intelligence Ops mode.

name: BornWild Versus S1: Ep.1 to 8
summary: In 2053, war is big money. When biotech searchers are abducted, two skilled mercenaries have to extract them. To accomplish their mission, they’ll have to face the n°1 private army. BornWild • Versus is a video-based experience with a thrilling action/ sci-fi story

name: Boomshine Plus
summary: A simple and easygoing, but addictive puzzle game

name: Bodacious Agents
summary: Enter "B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S.", the highly classified secret agent organization. In this 3-D Platformer, your co-agents have been abducted by forces unknown on missions top secret! Take the dubiously tax-funded gadgets granted to you by B.O.D.A.C.I.O.U.S. and use them to save the world and your friends!

name: Books in Wrong Places
summary: Books have always been important to you. They were your guides, your friends. Your escape from everyday problems. But while you were gone some of them have gone missing. Find the misplaced books. Take care of the ones that have been mistreated. Put them back where they belong.

name: Bog Witch
summary: BOG WITCH is an action arcade game where you play as a BOG WITCH stopping intruders from entering your bog. Protect your hut from goblins, businessmen and other invaders by hurling potions at them, because face it, as a BOG WITCH the last thing you want in your bog is anyone else.

name: Bogey Brian
summary: Play as Brian, a slime who dreams of playing golf - with himself as the ball! Squish, jump, roll, and spin your way to glory by getting Brian to the flag on each hole. Improve your score through the use of strategic powerups and collect hats along the way that can totally change the game experience.

name: Boralaa
summary: A turn-based Boss Rush with Souls-like elements: Zero help, just your attention and strategy! Play alone, with and against your friends or community.

name: Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm
summary: Boom Shocketa: Rocket Storm brings true 6DoF (six degrees of freedom) rocket racing to your PC. Blast faster than ever before in a game designed for those who are never satisfied with their record times.

name: Bourbon Empire
summary: Organized crime real-time strategy set in New York City during prohibition. Using the illegal bootlegging trade, running various rackets, warring with other 'families', and bribing police, you can build an criminal empire.

name: Bounceables
summary: You gotta keep 'em moving! Stay focused, because they're not going to stop moving anytime soon! Stop the balls from colliding, keep 'em apart for as long as possible. Easy right? Well... put that to the test in Bounceables.

name: Bohemian Yard
summary: A voice at the other end said that it's your wealthy uncle's attorney. Your uncle, a noted scientist, has been found dead. He was your only living relative. Something isn't right though. Apparently, he died of a heart attack. But he was only 55, and had never had any history of heart problems. You learn that you have inherited everything your uncle owned - his wealth and his huge mansion in the country. Wearily, you pull up on the gravel drive outside the house. Time to investigate the house for any clues to his death...

name: Bolek i Lolek: Tajemnicze Zamczysko
summary: It was supposed to be another carefree vacation. However, something went wrong on the way to the mountain shelter. A violent storm damaged the road markings and the boys ended up in the mysterious castle of a Master Siegfried instead of the shelter. This suspect scientist was not going to miss such an opportunity! Each pair of hands to work on an alchemist's great project was worth its weight in gold.

name: Bonnie's Bakery
summary:
A game where you serve customers delicious food as Bonnie! Yes, that's all it is! A game where you serve customers delicious food...

Nothing else...

name: BOT.vinnik Chess 2
summary: Learn the secrets of chess masters with the finest instructor!

name: Bonded Forever
summary: Bonded Forever is a co-op game that combines horror and puzzle elements. In this game, you and your friend try to go back to the place where you live in your childhood and solve the mysteries that happened while you were away and try to overcome the problems you will face by working together.

name: BoozeBall
summary: Booze ball is a casual sports game. Test your aim and reactions against an increasingly difficult computer player to see how many levels you can beat!

name: Bowling
summary: Grab your best bowling shoes and get ready to play this fun and easy to play bowling game anytime.

name: Bottle
summary: Bottle is a 2D pixel-based platformer, that may or may not have rage-like elements (depends on how good you get at it).

name: Boxes: Lost Fragments
summary: As a legendary thief, your next assignment lures you into a grand and lavish mansion. There you find a series of puzzle boxes, designed for an unknown purpose. What should have been a quick in-and-out, gradually turns into your own harrowing struggle for freedom and answers.

name: Bob the Builder
summary: Bob the Builder is a Plug It In & Play TV Games system based on the long-running stop-motion/CGI TV series developed by HotGen and released by Jakks Pacific in 2006.

name: Bones of Halloween
summary: How long can you survive the night of the pumpkin skeletons? A small but spooky first-person shooter with a Halloween theme

name: Book of Coin
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark fantasy world that is inspired by traditional text-based adventure and interactive fiction games.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked
summary: Jump, Dash, Collect! Play solo and with your friends and loved ones! Explore this cute 3D platformer where you play as Boti, a brave and adorable data bot. Join Boti on an adventure to save the cyber-world of Byteland from bugs and viruses!

name: Book End
summary: Book End is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Shiori, the main goal being to explore the dream world and collect Spells.

name: Boo!
summary: 'Boo!' is a spooky puzzle game for you! Can you make the correct pumpkin in 42 Halloween themed levels?

name: Bomber Command
summary: Take command of what would become the greatest air armada in history! Build, plan, coordinate, and command your forces into a mighty aerial armada against a smart German economy that adapts to your attacks, researches tech, and smartly reacts to your moves. Take over the Bomber Command.

name: Bonerdale
summary: Stroll around the beautiful suburban town of Bonerdale. Meet its lovable and sexy residents while you and your friends are trying to find a job and uncover the mystery of the murders that are taking place in the town.

name: Bobo the Cat
summary: The neighbours are often annoyed by naughty cat Bobo. One day they decide to get rid of him. Little Bobo wakes up far away and all alone. Will he find a way back home?

name: Bonbonribbon: Tokimeki Coord Kirakira Dance
summary:
A rhythm game where you can enjoy the coordination and dance of the fashionable dance team "Lily Bonbons".

In addition to the official song "Miracle Ribon", dance to well-known nursery rhymes and classic classics.

name: Boku wa Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Kankuu All Stars
Boku ha Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero 3D - Haneda All Stars
Bokura no Nanokakan Sensou: Yuujou Adventure
Bou Ningen Challenge!
summary: Stickman games are now available on Nintendo 3DS! Over 80 fun mini-games! Play to your heart's content in simple yet deep, hilarious mini-games, including side-scrolling action games and brain-teasing games! Some mini-games even feature national rankings! Aim to rank high in your favorite games!

name: Bokura no Gakkou Sensou: Tsuukai Adventure
Bodyslam
summary: Bodyslam is a Sega System 16 arcade wrestling game developed by Esco Boueki and manufactured by Sega. It was later ported to the C64.

name: Bolt
summary: In Disney's Bolt, players take on the heroic personas of the TV star dog, Bolt, and his owner, Penny, from the high-action television series featured within the film.

name: Boing
summary: Boing is a fast paced action game where you play as the Boing and defend against waves of more and more challenging enemies.

name: Bomber 3
summary: Put yourself in the captain’s seat of a B-17 bomber, select your plane, select your crew and plot your path over war-torn Europe. Watch your elevation, watch your formation, and watch very carefully when you are over the target. This classic was a bestseller in the early 1990s.

name: Boulette Hell
summary: Defeat bosses in this bullet hell with unique characters and silly stories. Will you be able to escape the clutches of a contract you signed for the purchase of a yogurt maker?

name: Bosorka
summary: Bosorka is an exciting action roguelike where a young witch saves the world from insidious and cruel demons. Combine runes, master a variety of brooms, and try all possible and impossible spells until you gain enough power to fight evil.

name: Boot Camp Endless Runner
summary: Free to play, Endless Runner. Dodge Obstacles and collect Ammo

name: BOT.vinnik Chess: Prodigies
summary: Do you think you have nothing to learn from a child? And what about the world's greatest chess prodigies of all time? Let BOT.vinnik - the Soviet digital trainer - show you how.

name: Border Wars
summary:
Commander, you are needed to take control of your soldiers in the new army games. You are able to command troops ranging from pistol wielding units to snipers, tanks, machinegun jeeps and artillery. Inspired from some of the best military games on mobile which will challenge your skills in battle simulator.
Players of battle simulator and military games will love the trench warfare like style of each mission with warpips like strategy games. You can deploy your troops like trench battles but also manage money like classic RTS games. The gameplay is styled to play like ww2 and ww3 strategy games with trench warfare like mechanics.
Fight on the borders of your country in a battle simulator of infantry units. Or command missions in the forests and fields of your country with trench defense. You must protect your home from the enemy in battles that take place in the harsh weather of the desert and finally you must command your troops in tank games where large tank battles take place in the city.
The goal of each mission in the military games is to destroy the enemy base or survive until reinforcements arrive. To win you will need to manage your money carefully and perform strategic advancement to win all the campaign missions. Mini warriors can be called to the battlefield by pressing their button from the soldier panel. Money is earned by killing enemy soldiers. Make careful use of tanks and artillery to win the battlefield. At the end you will have to fight the enemy general and defeat him by destroying the boss tank.
A lot of work and effort was put in developing this project so that it can be enjoyed and played like classic ww2 games and modern ww3 games combined. The gameplay of both these military games combined makes this a fun and one of the more challenging campaign games. I hope you will enjoy playing this and if you do please leave feedback here as it encourages me to add even more campaign missions to the game.

name: Boat Builder: Andy's Story
summary: In this game you have to play as Andy, an experienced yachtsman who starts his new way of life working at his own shipyard. Buy materials, build boats and yachts, complete orders. Start with something simple and build your skills from fishing boats to racing yachts.

name: Born in Blood
summary: Dont just survive a zombie apocalypse, thrive in it! Blast hordes of Zeds as you gain experience and cash to buy better gear and see how long you can survive.

name: Borealis Aberration
summary: Borealis Aberration is a survival-horror PvEvP tactical Third Person Shooter placed in a post-apocalyptic solar-punk world, where a mysterious organism has contaminated the planet’s atmosphere, making it impossible for humanity to breathe.

name: Bob's Journey
summary: Wood brokes stone, stone smashes metal, and as always metal cut wood. An adventure through a map based on jokenpo principles, where if you use the right weapon on the right item/enemy, can you save resources and have bigger rewards.

name: Bolo Legends: An Epic Adventure
summary: Do you have what it takes to save a princess from Dark Lord who dares to threaten the whole world by consuming her powers and become threat to everyone's existence, then Bolo Legends is for you.

name: Book Travelers: A Victorian Story - Collector's Edition
summary: As head librarian takes a strange turn when novelist Charlotte Brontë herself magically appears to ask for your help! Someone’s going into famous stories and changing them, threatening the worlds and characters inside. Can you travel into your favorite novels to stop a dangerous vigilante in time?

name: Bowlout
summary: This is not an ordinary bowling game! In BOWLOUT, you'll throw tons of bowling balls at rogue pins as you traverse the bowling center. Perform overhead or underhand throws, or simply grab a pin by the head and use it as a baseball bat.

name: Bounce Paradise
summary: Choose your own story as you take over a beach resort, of course it's not all fun and games but at least the park is filled with an array of beautiful women to distract you. Your choices will determine the story and whether romance is in the air and how your beach visit will end.

name: Botany Manor
summary: Welcome to Botany Manor, a stately home in 19th century England. You play as its inhabitant Arabella Greene, a retired botanist. Explore your house and gardens, filled with botanical research, to figure out the ideal habitat for a collection of forgotten flora. Grow each plant to discover the mysterious qualities they hold…

name: Boyfriend's Rescue
summary: Boyfriend's Rescue is an adult platform gay game about a boy trying to save his boyfriend who is trapped in a magical book, the Gay Sutra.

name: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise
summary: Bombing!! 2: A Graffiti Paradise is a creative sandbox painting game where the entire game world can be painted, and a sequel to Bombing!!: A Graffiti Sandbox. In the game the player explores hidden secrets, talks to characters, and unlocks painting tools to paint all over the world. It features a bright and vibrant art style with bold colours and graphics.

name: Bohemian Symphony
summary: Follow the nonsensical adventures of Zalmora Greenhand and friends as they attempt to solve murders, fend off curses, and survive zombie apocalypses.

name: Body. Electric.
summary: A third Person Roleplaying Adventure game set in the not-so-distant future that contains puzzles, flying cars, robot warfare, upgradeable weapons and exploration.

name: Boxy & Prisma
summary: Two cubes found themselves in a bit of a pickle. They've woken up in an abandoned crate factory! Worst yet, they no longer have each other's embrace! Can you help them reunite and get home?

name: Bot World
summary: Bot World is a zelda-like game about exploring locations, upgrading your weapons and destroying scary bosses.

name: Boom 2020
summary: A game to test your true ability in FPS shooters. Boom2020 take Revenge on the killers of your love Mona in a fast paced deathly shooter.

name: Boomerang Fu: Fresh Flavors Pack
summary: Complete the cast of Boomerang Fu with the Fresh Flavors Pack! Dive into battle as Pineapple, Fries, Ramen or Boba Tea and slice your friends in style with a stack of exclusive costumes.

name: Booty Calls: Eve Pack
summary: This very first Booty Calls DLC introduces your to the lovely Eve: a clueless (and extremely horny) babe who’s expecting a little bundle of joy.

name: Booty Calls: Lulu Furry Pack
summary: The latest Booty Calls DLC introduces you to the playful Lulu, a kinky cat girl who will do anything to get her master’s attention. This fine feline loves fooling around, and never misses a chance to please her owner.

name: Booty Calls: Miyu Pack
summary: The latest Booty Calls DLC introduces you to the sweet, innocent Miyu: a shy girl that dreams of giving her virginity to a man who will treat her like the princess she is.

name: Bounty
summary: A sci-fi first-person shooter with a dynamic deployable cover system. A demo level from our game Bounty.

name: Boots Quest DX
summary: An offbeat adventure game about traveling to the ends of the earth in search of the Best Boots. Solve puzzles, complete quests, collect items, and don weird hats as a hapless young boot enthusiast in a compact open world full of strange friends and foes. You can even jump.

name: Bocchi Kaihi
summary:
Rescue the mysterious main character with a shadow,
Escape from all the way!
It's clear and I have a soft heart. It's such an app.

name: Bounce and Pop
summary: Throw your slicer to the balloons. Satisfying experience when you clear the levels. Easy to learn but hard to expert.

name: Boat Train
summary: A chess-inspired roguelike with flash-inspired graphics. As King, accumulate and command your army across a series of procedurally generated train carts. Outsmart a variety of unique enemies, capture them, and add them to your army... but one wrong step, and you lose them forever!

name: Bonk's Revenge
summary: One day soon after arriving on the moon, Bonk hears an incredible explosion. Oh, no! The Earth has split into two! The sinister King Drool has struck again. This is bad. Real bad. Bonk must return to the Earth immediately!

name: Boyfriend Dungeon: Secret Weapons
summary: The Secret Weapons DLC comes with a brand-new dunj, three new weapons-slash-love interests, and more.

name: Bombing Wonderful
summary: Play as Momoko, the super heroine Wonderful Pink, and defeat the aliens in this 18+ shoot-em-up.

name: Borderlands 2 Spawn Multiplier Mod
summary: Adds up to 4x the amounts of enemies while changing placements and even cutscenes. An intended brand new experience only for Borderlands 2 veterans.

name: Born to Be Big
summary: Enjoy exploring ocean and surviving with your fellow fishes of all shapes and colors! Move your creature very fast to avoid the unneeded date with bigger species otherwise you will become a great meal for them! Yummy! On the contrary should your rookie seek for appropriate victims around the ocean! Actually, it needs to swallow five of them to grow up a little.

name: Boxer
summary: Boxer is an easy to play arcade, pick up and play first person, fast action boxing game. Fight three hard-hitting rounds against one of the seven AI rival boxers without getting knocked out.

name: Boinkgame
summary:
Boinkgame is a precision platformer where the only enemy is yourself.

And the walls... The walls are a bigger enemy actually.

name: Bookyman
summary: Bookyman is a Puzzle game, developed by Mega Soft and published by NTDEC, which was released in Asia in 1992.

name: Bop It! Tetris
summary:
A handheld game licensed by The Tetris Company and produced by Hasbro, this game features two LCD screens, with the smaller one on the shorter end and the wider one going around the body of the main unit. Game-play consists of the player twisting the shorter end to position the piece projected on the smaller screen above the gap in the pieces shown on the larger, twisting the smaller screen itself to rotate the piece itself in one direction or another, then squeezing both ends together to "drop" the piece in place.

On Marathon Mode the player is given three lives, and the time allotted the player to maneuver, rotate and drop the piece gets shorter as the game progresses. Should the player either fail to drop the piece in time, or they drop said piece in a way that any part of the piece would stick out of the top of the lower LCD screen, the player loses a life.

name: Bones: The Game of the Haunted Mansion
summary:
Bones: The Game of the Haunted Mansion is a member of the pseudo-roguelike Wizard's Castle family. It is one of the oldest games of this family, originating in 1981 on DEC mainframes.

The story is quite conservative: As in the other Wizard's Castle games, your task is to descend into a dungeon to find the all-powerful Globe of some mighty Warlock on the deepest level.

The gameplay is a hybrid of boardgame-like exploration and roguelike dungeon crawl, the whole presented as in "windowed" interactive fiction game, while the setting is a mix of fantasy, horror and sci-fi elements, playing in a haunted mansion filled with dust, bones, undead skeletons, RAM chips needed for auto-mapping, Uzis and Laser guns, etc. The only graphics is the BGI title screen; the rest of the game plays in text mode and reminds late DOS applications with windows.

name: Boobs vs Aliens
summary: Discover your real divine heritage in our funtastic Tower Defense game! Join the fast-paced, action-packed, cosmically entertaining world of Boobs vs. Aliens and see your powers grow with each battle! Dig deep inside the human psyche, and learn about the very essence of libido as you take part in unforgettable and kinky sexual adventures filled with legendary tales of heroism, tantra, neuroscience, occult, virtual reality and out of this world hi-tech weaponry! So what are you waiting for? Give a fuck! Save the world!

name: Box World
summary: Box World is a single player puzzle video game for Windows 3.1, created and published by Jeng-Long Jiang in 1992.

name: Bonetale
summary:
Bonetale is a fan game based on Undertale on the Genocide path. In this game you, in the role of Sans, need to defeat an evil kid named Frisk.
The game features a well-developed combat system with multiple characters, you can fight as different Undertale characters in different levels and maps.

name: Botaniki
summary: A 3D Yume Nikki fangame. Explore Ouiki's dreams, and uncover the dark world she lives in, and has created for herself.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Appendix I
summary:
The figments of the forest swirled within this crucible of immense heat.

At the fulcrum between the exterior expanse,

and the encroaching frustration of the denizens…

Bulsifer came to exist.

Once the spirits of the forest, now a phantasm of the town.

Drift back through dreams of the town by speaking to your fellow phantoms in this small companion to Boreal Tenebrae Act I.

name: Boba Simulator
summary: Boba Tea shop simulator with cats. Manage recipe, stock and customer satisfaction.

name: Bombe
summary: Minesweeper, but you only solve each situation once.

name: Bottle Cracks!
summary: Choose any key on your keyboard and make your bottle jump to the end of the level. Just don't use too much power, or your bottle will BREAK.

name: Bottle Taps Race
summary: A bottle cap racing game.

name: Bomber
summary: A Bomberman clone.

name: Boxville: Collector's Edition
summary: Boxville Collector's Edition includes Boxville The Game, Soundtrack, Artbook and Wallpapers.

name: Boxing
summary: Modified version of Waixing's 16-bit plug and play game Virtual Boxing. The in-game background is a modified version of a video capture of the background from the Family Sport boxing game.

name: Bonk
summary: Bonk is a game for the 3D Gamate.

name: Bob.exe
summary: A silly sonic.exe porn parody.

name: Boat Simulator
summary: An adventure on the high seas like you've never seen before, with realistic graphics and sounds. Experience the sensation of sailing the entire ocean through the most mythical ships.

name: Bondee's Barnyard: Safety Violation
summary:
The year is 2004, from inside the cow animatronic, Kou, you must defend yourself from a barrage of haywired animatronic characters.

And if that wasn't enough, you must avoid the camera systems sightline to not awake any suspicion with the security guard. If you're seen moving around, shuting doors, the guard will give Kou a remote electric shock, killing the child in the process...

The game is split into "hours" instead of the regular "nights" becasue why would you wanna stay?

With hand drawn minigames and 2 unlockable modes, you wont be starving for content at Bondee's barnyard!

name: Bowser's Lair Hockey
summary: Mario Party 7: Bowser's Lair Hockey was an online Flash game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Mario Party 7 on the Nintendo GameCube. It could be played at the Nintendo Arcade, a section on nintendo.com that contained promotional web games.

name: Boxing
summary:
The Modern version of the game features Luigi as a playable character. This version has three opponents: a Wiggler, a Big Boo, and Waluigi. Luigi has to beat all his opponents. After that, he has to repeat the fighting order along with winning a coin, a trophy, or a Championship Belt. Luigi and his opponents start with five hit points each, and they reset to five each time one of them gets pushed back. As the player advances in the game, the enemies get more difficult to defeat.

Getting one KO earns a coin, getting five earns a Yoshi Coin, getting ten earns a trophy, and getting 50 earns a Championship Belt. It is Game Over if Luigi gets KO'd.

name: Booblyc TD: Tower Last Defense
summary: A guy fell asleep at the table, playing his favorite war strategy game on a smartphone. He dreams of an unusual dream that he gets just in the heart of td battles with orcs. The local empire warriors greet him, telling him that it would be nice if such a mage helped them in the castle siege. And now you can't tell the difference between the dream and reality...

name: BoxLoop 2
summary: The Time Looping Evil Boxes Are Back! Solve The Riddles and Help Save Our Hero Aous From The Time Looping Evil Boxes In This Roguelike Adventure.

name: Bonzai Bounce
summary: Bonzai Bounce is a 2D platformer with a unique graphical style. Your mission is to control the ball and collect orbs that are spread throughout the 6 levels. Clear the levels as fast as you can with as many orbs as possible to get the highest possible score. At your disposal is the environment, use bridges as slingshots and platforms to reach new heights.

name: Bop A Dork
summary: Bop A Dork is a fast paced Arcade style game packed with unique artwork and sounds where your goal is to bop as many dorks as you can. Track your dork bopping stats on the statistics page and see if you can unlock all of the awards!

name: Bouncing Buddies
summary:
Now 100% free to play, no ads, no nothing. We hope it puts a smile on your face in these tough times – stay safe!
Guide your animal buddy as they jump through an obstacle course of platforms by moving your thumb from side to side. Maintaining the rhythm is simple, but this casual arcade game is tough to master as the music speeds up!
Land your happy furry inflatable friends accurately on the platforms for higher scores and more rewards!

name: Botania
summary: Botania is an innovative natural magic-themed tech mod for Minecraft, centered around generating and harnessing the magical energy produced by mystical flowers.

name: BoomSweeper VR
summary: Hands > Mice! BoomSweeperVR is a classic puzzle game re-imagined from a whole new perspective. Sit back, kick your feet up, and unwind with one of the most addictive and beloved games of all time. Featuring achievements and three levels of difficulty for newcomers and 90's desktop veterans.

name: Bots Boom Bang
summary:
The coolest bots ever.
Dive into the world of bits & bytes and experience the grooviest bots of all time. Bots Boom Bang is funky, groovy, fun - in a word, different. A brand new challenge awaits you: solve the schematics to help the bots find each other. Use the power items to clear your path through the levels. Use the craziest wheel of fortune you've ever spun and win great prizes. Are you in?

name: Boxing Holic
summary:
I know you have sorted out iPhone and iPod folder.
Boxing Holic is new paradigm puzzle game from sorting out iPhone folder.
Get high score to sort out droped block in a huddle.
Boxing Holic provides Game Center Service, so you can compete ranking with your friends or international user.

name: Bounce Lounge
summary: Experience sensual immersion in this audio-visual trip of hand-crafted stages, each ft. an original soundtrack with colorful animations. Test your skills & reflexes in endless, an infinite mix of color and obstacles that is unique every play.

name: Bounce Time!
summary:
Demolish as many bricks as you can by bouncing the ball before the blocks reach the bottom. The blocks are numbered according to how many hits it takes to demolish them, the number of hits goes up as the game progresses. Collect the white objects to get more balls and the yellow coins to unlock the other characters with various superpowers, also, the coins can enable you to have another chance even when the game is ‘over’.
Get Ready, Aim, Fire, Have fun!

name: Boundary Walls
summary: Overview: You are a source of light trapped inside walls and you need to escape from these walls surrounded by various traps, but how? The light sources you find around open a gateway for you to move on to the next level, and you can only get out of here by collecting them.

name: Bouncy! Trampoline
summary: Bouncy is a rabbit who loves to jump on his trampoline. Touch or slide to make Bouncy jump and do tricks!

name: Box Heap
summary:
Box Heap is an addictive mobile game with a simple gameplay and easy to learn and master.
Drag the block to match 2 or 5 blocks of the same color. These blocks will change to a new block.

name: Boom Adventures
summary: Grab a duck and hit enemy! This is the primary goal of the game :) There are two game modes. Campaign and survival. In both you can challenge your friends to check who is best duckthrower.

name: Bowling Islands
summary:
Have you ever played bowling at tropical islands? Well, now you can!
There are various and strange types of lanes, balls, and pins in this game.
Pull the throwing cursor to aim, and flick the ball to curve!
Let's become a Island Bowl Master!!

name: Box Roulette Simulator
summary: If you looking for most exciting game and you’re ready to risk, Box Roulette is the exactly for your. One boxing punch and you lost it all!

name: Boom Slayer
summary: Boom Slayer is an reckless and fun arcade. Your mission is shoot skull to reach the goal. But each level will be more complex and challenging !! Every level has limit of shots that player can use to unlock next level. At each level there are several types of opponents.

name: Bound Forest
summary: Bound Forest is a survival action game where you play as Josh, a young kid stranded in the forest fighting for his survival. Fight the dangers of the forest with your trusty bow and arrow.

name: Boat Go
