summary: Boat Go is a turn-based strategy game featuring a sailing and ocean background. You will move the boat along the grid and avoid being attacked by your enemies, no matter if it's the nature mother or dangerous monsters. You target is to get to the destination with as less movements as possible whilst getting treasures.

name: Book of Shadows
summary: In the 1000 years after the Battle of the Holy Demon, the Book of Shadows suddenly appeared on the mainland. It is said that people have the power to rule the country if they get it. So the major sects and organizations participated in the competition for this book.

name: Bounty Bots
summary:
Take part in the classic tale of greedy robotic desperados hurling explosive cacti and toxic goo at each other in the historic frontier town of Deadbolt.
Okay, so maybe it's not so classic, but Bounty Bots is a frantic multiplayer action game with outrageous weapons and zany powers in a West that never was.

name: Boss Fighters
summary: Become the VR BOSS to wreak havoc, or join the fight as a PC player in epic battles. Become a futuristic superstar gladiator to compete for valuable loot, ranks, and the crowd's amusement!

name: Boat Rage
summary: Boat Rage - 3d racing game on boats, you drive a boat, dodging mines, crossing checkpoints in time, get to the finish line in time!

name: Bosses
summary: Let's boss battle!

name: Boulder Escape
summary: Run! The boulder is out to get you! In this fast-paced runner you will need to gather resources, build obstacles, and dodge enemies. The longer you survive the more upgrades you unlock! Secrets and hidden passages await in this vibrant world.

name: Bodhi 'n' Friends
summary: Your old friend you co-founded a game studio with has contacted you 4 years after the studio shut down and you both parted ways following a major controversy. He tells you he's got the studio set back up again and would love to discuss a new game project with you. What could it be?

name: Boom 42
summary: Experience the nostalgia of the past, reimagined for the present, Boom 42 is a party game for up to 8 players. Join the Crew-42 on a unique adventure, testing friendship and discovering new exciting planets!

name: Bouncing Music
summary: This game can create random music by drawing different types of blocks and using the collision of marbles. Through the guidance of mini-levels one by one, you will gradually master how to create music on this music canvas.

name: Bone Dust
summary: Enter the nightmare circus in Bone Dust, a skill-based arena bullet hell. With fast-paced, arcade-style gameplay and epic boss battles, you'll battle against horrendous enemies using your playing cards as a weapon. Put your skills to the test and conquer the global leaderboard!

name: Boku Boku
summary: Boku Boku is a blocks-building game, you can use blocks to create your own world, a unique playground that is only for you.

name: Bobble Bunch: Ultimate Pet Adventure
summary:
Bobble Bunch is the kind of game that might seem easy to play at first but it will instantly immerse you in an outlandish world that will turn your hands sweaty quite fast.
Travel through mesmerizing portals, avoid the green orbs and try not to get caught by the deadly electricity beam. Using simple controls, all you need are fast reactions and cunning timing in order to reach the blue saving light.
Bobble Bunch is all about guiding your bobble pets through a mysterious world while facing wicked obstacles and devilish traps.
Do you think you have what it takes to save them?

name: Bouncefield: Bricks Breaker
summary: Bouncefield is a free offline retro Arkanoid bounce ball game.

name: Bottoms Up!: Part 1
summary: The most intoxicating story you will ever read... Literally! Bottoms Up! - is a linear Visual Novel type of game that only aims to present compellingly an interesting fantasy world, colorful characters and the largely funny, but sometimes dark shenanigans they get into.

name: Box Office Boss
summary: Box Office Boss puts you in charge of your own movie studio. The studio will rise or fall on the back of your executive decisions. Everybody thinks they could make a good movie, but do you have what it takes to turn that dream into box office success?

name: Bouncy Pirates
summary:
It's Bouncy time! Don't let your pirates fall into the sharky sea. Make them bounce to Treasure Island and help them take their loot back into the ship. Do you want gold?
So Let's bounce Sailor!

name: Boy & Wheel
summary: Boy & Wheel is a combination of wheel and RPG. You play a boy and avenge father's blood. You will encounter terrible monsters on your way to avenge and fight with them desperately.

name: Boba
summary:
Harvest Resources. Impose Your Will. Discover The Unknown.

Daniel Mullins' (Inscryption, Pony Island) winning entry into Ludum Dare 52.
An incremental game made in just 48 hours!
Free to download from here: https://dmullinsgames.itch.io/boba

name: Bow Climb
summary: Join players from around the world in a gauntlet of challenges you and your bow must overcome. Bow climb is a social climbing game. It'll take time but you'll be able to do it!

name: Bombo Rumble
summary: Bombo Rumble is a 4 player local - multiplayer game where you throw bombs with physics at your foes. Battle in 12 different arenas, use a variety of weapons and power ups to blast away your friends or play against Bots

name: BookyPets Legends
summary: BookyPets Legends is a videogame of adventure, exploration and collecting, whose main objective is to encourage children from 7 to 12 years to read in an easy and funny way.

name: Bog Racer
summary:
You have two paths: forward across bridge or over to feed the fish.
In order to avoid falling into water, touch the screen when the car is approaching the edge of the bridge.

name: Bongo
summary: As an explorer you have to avoid a red dinosaur as you try to get from the left of a huge cavern and traverse 27 screens to the right. As you move through each screen, various obstacles must be avoided such as falling rocks, lava and birds. If you dawdle for too long, the dinosaur appears behind you and chases you until you make it to the end of the screen. There are also treasures to collect and if you get six in a row without dying you receive a bonus. On the last screen, you need to try and trap the dinosaur in a cage.

name: Botanic
summary:
A maze game where the player controls a caterpillar, traversing branches of a tree and eating leaves. The leaves obscure various junctions in the maze, so you are not sure if you’re going to hit a dead end until you munch the leaf.
Enemy bugs are hunting you as you navigate the levels, but there is a power up you can collect that works like the power pills in Pac-man and allows you to chase and eat the enemies for a short time.

name: Bowl 'Em Down
summary:
Have you ever wondered how a bowling ball feels as they roll down the lane? It's probably terrifying, so i would imagine you'd be screaming, right?
That's kinda what this game is all about.
Try to get a high score in this infinite, randomly generated bowling game.
Another twist is that when you fail a run you are prompted to scream to continue! You can do this infinitely as long as you scream louder than last time. You'll be managing your volume to get the most out of the feature and be screaming your lungs out by the end.

name: Boom
summary: Get ready for explosive excitement in Boom! In this fast-paced action game, you'll face off against a variety of monsters in each stage. As you progress through the levels, you'll have the opportunity to pick up different bombs and power-ups that will help you defeat your enemies and advance to the next stage. With challenging gameplay, colorful graphics, and a variety of levels to play through, Boom will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Don't wait any longer to join the action - download Boom today and see if you have what it takes to be the ultimate bomber, but be careful not to get blown up first!

name: Bombs Away on Barrels
summary:
Bombs Away on Barrels is a high velocity tilting and tapping game. Wonderful 40+ addicting puzzles have you speeding your reckless bomb through exploding barrels to save the castle. Download it now!
Multiple levels and unique objects to beat the game. Run through time warps, bouncy springs and use an unlimited amount of turbo firework boosts. Amazing and fun game for all ages in high definition with real physics and amazing graphics.
Use trajectory and gravity to roll your way into the finals with Bombs Away on Barrels.

name: BoxCar Racing
summary:
Start out with the teams paddock bomb and work your way up the team to be our top driver..
Earn new faster and better performance BoxCars as you work your way through mini championship races.

name: Bombproof Bob
summary: An explosive, fun, physics based puzzle game using a unique mechanic of movement caused by explosions.

name: Book Travelers: A Victorian Story
summary: Can you save literature's most famous story worlds from ruin?

name: Born Again
summary: Hack-n-slash your way through the evil brewing in the Outer Realm! Stop the ominous Overlords in their tracks, but tread lightly, for every corner hosts a monster in waiting!

name: BomberBoy
summary: BomberBoy is a port of the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive game Mega Bomberman (itself a port of the PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 game Bomberman '94) for the Famicom made by Super Game and released on a multicart in 1997 by an unknown publisher. While being only released in 1997, it appears to be Super Game's first title, made around 1995 and unfinished for unknown reasons.

name: Boogerman
summary:
Super Boogerman is a Famicom port of Boogerman: A Pick and Flick Adventure, originally released for Sega Mega Drive and Super Nintendo. It was produced by Super Game and published by Realtec.

The game is a recreation of the original Boogerman, but is considerably less faithful than Boogerman II: The Final Adventure, with a mixed-up level order and severely limited abilities for the player, which is compensated for by providing infinite ammo.

Like many of Super Game's other bootlegs, this game has no ending; after the player defeats the third boss, the game merely resets.

name: Boogerman II: The Final Adventure
summary:
Boogerman II: The Final Adventure is an unlicensed port of the Mega Drive version of Boogerman: A Pick and Flick Adventure, made by Rex Soft in 1997.

The gameplay is slow, and the controls are far less responsive than Super Game's version. There are 2 extra powers than what Super Game's version had: Belch and the Flame Gas ability (This power only works if pressing A, B, And Select all at once), but lacks garbage piles and the Milk Jug powerup. Also, it has two bosses removed from Super Game's version: FlyBoy and Revolta. The music in this version is more recognizable than Super Game's version. In the story intro, the text is scrolling up, instead of paragraphs, and lacks the animation of Boogerman cleaning the room. Super Game's version combines all four levels into one 1 Level each, but Boogerman II has only 2 of the four levels, separately, like Earthworm Jim 3 by Hummer Team, also made in 1997.

name: Bouncing Wheel: Highway Monster
summary: Get your fastest fingers and try this quick reflexive game. Hell broke loose when your monster truck explodes and the Tires are on Mayhem on the highway. Just tap to bounce the monstrous tire away from the oncoming traffic. Stay in the game until you crash.

name: Bouncy Goal
summary:
The coolest way to score a goal is with your head.
Aim for the heads of the players to pass the ball and finally score a goal.
The game is so much fun, even birds join in to play.
Watch out for the evil referee, he is there to ruin the game.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe
summary: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Boondog
summary: Harking back to the days of classic precision platformers such as Flashback and Prince of Persia, Boondog demands that you carefully consider each move that you make: a single incorrect leap, turn, or drop can end in disaster.

name: Boxgame
summary: In the three-dimensional world of Boxgame, it’s hard to know which way is up. As you walk and jump around the perimeter of the game’s giant translucent boxes, floors can become walls, walls can become ceilings, and players will become disoriented.

name: Bounce Journey
summary: Experience the joy of bouncing through a whimsical world filled with excitement and wonder!

name: Bounty: Drag Racing
summary:
Bounty: Drag Racing is the most complete drag racing experience on the market. Race the fastest and most varied types of dragsters in the world.
Fine tune your cars to achieve maximum performance in a constantly changing weather and get online for the most competitive drag racing encounters.

name: Bowsette Cave Escape
summary: Oh no! Bowsette is in a collapsing cave and you need to help her escape!

name: Boom Royale
summary: Boom Royale - Shooting Game Boom Royale-building Flash is intense combat multiplayer! Take on up to 8 players online in this 2D game with cartoony visuals and gameplay between Soldat and Halo, inspired by the shooter Mini Militia and Teeworlds.

name: Boomerang Battles
summary: Boomerang Battles is a fast paced action roguelike where you battle your way through 100 floors of a deadly dungeon with your trusty boomerang in a bid for your freedom. Pick your favourite boomerang, learn its attack patterns, find upgrades, and battle against exciting bosses. Escape if you can.

name: Bots Chaos
summary: Can you finish this game in 10 minutes? Bots Chaos is an action FPS game where you must destroy many robots to beat a score in 10 minutes. You will never get bored in this casual, hard and fast paced semi procedural game full of annoying robots, lasers and chaos.

name: Bold
summary: Bold is a unique, quiet and elegant third person exploration game, as well as a Zen game for traveling, walking, watching picturesque landscapes. The protagonist of the game, deer (bold), finds deer herds and obtains inner peace by crossing grasslands, deep forests, wilderness, rivers, and lakes.

name: Bogart
summary: Bogart is one of many games by Scott Cawthon. It was created in 2006 and is a action based game.

name: Bogart 2: Return of Bogart
summary: Bogart 2: Return of Bogart is a platform video game made by Scott Cawthon in 2006.

name: Bottle Grannies
summary: Manage a group of bottle collecting grandmothers and send them to collection gigs around the city. Take into account the strengths and weaknesses of the grannies when sending for the task and gather experience as well as money.

name: Bopl Battle
summary: A couch/online game where you battle your friends with unique and wild abilities. There are many choices such as a shrink ray, creating black holes, stopping time and attaching a rocket engine to the stage to send it flying. Choose a combination that synergizes well to win the round!

name: Boardquest: Tales of Liria
summary: Lead Orcs, Humans, Elves, or Demons toward victory over Liria in this turn-based strategy for 1-4 players. Advance your skills, wield powerful weapons, and form alliances to defeat your foes. Bring peace over Liria with the solo campaign or face your friends in a local or online multiplayer.

name: Boba Tea Shop Simulator
summary: Make various drinks and boba teas. Interact with the world using game's hilarious physics, doing the chores that every tea shop manager get to encounter. Make smart investments with your money or buy decorations to customize your own shop to grow your tea shop into a world-known brand.

name: Bowl Faster
summary: Because normal bowling is too slow!!! The typical game of bowling can take 8+ hours to complete (Depending on the number of players and beverages served). Now you can finish a game in about 1 min!

name: Boomerang Jack
summary: Boomerang Jack is an action-adventure RPG with free-flowing combat. String together boomerang attacks with kinetic movement and upgradeable powers. Embark on a globe-trotting quest to stop the Pirate King.

name: Borderwatch: Dark Armada
summary: As a part of the Borderwatch team, scavenge, defend and survive against zombie hordes in this 3rd person action horror survival! Will you be able to see the daylight?

name: Bone N Soul
summary: Bone N Soul is a two player metroidvania. Cast spells and bombard your enemies in ranged combat or become more personal and possess your enemies to advance through a place where desire reigns.

name: Bounce Boing Voyage
summary: Bounce Boing Voyage is an 3D Platformer game released in 2008 via the N-Gage service.

name: Boss
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Bouncy Ball
summary: Navigate a ball to collect stars while avoiding various obstacles and traps. With over 800 levels spread across more than 20 worlds, the game features a unique map editor and an online map store, allowing players to create and share their own levels. Bouncy Ball is a mobile game that has captivated over 10 million users worldwide, ranking as the second overall free app and the second top brain and puzzle game in South Korea.

name: Bodyconscious Digital Rave! Part 1: Shinjuku & Takashi
summary: Bodyconscious Digital Rave! Part 1: Shinjuku & Takashi simulates the nightlife of Japan by taking you to the club scene where you can engage in simulated partying.

name: Borderline Homicide
summary: This is a mysterious homicide that occurred in the forest of the border area. A forest ranger died under mysterious circumstances during patrol, without obvious external injuries but with suspected trap marks. As the player, you have to uncover the truth behind the murder.

name: Books of Grandura
summary: Explore a procedurally generated world full of fantasy and danger as a being created by lost magic.

name: Bogdan's Cross
summary: Embark on a journey of redemption as Bogdan, a fallen Templar seeking to make amends for his past sins. Explore a stunning world filled with ancient mysteries, uncover hidden secrets, and battle fierce enemies in this immersive action-adventure game.

name: Bowling
summary: Port of Bowling from the Sport Vii.

name: Bowling
summary: A bowling game. Three bowling lanes are offered by the game that the player can bowl in, named Jungle, Terra and Heaven.

name: Bomb Hero
summary: Same as the VT3xx-based Bomb Hero. The version titled Bomb Hero is identical to the VT3xx game visually (including the Kirbys and Jigglypuffs), while additionally using music from Bomberman II; the version titled Hero features different graphics, and uses Boos from the Mario series as enemies.

name: Box Puzzle
summary: Loosely based on Soukoban, the player must move boxes to form paths across a series of islands.

name: Bocchi the Escape
summary: In Bocchi the Escape you play as Bocchi, who has a nightmare about box mazes being chased by her friends.

name: Bone Boy
summary: Feeling bad to the bone? Shred through the body as Bone Boy - learn rad tricks, help your friends and collect epic hats along the way. Get out there and tear it up, kid!

name: Bowling
summary:
Bowling is a bowling simulation game with questionable gameplay and controls. Some graphics are stolen from Half-Life and other games in Intec's version.

It was originally made for the Nintendo Entertainment System, but Intec has ported it to a cartridge for their console, and there is no information about these 2 versions and the version discussed below.

name: Boxes World
summary: A game frequently found in plug & plays. Later ported and published by Waixing.

name: Bobblehead College Football
summary:
Bobblehead College Football is the best college football game on iOS. Build your dream college, recruit a promising team of young bobbleheads and take them into battle against other players in head-to-head or simulated matches. Carefully manage your campus resources and hone your football strategy to reach the top of the leaderboard.
Can you become the next Bobblehead Champion?!

name: Box Maker
summary:
Box Maker is a clone of Super Mario Maker for PC and Android made by Silver Moon Internet in 2016-2017.

The game at one point was on the App Store and Google Play, but was taken down likely due to copyright reasons. The full game is currently available for purchase on Steam, but cannot be played, also the Chinese version was available for free download and online on mario.web.yymoon.com.

The game servers (International and China) were shut down in 2020, making the game unplayable on all platforms.

name: Bootleg Squadrog
summary:
“Bootleg Squadrog, sir. It is not about individualism. It is not about cowboy heroism. It is about being one cohesive unit. The only identity I have is that of a group identity.”

Bootleg Squadrog is a singler player map pack for Half-Life: Opposing Force, with squad-based and teamwork tactical scenarios.

name: BoostHead
summary: BoostHead is a party brawler for up to four players. Battle it out in arenas using special moves and power-ups. BoostHead is perfect for players of all skill levels and is the ultimate party game for those seeking a fun and exciting experience with friends.

name: Bom Bom Bombian
summary: Easy-to-use bomb action! Throw bombs and mine Bomcoin! Aim! Bomberhead Champion!

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Ultimate Edition
summary: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Bor Dungeon
summary: Smashing your way across dark dungeons with your huge hammer to destroy all your enemies and obtain legendary loots in this cute top-down action/platformer rpg.

name: BounceBash
summary: Grab small stars with the paddle for big bonuses! Snag big stars for awesome new powers that will help Dillo Bash even more! New worlds are revealed as you gain new powers - explore them all! Play to unlock new abilities, then mix and match any four to find your winning combination--over 11,000 combinations of power-ups to choose from!

name: Borefest
summary: "Why would you waste your time making this? Couldn't you have made something fun instead? Games are supposed to be fun..." - The Game Developer's Dad

name: Bomber-Mario
summary:
The classic Nintendo game meets bombs and castles in this fun Mario adventure.

This is a strategy game compared to the original Mario versions that you have likely played or seen. The goal of the game is to blow up the enemies that you see in each level. As Mario, you have access to several types of bombs. You can upgrade your bombs in the game as you gain experience. You'll start with smaller bombs that are used for the mediocre enemies before seeing the larger bombs that are meant to do significant damage to the larger enemies, especially those that come toward the end of the game.

name: Bonnie's Bookstore
summary: Bonnie's Bookstore is a word-puzzle game in the style of Bookworm. Help Bonnie in her career as a children's book author by stringing together letters to form words and score points. Play 50 levels inspired by classic fairy tales in either classic (untimed) or action (timed) play mode.

name: Bottle
summary: Bottle is a very short game in which you play as an alcoholic man of solitude.

name: Bone2.exe: Life After Death
summary: Bone2.exe is a sequel to Bone.exe. It is a fast paced precision platformer 2d side-scrolling shooter.

name: Bomb Bomb Bomb
summary: In this game, you control the Kitty to operate a cannon to fire various pellets to eliminate bricks that keep appearing. Sometimes, a big boss will spawn in the map, and it will spit out a lot of bricks, please try to defeat it. Gain new abilities by leveling up against enemies.

name: Bog Roll
summary: The year's 2020 and during the peak of Australia's lockdown there's a toilet roll (or bog roll) shortage. You play as Jim, who of course always leaves things to the last minute and forgot to stock up on bog rolls. Collect as many bog rolls as you on this whirlwind adventure!

name: Boxnauts
summary: Boxnauts is the thrilling 2.5D MOBA set on the planet of Muleer. Assemble your squad and engage in epic battles for domination, using your skills and strategy to outsmart your opponents. Join the fight now and become a legend in the Boxverse!

name: Bodycam
summary: Bodycam is an ultra-realistic multiplayer, first-person shooter game made using the latest technologies of the next-gen game engine Unreal Engine 5. Get ready to dive into fast-paced Bodycam actions, where every bullet counts and every choice can decide over the victory or loss of your team.

name: Boule Petanque
summary: Boule Petanque is a VR sports game that makes you play boules or pétanque or boccia. No matter what the weather is like, the sun always shines on the square in the game. In the relaxed atmosphere of a square that could be like this in the south of France, you can throw the jack and the balls. In single player mode you learn how to do it, in multi-player mode you can compete against other players. These can be friends or random players all over the world. Special is certainly the sound of the game: the birds twitter, the bullets bang and immediately you are in another world.

name: Bonds of Unity
summary: A fast-paced first-person shooter with parkour elements. Go all-out with 50+ different guns and tools or even create your own guns with the weapon editor. Combine your loadout with synergizing weapons to take down all sizes of enemies and to unite the fallen land of Utopia!

name: Bomb Buddies
summary: In Bomb Buddies, solve puzzles, crack codes, and test your dexterity with a friend...but watch out! Everything is not as it seems when a nefarious hacker gets involved. When the stakes are high can your skills still hold up to the test?

name: Bounda Forever
summary: A lovely style of painting rogue-like games. In the game you face a tide of enemies, defeat them, and survive. The game offers many weapons to help you win. No long story, no ending, any time you can be reckless to a game.

name: Bowmaster 2: Archery Tournament
summary: Bowmaster 2, the sequel to the immersive #1 worldwide hit archery game is finally here with a brand new free to play tournament! The Merry Five are back to reclaim the Bowmaster mantle so draw your bow, take aim and release your inner Robin Hood once again!

name: Bold Moves
summary:
What do you get when you combine match 3, word puzzles, and inspirational quotes? A match 3 made in heaven! Get your daily dose of positivity with Bold Moves; the positively relaxing (and challenging) match 3 word puzzle game.
Match 3 colors to collect letter tiles, break through obstacles, and solve the phrase to find inspiration from motivational quotes and positive affirmations. Earn rewards and boosters, progress through chapters of puzzles, and win limited-time events.

name: Bomber
summary:
A variety of the game Blitz, an earlier VIC-2 game which itself was an clone of Atari's arcade game Canyon Bomber. Gameplay has the player drop bombs over a city to clear an area that you can land.

Originally released as 'Bomb Buenos Aires', the game's theme was developed early in Jeff Minter's career, "intended as a tongue in cheek" response to the then ongoing Falkland Island, where buildings with small Argentinian flag's and the "Rule Britannia" play if the plane landed successfully. Written complaints and negative press would lead to the game quickly reissued and amended into "Bomber" or "City Bomb" as it's know today.

Bomber was one of the earliest games developed by Minter under Llamasoft.

name: Bouncy Hoops
summary:
Bounce, shoot, swish and slam the rock to become the king of the court in this high score arcade challenge!

Bouncy Hoops is a basketball game for all the street ballers and shot callers. The school yard ankle breakers and the downtown dagger shooters. No bricks allowed! Can you get on fire and beat your chump friends before the buzzer sounds? Step up and see.

name: Boyhood's End
summary: Boyhood's End is an adventure game following Giovanni, the boy with the lowest human score in the universe, and Campanella, the delinquent genius, and their journey on the galactic railroad regarding the "human" and "inhuman".

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Extended Edition
summary: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Bonfire and Tail
summary: Bonfire and Tail is a multiplayer action party game developed by avidya studio. Through the gameplay, we want to bring players back to childhood and have simple fun together. Draw a torch from the bonfire and ignite other players' tails! If your tail is on fire, wiggle it to put the fire out!

name: Bore Blasters
summary: Blast through rocks with your machine gun drill. Collect rare gems, ores and ancient artifacts, upgrade your ship and unlock new abilities. Uncover the mysteries of the deep and the dangers that lurk below.

name: Bow Hunter 2015
summary:
Bow Hunter 2015, V4.0, is the new updated and improved version of Bow Hunter with new Camoflage features, new more realistic deer scare effects, and full tournaments for Cash, Gold, and OBuck prizes! Lots of Updates and Improvements!
Bow Hunter 2015 is a realistic simulation of deer hunting with upright bows including detailed 3d terrains, stalking hunts, treestand hunts, and regular tournaments with real cash prizes for the winning bowmen.
In the Bow Hunter 2015 simulation, the player can hunt White Tail deer, Mule deer, and Black Tail deer over a larger terrains. Players can stalk their trophies or hunt from tree stands in detailed 3D terrains using all the techniques of real bow hunting including scents, calls, camouflage, special arrows, optics, and powerful bows of the player’s choice.
The deer in the simulation are easily spooked and will run quickly from the hunter if the hunter does not use the proper bow hunting techniques. The simulation contains over 200 hunts, with increasing difficulty, requiring better and better equipment, techniques, and hunting expertise.
Players can also qualify for monthly tournaments against other hunting enthusiasts to win real world prizes like gift cards to their favorite outdoor retailer, bows, arrows, and other bow hunting accessories.
The simulation will be updated monthly with new hunts, new challenges, new weapons, and new animals to hunt regularly.

name: Bounty Hunter
summary: "Bounty Hunter" is a card-based roguelite dungeon crawler. Navigate through various decks with enemies, traps and puzzles using guns, items and upgrades bought at a dive bar game hub that’s a front for a crime syndicate. Meet interesting characters, rise in guild ranks and experience the story.

name: Boyfriend to Death 2: Fresh Blood
summary: A sequel to Boyfriend to Death, focusing on new characters Vincent, Cain and Lawrence.

name: Boom!
summary: Boom! is a turn-based PvP battle game in pixel art with over 150 destructible battlefields, 200 characters to unlock, 75 original weapons, private arenas, and much more.

name: Boxed Tower: Actual Tower Defense
summary: Defend your tower against waves of enemies. Survive the horde.

name: B.O.W II VR
summary: In this, the exciting sequel to 'Bodies of Water VR', you will learn to cull lionfish, explore underwater cave systems, deep dive using tri-mix, as well as visit the artic circle, and more!!

name: Bonobros
summary: Bonobros is a simultaneous turn based strategy game when you play with your favorite streamers as pawns.

name: BoltBreak: Powers and Maps Pack
summary:
Get ready to go god mode with the new Powers and Maps Pack.

It adds 4 new maps and 5 new powers to the game with a wide range of environments and play styles.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe: Special Edition
summary: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Boom Boom Football
summary: Boom Boom Football requires an iPad 3 (or newer), iPhone 5 (or newer), or iPod Touch 6th Generation.

name: BossHunter VR
summary: BossHunter VR is the first version of the game where players will have to fight many interesting opponents, use multiple weapons, and a unique mechanic of its kind where the player directly commands a weapon to execute something with the help of speech. The hunt is on!

name: Bowling for Apples: A Special Apples to Ashes Episode
summary: Short non-canon episode of "Apples to Ashes"

name: Bot Crafter
summary: Construct, maintain, manage and upgrade the fleet of your space robots in this sandbox crafter. Gather resources, automate your base, develop new technologies and face the challanges of the foreign exoplanet. Use your engineering skills to survive, solve problems and conquere the New Home.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 1
summary: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 275 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: Box Dungeons
summary: Box Dungeons is a captivating puzzle game that draws inspiration from classic tabletop RPGs like Dungeons & Dragons and turn-based dungeon crawlers. Immerse yourself in a world of challenging puzzles and strategic gameplay as you navigate through intricate rooms filled with enemies and treasures.

name: Bottle: Pilgrim Redux
summary: Bottle: Pilgrim is a story of loss, regret and redemption, which reminds us that while we cannot change the things we have done, we can always learn from our mistakes.

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Combination Lessons
summary: Engage with BOT.vinnik, a witty Soviet AI chess instructor! His sharp humor and rigorous challenges will mold you into a pro. Dive into visually rich chess theories and intricate puzzles, all designed to boost your chess skills. Ready for the challenge?

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Late USSR Championships
summary: Miss me already, comrade? A wise human once said: "Attackers may sometimes regret bad moves, but it is much worse to forever regret an opportunity you allowed to pass you by." So don't let this one pass! Enroll Now and be prepared to learn from the real masters!

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Mid-Century USSR Championships
summary: We meet again, chess enthusiast comrade! If chess knowledge is what you seek, you have come to the right place. Let's see if you are worthy of standing on the shoulders of the soviet giants!

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Winning Patterns
summary: Attention, comrade! Registrations are open once again! The players submitted to my previous training showed significant improvement in chess skills when compared to the rest of the population, even the lazy ones. So what are you waiting for?? Enroll NOW by clicking on the purchase button!!

name: Bobble League
summary: Bobble League is an Activity developed by Discord. Work with your friends to control your Bobbles on a tabletop setting in an attempt to score on the other team’s goal. With an emphasis on strategy and teamwork, you will experience a range of emotions in Bobble League as you watch your decisions play out in real-time against the opposing team. Use various Power Plays to improve your odds of scoring.

name: Book 5 Untold
summary:
A free adult game based on "Legend of Korra". Game set on time after Korra opened spirit portal in republic city.

You play as Guru, who is supposed to train Korra to make her achieve Avatar State.

name: B.O.T.S.S.: Battle of the Solar System
Bounty Hunting Time
summary: At a tavern It is where adventurers come together to form a team to hunt for the bounty of monsters that are dangerous to humans. This is an Action Roguelite game where you build a team and develop a character that people like to swarm with monsters that will flock to your team to crush …or not

name: Bongus Bright-Eye & The Great Axe-Stravaganza
summary: Bongus Bright-Eye & The Great Axe-stravaganza is an homage to the classic Point & Click Adventure games. It's a comedy induced fantasy game, where you follow our protagonist Bongus Bright-Eye on his journey to save the Dwarven Kingdom.

name: Boys Tale
summary: Save the heroes of fairy tales! Sia's slightly erotic adventure story.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 2
summary: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 1
summary: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Boat Trip
summary: Drive a boat to earn coins and buy a new better boats. Live longer to earn bigger score.

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Premium Edition
summary: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: Boat Sim
summary:
Blast around in a cool speed boat, go sailing in a fishing boat or be the skipper of a large car ferry!
Boat Sim is a boat simulation you can enjoy anytime!
Enjoy a scenic bay in a virtual speed boat, alongside fishing boats, sailing and other motor boats with lots of scenery and various docks and cities to visit, or take out your fishing boat at night, or try your hand at driving a car ferry between multiple docks!
By design there's no objectives, no score to get, simply relax and enjoy your speed boat, fishing boat and now car ferry.

name: Bowling Crew
summary: Challenge your friends or play 1v1 matches with worthy opponents from all over the world. Bowling Crew is an excellent choice for bowling fans and a top-rated bowling game!

name: Born to Rise
summary: To complete Yridis' mission, you'll have to make your way through the bowels of a vast underground dungeon filled with unique environments, deadly dangers and mysterious beings. Jump, dash and give the enemies you encounter their due thanks to powerful weapons.

name: Bottle Empire
summary:
Bottle Empire is a board game where the goal is to create an empire of breweries and casinos. The game takes place in the 1920s during the prohibition era in America.
The mafia organization is your enemy and you have to withstand their attempts to prevent you from becoming the Kingpin of Bottles.

name: Boxbrawl Delivery
summary:
Welcome to Boxbrawl Delivery! Run n’ jump, grab n’ go, and haul n’ brawl with the best delivery service in the business!

Take the role of Carter, deliveryman for Zaplift, aiming to satisfy the town and score a good tip! With plenty of pests running amok (and with your co-worker Carrie watching over the inventory), it’s up to you to ensure your customers get their goods in one piece! Can you deliver on your promises, or will your customers’ ratings say otherwise?

name: Bounce & Roll
summary: Control and guide the ball through a series of obstacles, testing your skills and abilities in a 3D environment, either solo or with a friend.

name: Bombshell Barista: Speed Dating
summary: Bombshell Barista: Speed Dating ---This is an adult, size kink-themed dating sim for the Bombshell Barista series!

name: Boba Boyz
summary: This all-new video game musical centers around a bubble tea shop with a secret: their boba actually brings happiness to its customers! When the boys need a new employee after their last crew member mysteriously disappears, boba won't be the only thing you fall in love with.

name: Botanical Warden
summary: Botanical Warden is a tactical roguelike deckbuilder in which plants are used to fight strategic challenging turn-based combat. Evolve your plants with artificial selection and hybridization to create endless possibilities in your quest to defeat other tribes and conquer a barren island.

name: Bone Born
summary: Bone Born is Topdown, defense, casual and Co-op online game. make your skeleton with your friends and family to defend the infinity waves of demon enemies.

name: Boat Party
summary: Boat Party is a vibrant, four-player, competitive party game full of fun and unique games! Play with your friends, online or locally!

name: Bombard
summary: Bombard is a Block-Breaking Action game with Elemental Balls and Blocks.

name: Boomeraxe
summary: Who says a twin-stick shooter needs guns? Boomeraxe is a bullet hell dungeon crawler with a unique core mechanic: Your only weapon hurts you too.

name: Boreas
summary: You've been wandering the seas for years. It's time to think about the future. Trade, improve your settlements, build relationships with the locals. Build your own safe haven!

name: Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime
summary: Bonnie’s self-worth is at an all-time low, and there’s only one thing that can fix it - a lovely game of Frogtime! Grab your toadbag and get ready to go on a hilarious adventure full of quirky characters, explorable islands, and way too many frogs.

name: Bobo Bay
summary: Bobo Bay is a pet simulation game where you collect, mash(breed), accessorize, and train little creatures to compete in races and other competitions. You are able to feed your Bobo an old shoe which is kinda funny.

name: Bootlegger's Racing Story
summary: Step back in time to the roaring 1930s and immerse yourself in the high-stakes world of bootlegging during America's Prohibition era. Get ready to join John Hamerton, a retired car engineer and mechanic, as he embarks on a daring journey to save his house and pay off his tax debt.

name: Boxing Simulator
summary: Boxing Simulator is a 3D, Strategy, Simulator, Action, Fighter, Fist Fight, Boxing game.

name: Bouga Kyoukai
summary: In a mountainous town there is a serial murder case with all the victims' necks cut off and either heads or bodies taken away. Main character is a student from a parallel world who claims that his twin brother and sister heads got replaced in early childhood. Normalcy and absurd come together in this investigation.

name: BooM
summary: You can't play BooM... Boom plays you!

name: Boreal Tenebrae: Deluxe Definitive Edition
summary:
Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

You play as multiple characters, each with their own story, and travel to actual locations in town and dark versions of them.
In this nightmare, you have to solve the murder, search for your missing sister Sarah, and complete the mysterious ritual to save the dying town. Will you be able to unravel all the dark secrets of Boreal Tenebrae?

name: Bottle vs. Bullet
summary: Fun bottle shooting game in 3d modes! Bottle vs Bullet is a fun physics bottles shooting game. You must shoot as many bottles as you can in the fixed amount of time. A very addicted shooter game is out now on the market! Your challenge is to shoot bottle and can as fast as you can. And for each 10 combos get shot, a little extra time will be added.

name: Bouncers
summary: Bouncers is a single player retro styled action game that has you avoiding enemies to climb the leaderboard. The bouncer will bounce around the screen in random directions and multiply over time, but more enemies for example the asteroid will appear.

name: Boxes
summary: Welcome to Boxes, a nostalgic pixel art game that will put your puzzle-solving skills to the test! Embark on a delightful journey through over 100 mind-bending levels in this charming and addictive box-pushing adventure.

name: Borderlands 3: Designer's Cut
summary: Borderlands 3 gets even bigger with the Director's Cut add-on content! Test your mettle against the most fearsome of all Varkids, scour the galaxy to solve a string of murders, experience never-before-seen content and insights from the creation of Borderlands 3, and earn rewards with three new Vault Cards featuring themed loot and powerful gear.

name: Bobls
summary: Bobls is a precise and bouncy 2D retro platformer. Complete the story through the single player or unique two-player campaign, create and play levels made by the community through the level editor used by the developers themselves.

name: Bonfire Kingdom
summary: Bonfire Kingdom is a cosy city builder mixed with RPG elements in a dark medieval fantasy world - like a hauntingly beautiful German fairy tale. Superior enemies are creeping out of the darkness. Protect your village by leading your band of loyal knights into battle.

name: Boomer: Beyond Vanilla
summary: Limit-removing Doom 2 WAD, focused on action, adventure and exploration, featuring a brand new MIDI soundtrack inspired by classic shooters' music.

name: Boaty McBoatwad
summary: 16 boat themed maps

name: Border Bots VR
summary:
Border Bots VR is puzzle simulation set on a future earth where AI is in control. As a human border agent, you begin a new role as a booth operator at an AI travel border. Interact and check over a variety of robots as they try to get through security. Some of their credentials might not be up to scratch, its up to you to make sure they get the stamp of approval.

Analyse Documents

Step into the booth as a border control agent and swiftly process robots by analysing their documents for discrepancies, oddities, undeclared modifications and contraband!

Booth and Apartment Upgrades

Earn credits through challenging gameplay to purchase booth upgrades to keep yourself ahead of the competition. You can also spend your credits on apartment customisations and bring your space to life!

Quirky Robots!

Meet and interact with a variety of quirky robots at the booth and in your apartment! Come face-to-face with sentient appliances as you discover more about their newfound consciousness and colourful personalities.

Variety of Gadgets

Use a variety of tactile gadgets in VR to examine robots at the booth. You'll need different tools for inspection including a 3D printer, Contraband Detector, Stun Gun, Barcode Scanner and much more.

name: Bomberman Tower
summary: A Modernized rogue-lite Bomberman fan game inspired by Pocket Bomberman!

name: Bot Crisis
summary: A funny 3D online game where you must identify real players from a group of bots. Don't forget to act as a bot yourself!

name: Botsu
summary: Fight your friends in hilarious sandbox sports: Boxball, Sumo Survival, and Stockpile. Wrestle your way to victory online or split-screen in unique matches. Unlock outrageous outfits and pull off awesome moves to flex your skills!

name: Bomber Party
summary: Experience an explosive and nerve-wracking adventure! Eliminate other players, strategically use bombs, collect power-ups, and survive to earn trophies. The first player to reach the required number of trophies wins the game. Are you ready to triumph as the last survivor? Let's go!

name: Boyscout: Patrick's Town
summary: Boyscout is a top-down adventure in which you play as Patricio, a little boy who is learning to help his neighbors while his father is trying to grow his own business in a rural town. One day, an unusual event will change the lives of the locals forever.

name: Boaty Tanks
summary: Embark on an aquatic adventure! Control a small boat, armed with weapons, and navigate arenas. Battle enemy pool floats, test your skills, and immerse yourself in thrilling boat combat. Survive challenging fights and show off your shooting skills!

name: Boffin 2
summary: Sequel of Boffin. The gameplay it's the same but with new caverns to explore.

name: Bot Arena 3
summary:
Build a team of bots by following the instructions in the game. Each bot is composed of a chassis, plating, and weapon. After purchasing the items; first mount the plating to the chassis. Second mount the weapon to the plating. You can purchase more than one bot. Once you have built your team, click start battle to choose your tournament.
Better chassis, plating, and weapon upgrades will be available as you advance through the tournament. During battle you can click and drag your bot to the desired location.

name: Boom Arena
summary: Boom Arena is free to play, real time, head-to-head strategy game. Test your combat skills against players from all around the world! Available on Android and IOS.

name: Book of Hours: Perpetual Edition DLC
Bomb Rush Cyberfunk: Base & Jay
summary: Two new writers, Base and Jay, are coming in from out of town to support the BRC crew.

name: Bowling by Jason Belmonte
summary: An online player vs player mobile bowling game.

name: Bounce Shot
summary:
Bounce Shot is the family-friendly version of the popular college game!

Players take turns attempting to throw ping pong balls into their opponent’s cups, making them disappear. The first player or team to remove all their opponent’s cups wins.

But there’s a twist…

Bounce shots can remove two cups in one go, but also allow the defending player the chance to swat the ball away.

From the same folks who brought you the critically-acclaimed, Eleven Table Tennis, this game is simple to learn but deceptively challenging to master. Use the motion controllers to adjust the speed and angle of your throw to outthink and bluff your opponent.

And trust us on this one… that delicious chime in your brain when you sink a perfect arcing shot into an opponent’s cup never gets old.

Bounce Shot is a game suitable for all ages and skill levels, even those who are brand-new to VR. Want your grandparents (or your grandchildren) to have their first crack at virtual reality? This is the perfect game to introduce them to the experience.

name: Bounce House
summary: Knock the others off!

name: Boaty Tanks 2
summary: Get ready for exciting naval combat with Boaty Tanks 2! Take control of a small boat as you navigate through various biomes, armed with your trusty weapons. But be warned - enemy ships are out to get you!

name: BoxFight
summary: Made for fans of retro arcade games and newcomers alike, BoxFight is a fast-paced shooter game in which you must weave between the waves of enemies that come your way by rotating around the playing field, shooting them as you go in order to survive as long as possible inside of The Box!

name: Bounce on Back
summary: Jump back into the action with the sequel to the critically acclaimed Bounce On 2! Bounce On Back puts you in control of Bounce - a red, rubber ball - as he tries to rid Apricot Smiles Day Care Center of a terrible evil. Roll, jump, and bounce to fight against Voodoo, a doll of great magical power that steals happiness from the children. Collect giggles to weaken his power and progress through the world.

name: Bourgeois Megawad
summary: Bourgeois Megawad, also known as Bourgeois Deathmatch, is a 30-map vanilla and Unity compatible megawad created in 2021 by Decay, Adam Post (Doomkid), and Razgriz. All of the maps are playable in singleplayer, co-op and deathmatch.

name: Boundary: Elite Cosmetic Bundle Founders Pack
summary:
This Elite Cosmetic Bundle Founders Pack contains exclusive items.
In dedication to those who engineered and built the Space Elevator, allowing Low Earth Orbit travel a reality. The Engineer Pack for Astroperator Fort contains an unique look specific to her.

name: Box To The Beat VR: Shadow Dreams Pack
summary: Unleash your inner champion with the "Shadow Dreams Pack" DLC for our boxing rhythm game. Immerse yourself in 40+ minutes of intense progressive death metal tracks made from Khosouf studio founder's original album.

name: Boom Boom Volleyball
summary: In this beach-volley game you'll be playing with a bomb instead of a ball don't drop it on your side!

name: Bocchi the Smash!
summary: Bocchi the Smash! is a fan game of Bocchi the Rock! made by DCinside Bocchi the Rock Gallery.

name: BomBliss
summary: The first version of BomBliss, released alongside Tetris 2 in Japan.

name: Bomb Up
summary:
Bomb Up is a fast-paced one-button game.

You are constantly falling down. Press a button to fire a bomb and press it again to explode it. Score points by destroying all the red squares within the radius of its explosion. The explosion will bounce you up and to the side and you will turn around when you hit a wall.

The game is over when a red square hits you.

name: Boosted
summary: This work is equipped with a "lead walk system" in which the story develops according to the passage of time and the distance traveled! The real world and the game work together to solve mysteries by waiting for time to pass, moving with your character, and making important choices. Aim to clear the game by squeezing the functions and wisdom of Apple Watch!

name: Boggle
summary: Test your knowledge of the English words in a mobile version of the popular puzzle game of Hasbro company! Create groups of randomly dropped letters on the dice words, the longer will be the word and the sooner you will form it, the more points you will get. The game has 4 different modes: classic, arcade, in which to go to the next level you should get a certain score, a game against time and a game to play with your friend. The game is not only good for your intellect and vocabulary, but also has simple controls, beautiful graphics and nice sound. Detailed statistics and results table will allow you to see the words that you have made, as well as those you have missed. This will help you to be much luckier next time!

name: Borderlands Collection: Pandora's Box
summary:
For the first time ever, get all six Borderlands adventures together in one mayhem-fueled package, all at an incredible value!

Includes all six acclaimed base games from the Borderlands franchise: Borderlands, Borderlands 2, Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, Tales from the Borderlands, Borderlands 3, and New Tales from the Borderlands, as well as all of their add-on content, in one giant bundle.

name: Bounce Trials
summary: Patience and timing are key Bounce Trials, where you are a perptually bouncing ball that bounces through levels to reach a goal. Your only influence over the ball is to move either left or right. Compete against the clock and earn Gold, Silver, and Bronze rewards based on your completion time.

name: Boing Bang Adventure
summary: Boing Bang Adventure is a 2D arcade game in the style of the classic arcade game "Pang" Face more than 40 levels, divided in 7 different areas in single player or in local co-op!

name: Bowave
summary: An addictive game in which the player takes on the role of an elite archer who is tasked with protecting the tower from the onslaught of enemies.

name: Bomb Jack
summary:
A conversion of the coin op game with 60 stages and 3 levels of difficulty.

Jack is a tiny but explosive character whose dynamism will take your breath away! From platform to platform he is trying hard to light the bombs which will bring him a lot of points, super bonuses and lives. But this won't be easy for his enemies are numerous and they may transform astoundingly in order to be better able to catch him. A captivating challenge for young and old!

name: Bomber Crew: Skin Pack
summary: Need a new look for your Bomber, but about to send your Crew off for another perilous run? Don’t fear, the Bomber Skin Pack is here!

name: Bounty Hunters
summary: Fight in a top down 2d shooter adventure with resource gathering / bullet heaven/hell mechanics.

name: Boyfriend Exorcist
summary: You were meant to exorcise the ghost, not flirt with him! Choose your soulmate from ghost enthusiasts – dead or alive – and unravel the conspiracy lurking beneath the haunting in this exorcist dating sim.

name: Bokura no Keshigomu Otoshi 3 + Special Set
Bobble Bash
summary: It is a tabletop point collection game, where players bash their way between obstacles to score and win. Think shuffleboard meets bumper cars. Apart of Discord's in-game activity collection.

name: BobsleighX
summary: You will feel the thrill of speed in the BobsleighX.

name: Border Clash
summary: Border Clash is a tactical, simultaneous turn-based, multiplayer strategy game where you manage resources, research technologies, build an army and invade countries to expand your territory. Defeat various AI opponents or challenge your friends to an epic 6-player FFA battle.

name: Botanical Chronicle
summary: Discover a third-person adventure as a robot seeking the last traces of life! Technology morphed into nature! Explore, unravel secrets paths, and escape dark forces of this mysterious landscape. Rivers, rocks, bushes seamlessly merging into digital realm and try to stop you!

name: Bouncer 2
summary: A Scott Evans Net Yaroze game.

name: Booze Masters: Freezing Moonshine
summary: Freezing Moonshine is a unsettling first-person adventure game with elements of plant cultivation, puzzles, and lots of high-proof beverages. To survive, you'll need to gather harvests, take photos, and craft a wide variety of spirits.

name: Bowser Jr.'s Journey
summary:
A new story added in Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story + Bowser's Journey. This new addition to the main story sees Bowser Jr. as the titular character. While Bowser is occupied during the main story, this story sees Bowser Jr. on an adventure to cure the blorbs himself after it causes numerous minions to balloon up to an immobile state.

Different from its predecessor (Minion Quest: The Search for Bowser, included in Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions), it doesn't need to be accessed from within Bowser's Inside Story.

name: Bomb Jack
summary: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one. This sounds easy, right? Wrong! Making Jack's task difficult are numerous enemies such as birds, mummies, turtles, and orbs. In each round, collecting a number of bombs results in a bonus coin appearing, and collecting this coin will make the player's score increase 2 to 4 times. More often than not, the "power ball" appears, and when you collect this, you can defeat enemies and have more time to collect all the bombs. There is also the "E" coin, which gives Jack one additional life, but rarely does this coin appear. The more you progress through the game, the more difficult it becomes, as enemies travel more quickly to get you.

name: Bomb Jack
summary: The player controls Jack, a superhero who can leap and glide. Someone has planted 24 bombs at famous tourist sites (the Sphinx and Great Pyramids, the Acropolis, Neuschwanstein Castle in Bavaria, and two cityscapes resembling Miami Beach and Hollywood, which appear only as screen backgrounds rather than unique game locations). Jack must fly around the screen to collect the bombs. Each screen uses a different configuration of platforms upon which Jack may run and jump. Eventually, the levels reoccur a number of times with increasing difficulty. Jack "defuses" the bombs by simply touching them. As soon as he has touched the first, he triggers a sequence in which another bomb's fuse lights up, and so on. A player can score a bonus in each round by touching 20 or more bombs in the correct lit-fuse sequence. Jack may also defuse an unlit bomb by touching it, but this impedes his opportunity to score the bonus for that screen. It also delays the appearance of the game's bonuses and power-ups. The C64 conversion uses a cover of Jean-Michel Jarre's Magnetic Fields Pt. 2 as in-game music.

name: Bomb Jack
summary: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one.

name: Bomb Jack

The more you progress through the game, the more difficult it becomes, as enemies travel more quickly to get you.

name: Bomb Jack
summary: In Bomb Jack, the player controls Jack, who must collect all the bombs in order to complete the current round and go onto the next one.

name: Bomb Jack
summary: Bomb Jack is an arcade platform game that was released in 1984 by Tehkan (known today as Tecmo). It was followed by two official sequels, the console and computer title Mighty Bomb Jack, and the arcade game Bomb Jack Twin and Bomb Jack II, which was licensed for home computers only. The highest known score was by Mr G Jones from London: 6 746 800. Bomb Jack is a hero who can perform high jumps and float in the air. His goal is to collect all red bombs on the screen. The game's antagonists are enemies such as birds and mummies which, once they drop in the bottom of the screen, can morph into things like flying saucers and orbs that float around the screen, making Jack lose a life if he touches them. Collecting bombs will increase the bonus meter at the top of the screen (collecting lit bombs increases it more). When the meter is completely filled up, a circular bouncing "P" appears, and when collected, it will turn all the enemies into bonus coins for a short period during which Jack may collect them. Other similar bonuses are the B (Bonus) which increases the score multiplier (up to 5x), the E (Extra) which gives an extra life, and the rare S (Special), which awards a free game. There are five different screens in the game, each featuring a distinct scheme of platforms (the fifth has no platforms at all). There is a special bonus for collecting 21 or more lit bombs in a row, out of the 24 bombs of each round.
