name: Boundless Paths
summary: A tower-defense roguelike with an emphasis on exploration - reveal monster paths, bonus resources, and sites to place towers. Tackle unique quests and unlock new options across endless procedurally generated maps!

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Import Modified Pack 1
summary: This Import Modified Pack includes (2) Modified Import type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars. The Modified Imports are drag cars in between street cars and race cars and include engine swaps for import engines.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 3
summary: This Outlaw Pack includes (2) Outlaw type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 275 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars.

name: Bozalleth's Curse
summary: Nightmares that wake you up in cold sweat. The world of dreams hides secrets and your sins. The game 'Bozalleth's Curse' tells you the story of Mary, who had an unfortunate accident eight years ago.

name: Bombabomb!
summary: Bombabomb! is a by old pre-installed games inspired game, where you light the bombs with matching neighbors to detonate them. The game is only complete when all the bombs have been detonated! When you say you can remove all the bombs easily, walk the talk!

name: Box Head: Zombies Must Die!
summary:
Fight endless waves of zombies in Box Head

Experience the ultimate post-apocalyptic survival in Box Head a thrilling 3D action roguelike game.

Join the battle against relentless zombie hordes. Arm yourself with a vast arsenal of weapons and survive the apocalypse.

name: Bob the Elementalist
summary: The magical power of the elements is our last hope for survival! Master the four elements in this indie puzzle platforming challenge.

name: Bob's Mansion
summary: Bob's Mansion is a First-Person, Survival Horror, Adventure game where you use your skills to Run, Hide, Fight and Survive the darkness within your family home.

name: Born In Reverie
summary: Experience Dani and the Guardians' story as they defend their home from the Beasts. Delve deep into the mountains to fight the beastly scourge, explore Dani's peculiar dreams, and discover the reason to keep moving forward.

name: Boxman
summary: A friend in need and the fate of multiple worlds sitting on one small cardboard box’s tiny shoulders, luckily this box came with a hero inside and a lot of packing peanuts! Join BOX as they jump, grab and swing across multiple chapters all in the name of friendship!

name: Bombastic Land
summary: Blast your way through dungeons in a Rogue-Lite Retro style, fighting slimes and bosses! Expand your home, populate the land, take care of your garden, go fishing with bombs and race your Kart until the wheels fall off!

name: Borussia Dortmund Club Football
summary: Borussia Dortmund Club Football is a club-specific edition of Codemasters’ football simulation series, designed to deliver an immersive experience tailored to fans of Borussia Dortmund. Players compete in a faithful replica of Signal Iduna Park, complete with authentic kits, chants, and crowd atmospherics. The game includes multiple modes such as Domestic Season, European Super League, and Custom Tournaments, and features a player editor that lets fans insert themselves into the squad.

name: Borussia Dortmund Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: Bomb Boat
summary: Cute maze game with a yellow blob.

name: Bowser's Valley
summary: This is a Super Mario World ROM hack done in the style of Super Mario Bros. 3, with some visuals and audio borrowed from other games. The story is similar to those found in other Mario games, with the princess being kidnapped by Bowser and taken to his island named Bowser's Valley, and it being up to Mario to rescue her.

name: Bomb Crossing
summary: The monster has captured the maids. Dear brothers, please act urgently! Use bombs as weapons to blow up all the monsters guarding you to save these lovely maids.

name: Boykisser Mayhem
summary: After being sucked inside of the internet, Boyfriend has to face another dead meme again, it's Boykisser! They shall both get into a rap fight to see who is the ultimate Boykisser!

name: Boobs
summary: You need to help Boobs! Boobs is an alien on the planet Kerflunkydunk. Now, on Earth, Boobs might be a funny name, but on Kerflunkydunk, lots of aliens are named Boobs. It's like Earth's equivalent of "George." But NASA heard that there might be boobs in space, so all the astronauts are eager to see boobs (all the men astronauts, that is), not realizing they're not women's boobs, but our little alien friend named Boobs. Your job as Boobs is to shoot down enemy rockets coming down the Van Doozy Corridor, the tunnel near Kerflunkydunk (enemy being Earth.) But beware of the falling stars and other aliens! How many rockets can Boobs shoot down?

name: Borderlands Triple Pack
summary: Shoot and loot as you explore the mayhem-filled world of Borderlands across all three critically acclaimed games! Experience the award-winning FPS-RPG series, including the mayhem of Borderlands, Handsome Jack's rise to power in Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel, and his reign as maniacal Hyperion CEO in Borderlands 2. The Triple Pack contains bazillions of guns and trademark cooperative gameplay, complete with all previously sold add-on content! The Full Borderlands Experience You Know And Love: Includes the return of dynamic co-op, gazillions upon gazillions of weapons, character customizations, skill tree progression, surprise cameos, and much more! Hundreds Of Hours Of Gameplay: Includes campaign add-ons, playable character packs, level cap upgrades, and assorted combat arenas previously sold as downloadable content for all three titles, plus dozens of character customizations! Gun Lust: Choose from a nearly endless arsenal of weapons, each with their unique manufactures, specifications and advantages. A revolutionary new content generation system produces almost infinite tools of destruction!

name: Bonza Phrases
summary:
This word puzzle game celebrates proverbs, idioms, and figures of speech that have become part of everyday language.

Join the pieces to complete the phrase, it's a piece of cake!
From the makers of Bonza Word Puzzle.

"Bonza puzzles are instantly addictive!" - Will Shortz, Crossword Editor, The New York Times

Bonza Phrases is a casual word puzzle game for mobile. Players will appreciate the clear and simple approach, suitable for the whole family.

name: Bobblehead Baseball
summary:
Bobblehead Baseball is Andamiro’s newest video redemption game and first licensed title from MLB Players Inc., a subsidiary of the MLBPA.

The new “videdemption” game pits arcade gamers against the bobble-headed avatars of MLB’s biggest stars in this fast-action,

wholesome video game that awards tickets.

The novel game has three adjustable difficulty levels (easy, normal and hard) and its pitchers are programmed to throw fastballs,

curveballs or changeups.

There are seven outfield targets that players can hit or need to avoid.

Aim for the targets with points to accumulate tickets or hit the letters to spell G-R-A-N-D—S-L-A-M to win the Super Bobblehead Bonus.

But try to avoid hitting the out markers – three outs end the game, naturally.

Players apply hand-eye coordination to time their swings and accurately aim the ball.

name: Bootleg Steamer
summary: Bootleg Steamer is a top down tactical trading game. Using a ship to smuggle alcohol, earn steep profits while evading authorities. Invest earnings to hire more crew and purchase upgrades. Create criminal contacts to improve your operation with the goal of accruing a massive fortune.

name: Bold Moves+
summary:
What do you get when you combine match 3, word puzzles, and inspirational quotes? A match 3 made in heaven! Get your daily dose of positivity with Bold Moves+, the positively relaxing (and challenging) match 3 word puzzle game.
Match 3 colors to collect letter tiles, break through obstacles, and solve the phrase to find inspiration from motivational quotes and positive affirmations. Earn rewards and boosters, progress through chapters of puzzles, and win limited-time events.

name: Bob the Builder
summary: Bob the Builder is a licensed PS2 game that uses characters and art from the popular UK children TV show 'Bob the Builder'. The game was released bundled with the Eye Toy and it is central to game play. In between clips from the tv show the player hits on screen buttons via the motion control to play. For example hitting left right or jump to navigate an ATV down a country road. Cleaning the vehicles by waving your arms over their on screen position, and nailing sawing and drilling by similar methods.

name: Bouken Shounen Club Gahou
summary: You play as 10 year old boy Tokio who lives in a typical, small Japanese town during the Showa period (1950s). Tokio spends 30 days walking through the town, talking to people, and collecting items. The game lets you experience a bygone period of Japan.

name: Bouken-Ou Beet: Darkness Century
summary: Bouken-Ou Beet: Darkness Century is a Role-Playing game, developed by Shade and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Boukoku no Aegis 2035: Warship Gunner
summary: Boukoku no Aegis 2035: Warship Gunner is a movie tie-in video game for the Japanese live-action summer film, Boukoku no Aegis. Harutoshi Fukui, the author of the base novel, personally planned the screenplay for Boukoku no Aegis 2035. The game presents an original sequel to this continuity which has not been referenced in his other works.

name: Boku ha Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero Narita
Boku ha Koukuu Kanseikan: Airport Hero Shinchitose
Bonzala
summary: The idea is to collect all the hearts to complete the game. You will need to use the swing bridges which are operated by letting your flyer coast over the top of the black and yellow spinning discs, whereupon it will stop and your sideways direction controls will then operate the bridge. To leave the spinning disc, just press the forward button and your flyer will then be on it's way again.

name: Born to Fight
summary: A 1- to 2-player military combat battle game where players use optical machine guns to shoot on-screen enemies.

name: Bolt: Be-Awesome Edition
summary:
In Bolt, players take on the heroic personas of the TV star dog, Bolt, and his owner, Penny, from the high-action television series featured within the film. As Bolt, players can use his superpowers, including laser vision and his superbark, which sends out a sonic blast to devastate opponents, and as Penny, players utilize stealth, hacking skills and a wheelbar, inspired by her scooter seen in the movie, to outwit enemies. The Nintendo DS version of the game will include competitive and co-op multiplayer, mini games as well as DGamer, Disney Interactive Studios' innovative new technology that provides a fun, connected game community for Disney video game fans. Star as Bolt and Penny in over 30 action-packed missions. Fire up Bolt's super powers to defeat enemies. Fly into action with Penny's wheel bar.

The Be-Awesome edition comes with 5 bonus missions!

name: Boogeyman 3
summary: Carrying a flashlight and water pistol, you must navigate a haunting bedroom to survive each nightmarish encounter. Utilise strategic defence, resource management, and cunning tactics to survive each night.

name: Boobytales
summary: A doujin 1v1 fighting game featuring several animal characters, created with 2D Fighter Maker '95. The version available online is labelled "Test Version +", but is unfinished. Most of the fighters are playable, but some (Byufero, Tarshow & Need) are unfinished.

name: Bomber
summary: A puzzle game for the Uzebox.

name: Boots and Daggers
summary: How much coin can you grab before time runs out?

name: Boil Noodles at Night
summary: Late night noodle aquisition and cooking simulator.

name: Box Ninja
summary: The ninja is trying to get to the door, but there are some annoying boxes in the way. Good thing this ninja has some crazy powerful legs! Those boxes need to be taught a lesson, so it is time to push, kick and break some boxes!

name: Bounty City: 3-Way Battle
summary: Bounty City is a multiplayer VR FPS game developed with a unique core concept of a three-way battle. It features diverse scenarios that require intense strategic gameplay.

name: Bohnice: Within the Mind
summary: Explore the dark secrets of a closed psychiatric hospital in Prague, Bohnice, as a determined journalist. Uncover chilling experiments, gruesome tortures, and paranormal encounters. Collect clues and photographs to reveal the horrifying truth hidden for 40 years.

name: Borderlands 3: Director's Cut
summary: Director's Cut is the second "upgrade pack" released for Borderlands 3, including behind-the-scenes content and additional missions and items.

name: Bog Man Has Had Enough
summary:
Bog Man is tired of the noise up above and is ready to do something about it with the help of his faithful axe and trusty shotgun.
A 10-15 minute long Copper map about ascending from the bog and silencing the evil above.

name: Boki: The Summit
summary: Boki is a Metroidvania, Choose your own adventure, Precision platformer in which you play as a young mountain goat, who must climb a mountain in seek of revenge. Dodge, battle and fluidly maneuver through several uniquely crafted areas and biomes and uncover the secrets of a tyrannical kingdom.

name: Board Games
summary: Presenting the "Timeless Board Game Bundle" - a delightful compilation of three iconic and universally cherished board games that have stood the test of time.

name: Bottles to the Ground
summary:
Duke is at home watching TV and enjoying a few beers, not letting himself being distracted by the explosions that can be heard outside - if that's a new
alien attack going on, it can always wait until his movie is finished. Not feeling ready for some action quite yet and satisfyingly wallowed on his couch, Duke lets his empty beer can fall to the ground and extends his arm to grab a new one - wait a second. No, there really isn't any beer can left in his reach. 'Damn', he mutters, as he struggles against his own will of staying immobile and letting things happen in a purely nihilistic kind of fashion, to drag himself off the couch to the kitchen fridge as a desperate attempt to sustain his now instinctive alcoholic needs. But just as he opens the door, a traumatizing surprise awaits him...

name: BobSP Series
summary: A collection of all 5 Bobsp maps (Bobsp1-4 + x)

name: Border Town
summary: The aliens have set up shop in a mine next to the town and Duke needs to get in there and flush them out.

name: Bounce Ball Blitz
summary: Master precision and conquer challenging levels in this addictive 2D basketball platformer. Aim, bounce, and score your way to the top!

name: Bounce Touch
summary: Bounce Touch is a part of Nokia’s Bounce series of games. It is a 3D platformer. Released for Symbian S60 3rd, 5th Edition & Symbian^3. For N97, It comes pre-installed on the XpressMusic 5800.

name: Bockito
summary: In Bockito you'll have to fight against a horde of hostile pine cones and other enemies. To do this, equip yourself with different items, learn abilities and combine them into different builds to survive.

name: Bottle Can Float
summary: Bottle Can Float is a relaxing casual game. In the game, you will select a bottle to go down the river. It will float freely along the flowing water. You can do You can influence the direction of the bottle by throwing small stones, and there are different small animals hidden in the river. You can make rafting more interesting by looking for these contents. I hope you can relax and have fun in the sound of gurgling water.

name: Boost Beginner
summary: This game is a modified version of Cave Story, and is targeted at players who have played around with the original and are more experienced.

name: Boyard
summary: Very puzzle-oriented. Collect six letters for the exit password while opening doors in a fort.

name: Body Count
summary: Embark upon a cop's gripping journey of vengeance through this bullet hell shooter.

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Click or Treat
summary: The "Click or Treat" DLC serves as an expansion to the base game, introducing a new island within the HUB area. This island will feature portals leading to three spooky-themed levels, each with a unique gameplay focus.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Pro Mod Pack 3
summary: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Bomber Party: Anime Avatars
summary: Give your Bomber Party profile a unique touch with the Bomber Party Anime Avatars DLC! This DLC includes 199 anime avatars, consisting of 100 anime boys and 99 anime girls, perfect for serving as profile pictures. Infuse your individual style and love for anime aesthetics into your player profile.

name: Bomber Party: Cute Anime Creatures Avatar
summary: Add an enchanting touch to your Bomber Party profile with the free Bomber Party Cute Anime Creatures Avatar DLC! This DLC includes 91 adorable anime creature avatars that infuse a magical and playful atmosphere into your player profile.

name: Boombot
summary: Boombot is a physics-based puzzle game where players are tasked with guiding the titular character through diverse levels using explosives. The game requires players to strategically position and explode bombs to propel Boombot towards the exit, all the while steering clear of obstacles and pitfalls.

name: Boom Stick in the Mud
summary: An unapologetically brown new map. Hellspawn have overrun UAC's high tech sewage treatment plant. Now feces and piss pour out of the compound at a supernatural rate. It's up to DoomGuy to clear out the facility before the entire world is covered in excrement.

name: Boons & Burdens
summary: Boons & Burdens is a single player action-roguelike set in the depths of hell. Battle hordes of demons through 13 levels, collect gems to purchase powerful boons, and choose from deadly burdens that alter the game's difficulty. Will you be the paragon of power or the architect of your own defeat?

name: BoneField: Bodycam Horror
summary: Bonefield, Montana. You’re a PI hired to look into a whistleblower report, but the horrors lurking in this town are worse than expected. Experience bodycam horror, survive against relentless stalkers, find weapons to keep them back. Survive long enough to complete your investigation - and get out.

name: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon
summary: Boba Bar: Bubble Tea Tycoon is a Kawaii themed pixel art game where you start your journey with a humble drink stand. Learn new recipes and unlock new equipment and locations, manage sales prices and inventory in order to succeed in becoming the largest bubble tea tycoon in town!

name: BoltBreak 2
summary: Become the ultimate superhero in the first-ever open-world speedster game.

name: Boxing School: Solo Career Mode
summary: In Boxing School: Solo Career Mode you become a boxer in the 80s. You train, you fight and climb the ranks. Play your own career story from beginner to star. This new expansion puts you into the shoes of a rookie boxer trying to survive.

name: BoohaBlox: Arcade
summary: BoohaBlox Arcade: is a Pixel-art puzzle game inspired by /Puzzle League/Panel de Pon/Tetris Attack/ games. This Arcade version is fully free, and offers the full package of the arcade mode, with 3 game modes: Marathon, Timed, and Endless!

name: Bowser's Revenge 3
summary:
Just a normal standard hack. A bit shorter than the previous games, with this one only having 5 worlds?

Anyway lots of custom stuff in this hack. Music, sprites, graphics and stuff.

name: Bowser's Revenge
summary: A romhack for SMW with 67 exits

name: Bowser's Revenge 2
summary: This is just a regular standard hack, and it's about what you could expect from Standard: Hard and have 68 exits.

name: Boost Buddies
summary: Boost Buddies is a hardcore action reflex game. Test yourself in this deceptively cute challenge and reach the top of leaderboards!

name: Boxing Legend
summary: Welcome to Boxing Legend! Jump in an immersiv, real world based Simulation. Create and build up your character from a nobody to the undisputed champion of the world and further, if you got what it takes obviously...

name: Bowmen
summary: Bowmen followed the trend that began in the early 90s of offering simple games with nude images, although in this case with naively “spicy” scenes. Released in 1994, it is a psychedelic game of skill, in which the story of a somewhat “peeping tom” boy, who is converted into a kind of angel by divine grace, is shown as an introduction.

name: Bolt Action Stealth
summary: Steady your aim. Silence is your cover. Exterminate from afar with realistic gun mechanics and long-range bullet physics in this suspenseful, first-person, alien-eradicating sniper puzzle game.

name: Boxy Boy
summary: The player controls the character "Rabi-Kun", and must push various crates over the yellow dots in order to complete the game's fifty-five stages (divided into five "worlds") in that stage's time limit. Rabi-Kun can only push the crates, and he cannot pull them; and should one of the crates reach an unmoveable position, the player may simply push the "reverse" button to undo one of the player's moves. Should Rabi-Kun be trapped in an area and cannot get out, the player must push the "reset" button on the control panel, however this will not reset the timer; and should that timer reach zero, the game will be immediately be over.

name: Borderline Enigma
summary: Our Empire is spreading thin through the galaxy. Your responsibility is to assist your comrades on our newly founded colony. Keep your station operational at all cost. Your pivotal role may shape destiny. And don't forget: Humanity Above All!

name: Bonez
summary: Dive into the most bone-rattling card game in town! Outwit opponents, play Power Cards, & race to reach 21 without busting. Spice things up with strategic bets & win 3 rounds to become the ultimate champion! Every draw counts so shuffle the deck, place your bets, & join the Bonez revolution now!

name: Bounties of Babylon
summary: A tabletop-inspired game about expanding the world, harvesting its bounties, and then trading them to outwit your opponent.

name: Bobos FunZone
summary: Step into the haunting realm of Bobo's Funzone, in this horror/puzzle adventure. Your mission: find your daughter, who was attending a birthday party here. Navigate the eerie corridors, unearth what happend, and be careful and cautious as Bobo is about.

name: Bondman of Traps
summary: Bondman of Traps is a challenging survival obstacle course game. There is no limit to dying in this game. Solve the traps, improve your reflexes, and pass through them one by one. Traps will harm you and cause you to start over. Either you become a prisoner of traps or the master of traps...

name: Boris
summary: A hack by Sockbat Replica with 52 exits. It took about a year to finish.

name: Born of Bread: Baker Edition
summary:
Born of Bread is a wacky and joyful RPG Adventure, revisiting turn-based combat tropes.
Play as Loaf, a flour-golem discovering this enchanting world full of humor, along with a colorful cast of buddies.

The Baker Edition includes:
- Born of Bread
- Digital Artbook & OST

name: Boom! Buster
summary: An adrenaline rush is part of a balanced breakfast. Boom! Buster keeps you on your toes with fast paced panic inducing gameplay featuring an over-the-top cartoony art style and soundtrack reminiscent of the early 2000s.

name: Boundless Skies
summary: Skybound is an adrenaline-pumping 2D platformer that challenges players to conquer the sky. With precise controls, and perilous obstacles, this game offers an experience where timing and skill determine success. players embark on a journey navigating intricate platforms, and evading hazardous traps.

name: Boomerang
summary: You control a boy walking through a platform maze trying to collect items while being chased by enemies. They can be killed by using the boomerang. The boomerang has a limited range and, if thrown, must always picked up. It will not return to you.

name: Bomb Jack DX
summary: A big overhaul of Bomb Jack for the Game Boy. Adding colors, fixes and improvements.

name: BorielZONE
summary:
You are the commander of a defense tower, surrounded by enemy tanks. Your mission: destroy as many as possible before they destroy you. Tanks will change its color from green to yellow and red before shooting. Kill the red tanks for bonus!

You have a laser to destroy the tanks close and far away, a shield to repulse the enemy, and a radar to detect your enemies. Your laser (L) and shield (S) can get overheated so use them wisely! When your energy (E) is empty, you will be destroyed. The enemy tanks will shoot you also when you cannot see them, so watch your radar!

name: Bob en el Polo
summary: The objective of Bob en el polo is quite simple: eat a certain number of eggs in each of the 10 levels of the game, avoiding the enemies, in a limited amount of time. The player can also move the blocks on the screen, like in Pengo, but without the possibility to kill enemies. Blocks can only be moved for defensive purposes. The start level can be selected from the main menu.

name: Bombcapsule
summary: Run and Dodge, and Destroy the waves of Bombs. Brand New Arena Shooter!

name: Boo's There?
summary: Boo’s There is a single-player time management game where players must question trick or treaters at your doorstep on Halloween night. Visitors vary from monsters to regular trick-or-treaters, so watch and question visitors for any clues as you do your best to protect your town from peril!

name: Bowling Fever
summary: Fire up "Bowling Fever" and be carried away by the emotions!

name: Bokosuka Wars
summary: This game revolves around a leader who must lead an army in phalanx formation across a battlefield in real-time against overwhelming enemy forces while freeing and recruiting soldiers along the way, with each unit able to gain experience and level up through battle. The player must make sure that the leader stays alive, until the army reaches the enemy castle to defeat the leader of the opposing forces. The game was responsible for laying the foundations for the tactical role-playing game genre, or the "simulation RPG" genre as it is known in Japan, with its blend of role-playing and strategy game elements. The game has also variously been described as an early example of an action role-playing game, an early prototype real-time strategy game, and a unique reverse tower defense game. In its time, the game was considered a major success in Japan.

name: Boulder Dash
summary: NES/Famicom port of Boulder Dash.

name: Boulder Dash
summary: Boulder Dash spelunks its way to the Game Boy!

name: Boulder Dash
summary: Commodore 64 port of Boulder Dash.

name: Boulder Dash
summary: Arcade port of Boulder Dash, released in North America using Exidy MAXAFLEX engine

name: Boulder Dash
summary: An Arcade port of Boulder Dash, released in Japan by Data East using the DECO Cassette System.

summary: Acorn Electron port of Boulder Dash.

summary: Amstrad CPC port of Boulder Dash.

summary: BBC Micro port of Boulder Dash.

summary: Apple II port of Boulder Dash.

summary: Atari ST port of Boulder Dash.

summary: MSX Port or Boulder Dash.

summary: The ZX Spectrum port of Boulder Dash.

name: Boing Odyssey
summary: Embrace your creative side and build with an array of physics bending tools to solve puzzles, or create and share your own!

name: Body of Work
summary:
A short interactive fiction game about the opening night of an art gallery.

CW: Descriptions of gore, body horror, & light sexuality.

name: Botanica
summary: Botanica is a short 2D side scrolling platformer game that immerses you in a world of sentient plants. Join the sprout, whose kind is often regarded as incredibly weak, on a journey to test its strength against Botanica and its governors.

name: Boom-Shaka-Laka!
summary: Boom-Shaka-Laka! - is a modern arena-game with a classic twist. You are a miner. The weapons that matter are bombs. Enemy soldiers are patrolling around. Place bombs with a timer. Collect upgrades. Look for a move to the next level.

name: Bomber Chaos
summary: Bomber Chaos is a platformer where the player controls a character who cannot stand still for long, because when the timer expires, an explosion will occur. It is necessary to collect falling explosive barrels and replenish the timer.

name: BocchiField
summary: This is a shooter game that parody of BTR(Bocchi the Rock!) Go watch an whole anime, Don't waste your time on this stupid game.

name: Bottle of Ghouls
summary: RogueLike pirate battles! You are a necromancer spirit who uses your powers to restore your former glory and greatness. Move into enemy ships, board them, use an immortal crew, plunder, destroy and dominate in Bottle of Ghoul.

name: Bot Warzone
summary: Bot Warzone brings a remarkable 2D platform shooting experience with a high level of action in a world where its destruction is almost certain. Are you capable of saving humanity? ..I don't think so..

name: Bouncin' Baby Bunnies
summary: Zounds! Coco the crazy monkey is in quite a pickle this time! Dr. Storkus Z. Hopperdropper (Storky, to his friends) has gone a bit mad, and is dropping baby bunnies from the sky! In fact, it's raining bunnies! What's a crazy monkey to do? Get help, that's what! Coco and his brother Haggis are out to catch the bunnies and bounce 'em to safety. It's monkey business, for sure, and they need your help, so grab that trampoline, and start Bouncin' Baby Bunnies!! A copy of the nearly complete game surfaced in the collection of a former Telesys employee in 2007. According to programmer Alex Leavens, Bouncin' Baby Bunnies is based off the old Bugs Bunny cartoon, where the stork mistakenly delivers Bugs to a gorilla family and they think he's their baby. The only known prototype of Bouncin' Baby Bunnies seems to be fairly complete, but still needs some tweaks and bug fixes. The game didn't get released because of the collapsing game market of 83/84. According to the former Telesys employee: 'Bouncin' Baby Bunnies came too late in the 2600 cycle and, at the time, wasn't worth releasing. The market was saturated.'

name: Boggle
summary: Boggle is an unreleased game for the Atari 2600 programmed by David Crane while he was still working at Atari. In Boggle, which is based on the popular word game of the same name, you must form as many words as possible from a random 4x4 grid of letters. The 2600 version of the game is for two players only, and each player can form a maximum of eight words (likely due to memory constraints of the 2600). The game appears to be fairly close to completion, although there are some glitches, such as all the letters not appearing in the grid right away when you start the game. Still, it's an interesting prototype and it's unknown why Boggle was not completed and released.

name: Boku to, Bokura no Natsu
summary: Boku to Bokura no Natsu is an adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Boulder Dash
summary: The Super Cassette Vision port of Boulder Dash released in 1985.

name: Boxhead: The Zombie Wars
summary: Your task consists on shooting the dangerous zombies any way you can. You can choose between different levels and game modes.

name: Boxhead: The Rooms
summary: How long can you survive against the zombie onslaught.

name: Book of Dreams
summary: Monsters have attacked the elves and stolen one of the most important books, destroying the "Book of Dreams". This book is important for the magic world as well as for humans. Without this book, humans lose their ability to dream and use their imagination. Many elves have tried desperately to get the pages but without success. So they ask you to help them get their precious book back through a difficult parkour.

name: Boobsle
summary: Embark on a captivating journey with Boobsle! Solve stunning anime puzzles, meet charming characters, and immerse in breathtaking art. Experience the beauty as you unlock secrets within each puzzle. Delight in gorgeous art and captivating characters. Get ready for an unforgettable adventure!

name: Borzoi Adventure
summary: Will you rise to the challenge and guide the Borzoi to victory in his grand adventure?

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Hidden Giftware
summary: Brace yourselves—winter has come to Byteland! Get ready to jump into a festive fiesta with 5 new winter island levels. Skate and slide your way into this new chilly chapter filled with slippery challenges all around the HUB area.

name: Boyce the Voice
summary: Boyce the Voice is a fast-paced rhythm game where an you play Boyce! An unlikely voice actor who is on a mission to change the world...with his voice! Embark on 6 custom designed levels where only quick thinking, wit, and speedy fingers can win the day!

name: Bootlegger: Moonshine Empire
summary: Make your name as a whiskey-runner, a politician, or a gangster as you quench thirsts from rural Pennsylvania to the New York City nightlife!

name: Box Room
summary: A fast-paced puzzle adventure where strategy and agility collide!

name: Boardland
summary: BoardLand is a turn-based strategy board game where you use the numbers rolled by dice to grow your own board and battle monsters.

name: BomberPengu
summary: Play a frozen version of Bomberman. Your objective in this multiplayer game is to detonate the other player using reasoning, skill and bombs. Grab the extras and keep your concentration. Bombs can be pushed before they detonate.

name: Bomb Hero
summary: Bomb Hero Is this a three elimination game? Is this a multiplayer game? No! This is the most difficult game in history!!! The difficulty of getting started is Epic!!! is a leisure competitive game integrating elimination, MoBa, strategy and other elements.

name: Borderus
summary: Enjoy the classic arcade gameplay with sexy girls gone wild!

name: Bomberman
summary: A Bomberman clone by Nice Code Software.

name: BoboInvasion
summary: BoboInvasion is a classic spaceshooter game. Face waves of aliens with increasing difficulty, dodge their attacks, and choose a ship upgrade that suits your style to win

name: Bounce ASMR
summary: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Boarder Zone
summary:
Game Boy Color version of Boarder Zone is substantially different from its PC namesake.

This version features a pseudo-3D environment, where the camera is positioned behind the boarder and the piste scrolls towards the camera. Obstacles appear on the horizon and increase in size as they near the viewpoint.

The two main game modes are 'Competition' and 'Challenge'.

Competition features a 'race attack' mode (basically a speed race with another AI player), Trick Attack (trick points based over 5 courses, beating a course threshold to advance), Time Attack (best time), and Supreme Attack (race with tricks).

Challenge modes is about beating any previous records set for a particular track and supported Time Attack (best time), Trick Attack (best trick points), Slalom Attack (time on a flag course), and Vs Race (which uses the Game Boy Universal Link Cable).

There is also a practice mode and a 'ghost boarder' - basically a replay of the player's best race.

Trick moves include Mute Grab, Nose Grab, Tweak, Stiffy, Indy Air, Tail Grab, Stalefish, Shifty Air, Meloncholy, Frontside Air, Backside Air, 180, 360, 540, 720, 900, 1080, Front Flip, Back Flip, Rodeo Flip, and McTwist; most of which are performed with combo style control moves.

The player can choose from four characters: Sandy, Travis, Alain, and Tara.

name: Boyband Hell
summary:
A psychological thriller about a boyband reunion gone wrong.

Your heart and your reputation is at stake Get shipped or defy the crazy superfans!

name: Bolt'n'Punch
summary:
Exploring a disarrayed food factory, play as Lyft and fight your way through this chaos using powerful abilities. Face off against relentless robots and bring them to pieces. There’s only one option left to stop them; Destroy them, throw them, PUNCH 'EM!

Food for Thought strives to deliver the best food products to the common people, but when its robot workers turn against Lyft, the last human in the factory, she has to step up and punch some steel. Uncover the truth behind this attack, find your boss for answers, and put an end to this with style and power.

name: Book-Warm
summary: "Book-Warm" is a cartoony action-roguelite featuring fluid and various gun-combat. You can dive in to universes of famous books and rewrite their stories with our own choices. Fight the villians in the books and rewrite the story as you wish to make children books great again!

name: Bonanza Burger
summary: Bonanza Burger: Build, manage, and compete! Design your restaurant, hire a top-notch team, and battle rival managers. Conquer challenges, expand, and prove you're the ultimate fast-food mogul!

name: Bounce ASMR: Triangle
summary: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Bounce ASMR: Circle
summary: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Bounce ASMR: Pentagon
summary: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Bounce ASMR: Hexagon
summary: Relax your brain with some geometric bouncing. Bounce ASMR is right here!

name: Bombaim
summary: This is a simulation of bombing at night during World War II. The white marks passing below are target markers (flares released at lower level by target marking aircraft. You must maneuver your aircraft so that markers are in the centre of your site when the bombs you have released detonate. This involves accounting for your present height (1-6), so that the bombs will explode with the most markers within the blast range (the red area in centre of your targeting site) when the bombs hit the ground. Therefore, at higher heights you must release your bombs sooner, since it takes more time for them to fall, so that they will hit the ground when the target markers are in the centre of your site. If you completely miss (fail to have any markers within the blast area) you lose a point, if you only have one marker in the blast area no points are lost or gained. You must have at least two markers in the area to begin to gain points. A total score is reported at the end of your bomb run.

name: Bombing
summary: Play the role of aliens, invade Earth, plunder resources, and eliminate survivors.

name: Bob The Astronaut
summary: Meet Bob, the inept astronaut with a heart of gold and a brain of space dust.Stranded on a random planet, Bob must rely on his laser-grapple guns to leave this planet. Can Bob bumble his way back home, or will he make intergalactic history for all the wrong reasons?

name: Boulder Logic
summary: Bradford Walker-Smythe needs to find the perfect engagement ring to win the heart of his true love Tania when he asks for her hand in marriage. And so, to prove his devotion, he sets off to the Cornish mines in search of the perfect diamond...

name: Bottle Tap
summary: Use your intellect to discover various ways to collect stars using a bottle cap on intricate and unique levels.

name: Boomeroad
summary: BOOMEROAD is an exhilarating action-adventure game in which players slide along boomerang rails you will create. The game is set in an ancient ruin floating in the sky, and the player slides through the vast skies at their own will while searching for the Artifacts.

name: BouncingBalls
summary: You will start with a weapon in a kind of training box with the sides slanted. Then balls fall from the sky that you have to hit, big balls that are easy to hit and small balls that are difficult to hit. Try to get as far as you can and don't let the balls hit you

name: Border Pioneer
summary: You! the most outstanding pioneer who graduated from this kingdom, are finally about to embark on your legendary journey. Construct towns across various levels to fend off waves of attacks from diverse enemies until you establish a firm footing and complete your exploration!

name: Boo's Burgers
summary: Boo's Burgers is a comedic narrative horror game where you work as a nightshift cook and odd jobs in hopes of getting back what you lost.

name: Bonk'em
summary: A simple "Whack-a-Mole" game for the Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Bot Patrol
summary:
Bot Patrol is a puzzle adventure about a small worker bot on its path to freedom.
Beyond traditional sokoban mechanics, Bot Patrol features abundance of extended elements, that make achieving the goal a lot trickier. Conveyor belts, cranes, energy barriers and button triggers and not at last the evil guard drones are added into the mix.
Bot Patrol is visually polished, hard but fun puzzle challenge, but not a rage inducting repetition machine - it comes with a gracious infinite Undo and Level Reset mechanics, to always be able to take that one step back, that went to far.

name: Boxhead: Immortal
summary: A deadly plague arrives as a falling meteorite lands at BOXHEAD World. Mankind with blood type B gets infected by the plague and becomes zombie like creatures. You who are trying to survive must shoot your first bullet, and trigger any explosive materials to demolish in this bloody battleground.

name: Bodyguard Task Force
summary: Your mission is clear: go solo or team up with 3 other friends to ensure the safety of high-profile VIPs through a series of dynamic and challenging scenarios.

name: Bots 4 Defense
summary: Unite in a 1-4 player strategy game fusing tower defense with the thrill of controlling powerful BOTS. Deploy defenses, tweak tower loadout and tech tree. Amp up the party mode with friends. Attack, defend, build – your strategy, your call!

name: Boss Breaker
summary: Punch everything in your path. Overthrow old gods and new foes, upgrade your fists, and discover new abilities. Uncover the secrets of Nexus Orion Labs.

name: Bounce Gun
summary: Bounce Gun is a challenging arcade roguelike shooter with a huge number of item combinations, unconventional controls and an unusual approach to difficulty progression.

name: Bobo Blitz
summary: A fast-paced deckbuilder football game. Craft your strategy, manage energy, and score big. Lead your team to glory in this unique sports clash!

name: Book Smugglers
summary: Join the courageous underground network of Book Smugglers in a grim decision-making, point-and-click, resource-management adventure as they risk everything to preserve their cultural heritage and ignite a flame of resistance.

name: Bots & Mods
summary: Bots & Mods is a robot workshop simulation game set in a cyberpunk city. Repair and upgrade robots according to specs. Craft components and gather needed materials. Meet the gangs and corporations of Danopolis and experience a cyberpunk story.

name: Bod-1
summary: BOD-1 is a thrilling horror movie set in the midst of a supernatural nightmare. After a long day at work, the protagonist returns home and discovers that his apartment has turned into a sinister place filled with otherworldly powers.

name: Borg Nukem
summary: Duke's mission was just to check out what was happening on Voyager since they had lost contact with the huge ship but it looks like Duke's mission will be a little bigger since there are Borgs all over the place and you can't just beam back! The only place you can beam to is a Borg ship! This is not looking too good for our man Duke.

name: Bootleg Soldier Azure: Astral Rave
summary:
Bootleg Soldier Azure: Astral Rave stars one-time wonder Yuuto Ichika in her quest to get her cookbook back while shooting down everything that tries to stop her in this fast-paced shoot 'em up!

This game was made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #9, and is a fan work of LAME Dimension's characters and games!

name: BoKe Travelog
summary: BoKe Travelog was a PC browser game released exclusively in China that bares many similarities to the game Poptropica.

name: Boardwalk Arcade 2
summary:
Boardwalk Arcade 2 is a sequel to the successful Party Arcade game. Boardwalk Arcade 2 offers a brand-new location on the boardwalk featuring exciting and classic mini games.

Boardwalk Arcade 2 features a collection of games that will be instantly familiar to anyone who’s been to a carnival or boardwalk. The more you play the more tickets you earn towards cosmetic upgrades, figurines, and collectibles!

name: Booeys: Rip in the Rift
summary: In this supernatural sorting game, help Booey take control of objects from the human world and send them back through the rip in the rift. Built to empower the delivery of VB-MAPP assessments, explore endless opportunities for trial design in an all new format!

name: Boink
summary: Boink! A game about falling money and building bouncers to increase the money. Purchase bouncers and place them on the map. Upgrade bouncers and the cannon to boost value. Rebirth to gain unique upgrades. Watch your money grow!

name: Bokkie

name: Booty Barrage
summary: Command the defense of a pirate haven against relentless waves of enemy ships. As the guardian of your treasure-laden island, it's up to you to man the cannon and repel the invaders before they breach your defenses!

name: Border Mountain
summary: "Border Mountain" tells the story of four adventurers at the Herac Camp, who embark on their adventure after a war between the Imperial Army and the legion of monsters. Players will journey with them through snowy mountains, explore mysterious caves, and ultimately find their own path of adventure.

name: Bond Blues
summary: It's 2026, and you're a bail bondsman in Burlington. A fully voiced visual novel exploring the obligations of duty, and what justice really means.

name: Bone and Arrow
summary: Let your arrows fly (towards friends or enemies)! Hone your skills and join your allies to demonstrate your archery prowess. Work together or against each other to survive in this fantastical world of bones and arrows.

name: Boss Simulator
summary: Boss Simulator is a business simulation game with role-playing elements. As a boss, in order to take your secretary to the island and enjoy life as soon as possible, you have to PUA your employees and shape them into overtime machines, making money for you day and night!

name: Bot Hunt
summary: Bot Hunt is a 2D proximity hide-and-seek strategy game. Use an array of weapons and gadgets to outsmart your opponents!

name: BotMobile
summary: How much are you afraid of heights?

name: Boxing Go
summary: Welcome to Boxing GO: Where Champions Rise! Get ready to play the electrifying clash of boxing in the ring as Boxing GO brings you the most thrilling boxing matches.

name: Bombo
summary: Bombo is a fast-paced arcade-style platformer where players control a character jumping across the screen to collect tokens while avoiding enemies. The game's core gameplay revolves around quick reflexes and strategic movement as players aim to gather all tokens, with added bonuses for collecting them in the correct flashing order. Power-ups occasionally fall from above, temporarily granting the ability to capture enemies for points. With only three lives at their disposal, players must balance speed and caution to progress. Bombo's simple yet challenging mechanics, combined with its time-limited power-ups and bonus scoring system, create an addictive and engaging experience reminiscent of classic arcade games.

name: Bombox
summary: Bombox is a fast-paced casual game. Players must find and defuse the correct bomb wires before the countdown on the bomb box ends.

name: Board Game Cafe
summary: Welcome to Board Game Cafe, the ultimate destination for board game enthusiasts and cafe aficionados! Step into the shoes of a board game cafe owner in this unique management game, featuring officially licensed board games.

name: BoxSim
summary: In BoxSim, think outside the box while inside of a box that's inside of a box. Find creative solutions to puzzles. Navigate platforming challenges. Pick up and put down boxes. Will you escape, or will you spend the rest of your life inside the box?

name: Bodyrain
summary: Slaughter hordes of zombies and challenging bosses in Bodyrain: a zombie FPS game! Accumulate money to acquire new weapons and gain experience to strengthen your character and clean up Dawn City!

name: Book of Hours: House of Light
summary: A story-focused expansion for narrative crafting RPG BOOK OF HOURS. Explore visitors and their stories in much greater depth. Host exotic feasts and sophisticated soirées. And in your own quiet way, shape the genesis of the controversial Lighthouse Institute.

name: BouncyBirdy

name: Bone Meal
summary: Plant strange mutated crop in a chilling rogue-like with strategic resource management. Use a wide variety of seeds through three seasons to survive the blinding glow of the sun. Brew tonics, produce biofuel, upgrade facilities, and don't go hungry.

name: Bob Invasion

name: Bounced

name: Box To The Beat VR: Indie Electro Beats
summary: Introducing the "Indie Electro Beats" DLC for BOX to the BEAT! Enjoy 10 unique tracks crafted by two up and coming artists! Feel the intensity as you sync your punches with the beats made by these talented creators. Step into the ring and prepare to be challenged as you take on these intense levels!

name: Bodacious Babes: Nightlife
summary: The Bodacious Babes are on the town, come meet all the girls. Work your way through over 30 unique puzzle levels to unlock 100+ HOT and SEXY photos of the babes.

name: BoundWorlds
summary: BoundWorlds is a multiverse-exploring action-RPG with an immensely powerful world editor. Explore an infinite expanse of player-created worlds, create your own levels and adventures, and create gateways to link these worlds together into a single cohesive multiverse!

name: Bouncy Drops

Scratch your multi-tasking itch!

Play Idle Balls in front of your favorite show, in a boring class or meeting - without missing the important stuff.

Bounce Back Java Game
Bounce game with different levels

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Outlaw Pack 4

name: Body Pay
summary: Body Pay is a casual puzzle game where you pay for products brought by customers by pressing the appropriate control keys. As you move up the stage, overcome the increasing number of products and customer interruptions to achieve the target score and continue your secret story with the girls.

name: Boom Zoo
summary: Boom Zoo is a Bomberman-style maze game featuring animal-themed characters and explosive gameplay. Players navigate grid-based levels, placing bombs to eliminate obstacles and enemies while avoiding getting caught in the blast radius.

Bobr Kurwa is a roguelike top-down shooter inspired by Polish Beaver memes, Nuclear Throne, DotA, and, strangely enough, Genshin Impact. The focus of the game is on hardcore gameplay.

You control 3 unique heroes at once, each with distinct spells that can be upgraded. The goal is to escape from Poland through a dangerous forest and a crowd of enemies.

name: Bones Beneath
summary: Explore the Egyptian underworld in this precision platformer! Jump, whip, and dash your way through a challenging, interconnected world that weaves linear gauntlets with open-ended exploration.

name: Bolt Runner
summary: Take control of a robot soldier on the run from a ruined future as you travel through time portals to prevent a dystopian reality!

name: Boom Lift Operator
summary: "Boom Lift Operator" is an immersive training game where players learn to operate boom lifts safely through realistic simulations and challenges.

name: BobasQuest
summary: Welcome to the exciting world of Bobas Quest, a fun pixel art platformer where you have to make nimble jumps and complete levels using teleportation.

name: BossCrafter

summary: Boats N' Hoes is a combat game based around using boats as a player and hoes as a weapon type. Attack other boats with hoes and avoid their hoes to become the best at Boats N' Hoes.

Boris and the Dark Survival: The Unleashed
Boris and the Dark Survival: Symphony of Shadows

Boyz Don't Cry

Bombball is designed to be spectator-friendly and easy to learn, while still requiring serious skill to master. Grab some buddies, crank the volume up, and prepare to use boosts, blasters, and bombs to get that tiebreaking goal right before the buzzer!

name: Boneless VR

You are playing the red guy falling and trying to avoid the laser of that grey robot thingy by jumping from side to side.

name: Box Clicker

Your speed is your most powerful weapon! Each opponent presents a different challenge and strategy, so you must time your attacks well and execute powerful combos. The faster you are, the more damage you can inflict! Download now and take your first step towards becoming a real fighter!

summary: Although it is a protected species worldwide, it is a harmful species in its own korea. The story of Bonoru, the water deer. I tried it as a casual former death, a platform game. space jump Arrow keys (wasd) movement Right mouse button special ability

summary: Bounce around in Pinballcity as Boomadron and destroy the evil Robots.

name: Bob and the Alien Fire Flies
summary:
The betenticled hedgehoctopus' origin story

Bob, a curious little hedgehog has just stumbled upon a small moonlit glade. Within it he's found some of the most delicious little glowing alien bugs that he has ever tasted. Help Bob eat his fill of these "out of this world" treats. But take care to avoid the sweeping teleport beams and be careful not to let those bugs stay red for too long......

Bob and the alien fire flies is my very first game ever, for any platform anywhere. The inspiration for the game's main character came from a pancake I made once (it really did look like a hedgehog with tentacles). The game written entirely in bAtari BASIC features 3 different game over animations and two hedgehogs. Yes, that's right, you can play alone as Bob or play in two player mode with a friend and control both Bob and Hog as they battle to be the first to eat 20 fire flies.

name: Bob and the Alien Fireflies
summary: Bob, a curious little hedgehog has just stumbled upon a small moonlit glade. Within it he's found some of the most delicious little glowing alien bugs that he has ever tasted. Help Bob eat his fill of these "out of this world" treats. But take care to avoid the sweeping teleport beams and be careful not to let those bugs stay red for too long......

name: Boxmania
summary: Boxmania is a 2D puzzle game designed to be challenging, fun, and to make the player think on every level. Each of the 50 levels is created to show unique aspects of the simple concept of moving boxes, all while being possible. After completion, enjoy the other equally fun game modes.

Your role impacts your team's success, and their success shapes your experience. Prefer solo action? Go solo in various game modes that will test your skills. Jump into the fast-paced chaos and dominate the battlefield!

name: Book of Spells 2

Monsters have crept into your world from the depths and only you can stop them! Grab your staff and go on an adventure!

Play as Drake Mass, Goober, or Flux Helix and equip an array of loyal pets to complete quests, win bounties, and defeat epic bosses!

name: Bomb Fight
summary: A simulator of the handheld game of the same name.

name: Boat Driver: Ship Parking Simulator

name: Boomerang Fu: Just Desserts DLC

name: Bottomless Block Barrage
summary:
Bottomless Block Barrage (BBB) aims to be a Panel de Pon/Tetris Attack/Pokemon Puzzle League clone for the 3DS.

This game is a work in progress but it is currently playable.

name: Bober Bros: The Hole

name: Bound By Broadcast

name: Bouncy Chicken

Master single-screen challenges in top-down 3D style as you take aim at fire your feathered projectile around the chicken pen to gather cobs of corn. In each of the 90 unique levels of Bouncy Chicken, you’ll have only a few shots available to shoot a chicken in any direction, ricocheting off the fence, brick walls and springy obstacles or even through warp points. The objective is to collect every cob of corn on screen before your shot chances run out.

name: Box It Up! Inc.

name: Bounce Arcade
summary:
Enter the machine and play pinball like you've never seen before in Bounce Arcade!
Wield your hands as paddles, guiding the ball through a series of immersive pinball worlds, each with their own challenges and surprises.
Nostalgic and frantic elements of classic pinball join all-new skills for a fast-paced arcade experience. Use a tractor beam to attract the ball back to you, and use a controllable lasso to nudge the ball where you want it to go for the ultimate skill shots (if you can master them).
Each world brings its own unique mini-games to the table. In a dusty western town, your paddles transform into pistols for a shooting gallery. In a futuristic space station, use the ball to break up asteroids that enter the docking bay.
Experience chaotic pinball action, flipped inside out!

name: Boomies

Boomies is a 2D Roleplay/Simulation mobile game designed for kids based on characters from the Brazilian animated series WeeBoom.

Players can interact with the game's scenery and sound effects, befriend characters, and customize their Boomie using various unlockable options.

name: Bomb Bowling
summary: Kick the pins out of the screen using explosions. We call this a Bomb Bowling!

name: Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024
summary:
Step into the shoes of a Border Patrol officer in “Border Police: Contraband Simulator 2024”, an immersive and meticulously crafted simulation game.
This captivating experience throws you headfirst into the world of border security, where you'll face the daily challenges, responsibilities, and crucial decisions encountered by those who tirelessly safeguard borders.

name: Bolo

name: Bowling in a Skate Park
summary: Analyze the playfield, find the best trajectory, pick the right time and go for a strike hit.

name: Boba Monsters

Ranger has gotten a hold of a new melee weapon: the Bonk Hammer!
The Hammer allows the player to jump higher, move faster, and fight harder!
This mod (built on Copper) also includes two additional monsters: our good friend the gaunt from Quoth (with reworked code), and Dwell's brute! Across the set of maps, you will encounter Bonk runes, which can be used to purchase awesome skins for the new hammer in the start map.

A demon who claims to be an "Exile" blocks your apartment, demanding you to escape within the stipulated time, otherwise, you will face certain death. But will the demon really keep his promise? What is the demon's purpose after all?

name: Bodega

Use your strength to take on bigger 'Bobs' and knock them down with your fists or any object you find on the ground. (Or just throw the 'Bob' off the edge of the map) Defeat the final Bob and unlock new levels and game modes.

name: Bomba
summary: Mouse avoider with a difference! Deformable ground and power-ups.

name: Bowser's Dank Rave Infinite: Mario and Bowser Stop the Illuminati To Rave 5Ever
Bobby Six Seven: Time Traveling Detective

name: Bowser's Dank Rave 2017 Edition: Extra Long Name That I Don't Feel Like Typing
Boat House

name: Boxcar Brats

Swerve, skid and smash everything in sight to build up your brake meter and spin out your opponents! So hop into your boxcar, cause some mayhem and eliminate your buddies - nothing is off limits when you're a brat!

summary: "Bound Ball Animals" is a fee-to-play puzzle action game that combines strategic gameplay with adorable animal-themed puzzles, where you pull and launch balls, bouncing them off walls to hit targets.

name: Borrowed Book
summary: Borrowed Book is a simple yet heavy-dialogue; psychological horror RPG Maker game on two microorganisms attempting to completing their chores for the librarian to get out from the library quickly.

name: Box Clicker
summary: Box Clicker is a game in which you break Boxes to get more Boxes. And that's just the beginning!

name: Borderlands 4
summary: See if you have what it takes to go down in history as a legendary Vault Hunter as you search for secret alien treasure, blasting everything in sight.

name: Box Bop
summary: Box Bop is a simple game where you just get to tinker and play with funny physics with boxes and spheres and stuff in a ball pit. Just made as a fun little tinker game...?

name: Boosted Survivors
summary:
Boosted Survivors is a sandbox rogue-like, filled to the brim with exciting secrets. Fight dangerous waves of enemies, find legendary upgrades, and boost your hero along the way.

Boosting lets you increase or decrease any value of your hero, weapons and abilities, giving you complete freedom to reinterpret the game in new and exciting ways. Every run is completely unique and limited only by your creativity.

name: Botworld Odyssey
summary: Venture out into a huge and diverse open world to discover new bots, collect rare scrap to build them, and deploy them in tactical real-time battles on your quest to become the world’s greatest Botmaster.

name: Boost Panic
summary:
The Space Grand Prix has long been defined by the grace and elegance of its champions. Some legendary racers have even managed to navigate hazard-strewn courses without a single scratch on their ships.

But all that's gonna change.

You invented BOOST technology and built a ship sturdy enough to slam into walls at high speeds, and it's time to haphazardly carom your way to victory! Just cross the finish line before your ship falls apart, and you win!

Prove you're fast enough and you may even spark a revolution in the space racing scene!

name: Boys Race
summary: You will have a long and difficult road to victory. You know it's better not to go it alone, right? Get your Boys together and get to the finish! Not everyone will make it, but those who do will help the others reach the finish line. It's a team effort and a team victory.

name: Bowser's Revenge 4
summary:
Bowser's Revenge 4 has 8 Worlds and an additional Star World, and several unique bosses made specifically for this game. There is quite a fair bit of custom ASM,
especially in the Star World, which should make this an interesting experience.
The difficulty varies as it's fairly easy in the first few worlds, but
difficulty increases a bit past World 6, especially in World 8 and the
Star World. Unfortunately, I can't choose both Standard: Hard and Standard: Normal, but just know it gets more difficult as the game progresses.
As for the bosses, none should be too difficult or too confusing... maybe.

name: Bookworm
summary: Travel across Wonderland in this zen little typing game.

name: Bowser Gets Clever: Insert Subtitle Here
summary: This game is half-parody of a Super Mario Bros. game, a reimagining of a really old game made in 2009 by Adrien Dittrick.

name: Border Patrol
summary: Border Patrol is a 2D comic-style simulation game where players take on the role of a border officer responsible for inspecting incoming and outgoing vehicles, searching for contraband, and dealing with corruption and forgery.

name: Bonesaw
summary: Bonesaw is a turn-based psychological horror game with highly strategic gameplay and a stress-inducing saw mechanic. Plan your moves carefully to outsmart the devil or challenge the odds and gamble the fate of your fingers.

name: Boulder Dash: 40th Anniversary
summary: Embrace Rockford's roots and celebrate 40 years of the iconic game Boulder Dash. Relive iconic moments from the past and experience the legendary puzzle game like never before. Don't let time stand in your way – come back in time with us and relive those unforgettable moments today!

name: Boonka
summary: Once upon a time, flora and trees covered the peaceful countryside of a distant and beautiful world. To restore this once idyllic land to its former glory, you'll need to subdivide into various little nature spirits called Boonkas and work to heal the land. Boonka includes 3 different game modes designed for every kind of player. Restore the land to its once tranquil way of life in Adventure Mode, put your reflexes to the test in Blitz Mode, or take your time playing Beanstalk Mode. With over 60 fast-paced levels, 15 powerful, level-changing power-ups and bonuses, and truly addictive gameplay, Boonka has something for everyone!

name: Body Quest
summary:
A Russian educational platform game about human anatomy where you learn the structure of the human body through mini-game segments.
The game consists of the platforming segment where you need to traverse different floors of the hospital to reach the computer and configure how to setup the different body parts. These computers acts as the mini-games for the player to learn about the body structure.
You win the game once you have done all the floors and completed all the computer setups.

name: Border Patrol Officer: Control Duty Simulator
Bowling
summary:
The goal is to knock down as many pins as possible within 10 throws.
Can you knock down all 21 pins?!

name: Borrowhelen
summary: Borrowhelen is a 90s-style first-person shooter set in a fantastical realm like no other. As the brilliant scientist Ordin Gilbellt, you dive into battle against cultists and mythical creatures, wielding powerful and unique weapons.

name: Bounty Drag Racing: Import Modified Pack 2
summary: This Import Modified Pack includes (2) Modified Import type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars. The Modified Imports are drag cars in between street cars and race cars and include engine swaps for import engines.

name: Bomber Cat Run
summary: Bomber Cat Run is a challenge platform runner game you can play with one hand. There are just two buttons. Jump and stop. Bomber Cat Run plays as a side-scrolling, auto-runner platformer game. The player controls Jazz as he automatically runs from left to right, jumping on his own to clear small gaps or obstacles.

name: Bokura: Planet
summary: "Back to the same planet, together... That's all I wanted..." BOKURA: planet is a two-player puzzle adventure that explores new possibilities in cooperative gaming. Players take on the role of the crew on a space exploration ship as they try to escape from a planet where they have crash-landed on.

name: Boxcars
summary: Free and open source online backgammon.

name: Bob Smith and the Unsolved Case of Mystery
Boxman in the World of the Wuuza Wizards
Boo's Treat
summary: Complete a variety of objectives to satisfy your supernatural sweet tooth in this action game starring the Boo, Sweeth Boo-th.

name: Boxing Room
summary: A boxing game where you must land as many punches on your opponent as possible before he falls to the ground.

name: Box Office Game
summary: Spend up to ten guesses to reveal the top five movies in the US domestic box office for the given weekend. Players can use points to reveal selected hints about each movie.

name: Bones in the Boneyard
summary: There are many bones in the boneyard. As they fall from the screen, arrange skulls in lines of three to clear them and line up complete skeletons to set them free.

name: Bonding, Now
summary: A black-and-white stylized collection of visual novel stories with pixel graphics gameplay and lineart artwork. Experience how new bonds are created, how they evolve, twist and change. Complete with a separate open-ended adventure mode.

name: Bonanit: A Menorcan Horror Story
summary: Experience sleep paralysis in Bonanit, where every game is unique and every blink counts. Face the terror lurking in the darkness of your room and find out if you can maintain your sanity until daylight arrives.

name: Bonaparte: A Mechanized Revolution
summary: 1789, Paris. Take Napoleon’s place in an alternate history as Céline or César Bonaparte in this ideology driven, turn-based strategy journey. Defend, reform or oppose the monarchy and write your own alternative history by combining cunning political skills and tactical military prowess.

name: Booger Booster
summary: A game created for the GBJAM (GameBoy Jam). Control a character that looks like a radio active booger and try to find the exit to the maze, to confront a boss and complete the game.

name: Bowser's Recruitment
summary: A game starring Bowser! After Mario beats up all of your minions, you need to go on an adventure to collect new ones.

name: Boobs Hidden Los Angeles
summary: 100 Boobs in all shapes and sizes are waiting for you to be found on the sun-kissed shores of Venice Beach in Los Angeles!

name: Bookshop Wonderland: Supermarket Simulator
summary: Bookshop Wonderland: Supermarket Simulator – Where Every Aisle Tells a Story!

name: BoringFly
summary: A turn based casual card game with a storyline that only requires the use of a mouse throughout the game. On the basis of simulating the gameplay of Lianliankan, add combat elements. At the same time, players can choose different talents and adapt to different gameplay expressions.

name: Border Jumper
summary: "Border Jumper" is a mysterious RogueLike strategy turn RPG game. Inside a wired spaceship, you need to carefully choose the combination of skills and props, explore and uncover all the truths. In this game, you will experience unique gameplay and exciting challenges, bringing endless fun.

name: Bonded in Darkness
summary:
Arnaud just wants to be left alone.

Turned into a vampire against his will long ago, he's nonetheless managed to carve out a largely peaceful existence in an abandoned manor—a peaceful existence routinely interrupted by the vampire hunter Julien, seeking blood for blood.

Over the years, animosity has morphed into a strange sort of respect, and on one stormy night, Arnaud is greeted with a sight he never expected: his mortal enemy Julien, gravely injured on his doorstep.

Will Arnaud take him in, or will he use this opportunity to grasp the peace he's been seeking for years?

name: Borderline
summary: Borderline is a free running first person adventure heavily inspired by the momentum-based gameplay from Mirror’s Edge. You are tasked with working against the city of Greyhawke’s most notorious mega corporations, uncovering their secrets while navigating through their state-of-the-art security.

name: Bona Fido
summary:
Bona Fido is a fast-paced, single-screen platformer, inspired by classic arcade games but with a spooOOooky twist.

Turns out the afterlife's not as bad as they say! Well, except for all the terrifying monsters, at least.

name: Bounty of One: Panic in the Mines
summary: The Undertaker has escaped through the Mines! Face the danger of the abandonned tunnels, beware of landslides and goblin-driven minecarts and bring the necromancer to justice. 3 new characters, 30 new objects, 17 new achievement, get ready to rumble!

name: Boku no Saiai no
summary: The story of the timid, quiet, and gentle Sara, and the assertive Yura who loves him. Sara is a medical student, and he depends on Yura in his daily life. Sara finally has some free time to take a break, and he spends it with Sara, but... They both hold dark feelings within them, and wish this time would last forever.

name: Bob-Ball
summary:
A Bob-Ball (which is type of Bob-Omb) found a paddle that can move on its own, and decided to have fun with the paddle. However, he didn't realize that somehow a timer is set on the Bob-Ball.

It's a Breakout-clone, but with a timer. Once you run out of time, the Bob-Ball explodes and the game ends. There is six powerups and high scores. High scores are the only thing that is for replay value however, so you probably won't play this a whole lot if high scores aren't your thing.

name: Bot Beats
summary: Unleash your inner coder, build epic robots, and conquer the arena. For beginners and computer scientists alike! Join Bot Beats today and embark on an educational adventure that transforms coding from a daunting task into an enjoyable, empowering skill.

name: Booty Quest: Match 3 Jewels!
summary: Match 3 or more jewels as fast as you can in just 60 seconds.

name: Bonnie Blob in Shapeville
summary: Welcome to Shapeville, a colorful world filled with friendly shapes and endless fun! Meet Bonnie Blob, a bubbly little hero with a curious mind and a heart full of adventure. Explore the whimsical corners of Shapeville, where every click brings something delightful to life.

name: Bodycam Zombie Shooter
summary: Bodycam Zombie Shooter is a first-person shooter set in during the zombie apocalypse.

name: Bone Warper
summary: This is a wild, weird platformer about bones. It was made for LowRezJam2018. It gets challenging- in a puzzle-y way, not an action-y one. You should be able to figure it out if you keep at it...

name: BooniePlanet
summary:
Explore a magical world where you collect adorable creatures called Boonies!
Upgrade your Boonies and teach them new tricks! Feed them, wash them, and play with them to keep them happy! Create and customize your own family of Boonies and show them off to all your friends!

name: Boomerang Fu: Deluxe Edition
summary: Become the ultimate Boomerang Fu master with the Boomerang Fu - Deluxe Edition. This bundle includes the base game plus all available DLC.

name: Bonk The Goblins!
summary: Bonk the Goblins! is Whackamole meets microgames! It's full of hectic and funny score attack arcade action.

name: Bopimo!
summary: A Free to play, online 3D platformer where players can create their own levels.

name: Boku to Iu Mono
summary: The protagonist character has 'lived' alone and unfeeling as a conscience inhabiting random objects and animals for random times for as long as he can remember — but one day, he turns into the shape of a human boy. His life changes utterly when the human girl Sae decides to try to befriend him, naming him "Ao" for his deep blue eyes as he cannot speak. Every day, they have fun playing hide and seek — but one day, Sae stops coming...

name: Boxing Star: Match 3
summary: Match colorful gems to unleash powerful punches and combos. The more puzzles you solve, the stronger your punches will be!

name: Bone to Gather
summary: "Bone To Gather" is a synergy-building action roguelike. Embark on an epic journey with a team of puny skeletons determined to revenge the Demon King. Recruit skeletons with unique synergies to create a powerful team and battle through monsters on your way to the final showdown.

name: Boomerang Of Destruction
summary: Try one of the oldest weapons in the world.

name: Bowling Simulator
summary: Bowling Simulator is a realistic bowling game where you’ll feel like a pro landing strikes, thanks to its easy to use controls. Grab your favorite drink and hit the lanes at Nashville Bowling Center, where bowling isn’t just a game—it’s life!

name: Booze & Ooze
summary: In this deckbuilder and tavern management simulation featuring RPG and roguelite elements, you play a destitute leprechaun trying to claw his way back to fortune and power from behind the counter of a derelict inn. You are no hero material, but unfortunately for you, your clients are!

name: Bounty Sword: Satellaview Special Time Attack Version
Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Bitosaurus
summary:
The ultimate clash between Dinos and Robots continues and this time it visited Byteland!

Grab the "Bitosaurus" DLC which unlocks a special skin that will automatically appear in your wardrobe so you can unleash your inner Dino and rawr your way in both Single Player and Co-Op mode!

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Bit Racing
summary:
Buckle up everyone, we got some hovercraft races to do! The Bit Racing DLC adds a hovercraft garage and a collection of intricate race tracks to test your skills on.

Take on the clock to get the best time and reap the rewards for finishing in bronze, silver or gold. Collect and equip a slew of unique skins for your hovercraft to add some extra flair.

name: BoliKa
summary: It has platform levels and shell tricks, the difficulty increases for each level passed.

name: Box Chaos
summary: Solve the tricky puzzles to earn Bitnuts and repair the little robot.

name: Bonk!
summary: Action packed, lighthearted, fun. The party game for up to four players.

name: Body Cam Shooter
summary: Feel the thrill of real combat, a shooter like no other!

name: Bounce
summary:
Play the ball with simple rules and controls!
Just pull the ball like a slingshot!
Aim ifor the same color target and give a GREAT shoot.

name: Boo! Are you scared? The Chests Game
summary: Boo! Are you scared? Don't be afraid, I'm a friend. Play the «Chests» card game for souvenirs with your new friend.

name: Box Dog
summary: Do you love difficult hidden object games? Then this is definitely the game for you! Box Dog is a classic hidden object game at heart. Each level is hand drawn so they are full of surprising details to discover while you are looking for that last object.

name: Bonnie Fell
summary: Behind this cute potion-making game lies a choice-driven RPG. Will you solve problems or swindle customers with devious tricks?

name: Boo! Are you scared?
summary: "Boo! Are you scared?" – game with realistic physics of collisions and destruction, where every step can be the last. Gloomy levels full of dangerous obstacles and bottomless abysses await you.

name: Boulder Crash
summary: Collect diamonds and avoid monsters! You need to collect all the diamonds to exit the level. Rocks and diamonds can fall and kill you.

name: Book Bound
summary: Book Bound is a cozy bookshop simulation game. Use a range of items to decorate your shop and make it truly yours. Pick the books you would like to sell. Help customers find books they want most. Sell books in different genres.

name: Boundland
summary: Boundland is a fun physics-based platform game where you navigate your multi-shaped character through lots of dark levels and scary boss fights.

name: Bot Hunter
summary: Fast-paced roguelite shooter with modular weapons. Play as a vacuum cleaner bounty hunter. Use color theory to clean the galaxy of bot scum and collect rewards to pay your bills.

name: Bober Constructions
summary: Bober k***w. Patrz jakie bydle! And even more than just one. 4 beaver-builders, and you can control one of them. Create structures, manage time and resources, watch out for obstacles, and remember, fast action is the key to success!

name: Bodycam Shooter 2025
summary: Enter the combat zone and survive every mission.

name: Bonds of Ecstasy
summary: Train your submissive maid-girlfriend. Short erotic H-game involving a Sub/Dom relationship. Visual Novel with interactive point-and-click elements.

name: Borgo the Cat
summary:
Play as Borgo, a rather *ROUND* cat! You can roll, jump, and turn your trusty camera to change your perspective of the world around you.

With five levels *plus a bonus one* this will only take around 5-10 minutes to complete, so if you don't have a lot of time this is perfect! Please, if there are any problems you are having, feel free to tell me.
