name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Deluxe Edition
summary: The Boti: Byteland Overclocked experience + 4 add-on DLCs, soundtrack & artbook

name: Bomb Bowling X
summary: Bomb Bowling X is a casual retro game where you need to help a cute cat in a superhero cape win at Bomb Bowling. It has only a few bomb charges, as well as bowling balls, basketballs and your skill and ingenuity.

name: Bonville Bandit
summary: A pixel-art stealth game. During the night roam the neighbourhood and steal from houses, be careful to not get caught by the guards or other security measures. When the sun rises, live the village life and get ready for the next night.

name: Bobby
summary: A platform game

name: Bounce Evolution
summary: Bounce Evolution is a fully playable technology demonstration of the impressive gaming and 3D capabilities of the Nokia N900. Use the intuitive motion control to guide Bounce through beautiful countryside scenery, race against time on the futuristic racing track, or just enjoy beautiful landscape in the non-interactive demo. The game is rendered using OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware acceleration allowing the game's next-generation graphics to run smoothly on the sharp 800 x 480 display.

name: Bonehammer
summary: A wargame system for Twitch's IRC. Allows deathmatches / team deathmatches with chat commands.

name: Bolero
summary: England, 1979, one week since the government abandons all hope and leaves. Cannibals, Rocker Gangs, Cults, and You. Follow the trail of a mysterious radio signal and escape with your life and hopefully your sanity.

name: Bobo and the Chest of Nightmares
summary: Jump, glide, and outsmart traps in this whimsical 3D platformer! Smash, fend off mischievous spirits, grind rails, and solve puzzles as you uncover the secrets of the Nightmare Chest. Collect hidden treasures and restore joy to a world shrouded in darkness!

name: Bomb Around
summary:
... and find out!
Physics based rage game inspired by jump king and other foddian games. Play as unique characters trying to reach as high as possible. Use interesting upgrades to reach new heights and discover the difficulty ahead. Compete on the leaderboards with speedrun, daily seed, or just casual play.

name: Boring
summary: The game about doing boring things

name: Bolide
summary: Bolide is an arcade roguelike where you survive waves in space to unlock new skills! Destroy rocks and survive challenging waves to earn skill points and use them to choose from a variety of skills. Pick from 40+ skills, allowing you to create lots of skill combinations!

name: Bomber Festival
summary: Random map Bomberman, with customizable details, let's have a Bomberman party together!

name: Bounty Off Road
summary: Bounty Off Road is inspired by early 2000s Offroading games. Complete trails to earn money, customize your vehicles for better performance, and ride together with people in massive open worlds. Rain, storms , snowstorms, sandstorms are sure to keep you immersed!

name: Boogey Hunters
summary: Boogey Hunters is a strategic ammo-building game where you travel the world hunting mythical creatures from different folklore. Plan your moves carefully, combine bullets to unleash powerful moves, battle terrifying boogies, and save the world in the shortest day possible!

name: Box #341
summary: A quirky box on a journey to find its place in the warehouse, using liquids to gain abilities, solve puzzles, and make new friends on the way!

name: Borzoi
summary: BORZOI is a first-person survival horror game where you are relentlessly hunted by a giant, demonic Borzoi dog. Experience high tension as you fight for survival, solve high-stakes puzzles, and uncover the dark legacy of a twisted cult—all while evading a predator that cannot be tamed

name: Bone n' Gone
summary: A challenging and fun game that will push the player to the peak of their gameplay. Get ready to win, lose, die, and play again! Perfect for those looking for a challenge in the FPS style!

name: Bookey Manor
summary: Click on haunted key to collect points and survive the sudden visits by the Residents as you advance through the manor.

name: Boeboeks: De Tocht Naar Opa Kakadoris
summary:
Piepel, one of the children of the Boeboeks, very small creatures, becomes ill. Help his sister Soeza to get the miracle cure from Grandpa Kakadoris, a piece of the cotton candy web.

Based on the story 'The Cotton Candy Web' by Marc De Bel.

name: Border Patrol Simulator
summary: Step into the role of a border patrol officer, where every decision matters! Manage security, investigate suspicious travelers, and utilize advanced tools in a dynamic, high-stakes environment.

name: Bony Odyssey
summary: A fast-paced 2D platformer packed with action and endless challenges!Are you ready for an adventure that never slows down?

name: Boiiing Boiiing
summary: Boiiing Boiiing is a physics-based party game up to 5 players in local, where you play as animals that chase each other using pogo sticks and unique powers.

name: Boomby!
summary:
Boomby explodes (aka: jumps) every 2 seconds. Keep track of the timebar at the bottom of the screen, time your moves right.
There are multiple routes to the pool, keep exploring if you get stuck or frustrated at a section of the map.
Trampolines are a tricky, patience pays off. Try not to rush out of the first explosion after touching one. After the first explosion, the bounce rhythm balances out.
There are 3 bomb "keys" (red, green, blue). These allow you to destroy colored bricks.
Yellow Coins: $1, Platinum Coins: $5, Green Coins: $20
The only purpose of crouching is to move the camera down (and to look cute, actually).

name: Bongo Cat
summary: Bongo cat needs your help. Bongo cat needz more hatz!!! Every time you press a key, Bongo cat will punch your taskbar. Type, click, play, work to collect more points. Which hats will you find?

name: Boat Delivery: Island Transport Simulator
summary: Deliver. Navigate. Conquer the waves!

name: BomberCin 2
summary:
BomberCin 2 is a homage to the early Arcade and NES games, like Mario Bros., Wrecking Crew, Gyromite and Bomberman.
In this game, you play as Cin, a little chick with a protection helmet, and your job is to stop an infestation of nasty bugs using nothing but an endless supply of bombs!
Unlike most platformers out there, you are unable to jump, so you must climb up ladders and use your bombs as both a defense tool and a weapon to defeat upcoming baddies.

name: Box 'n' Robot
summary: Box 'n ' Robot is an old school box pushing puzzle game with randomly generated levels. Walk around a ship filled with boxes, with the task of turning off all the lights.

name: Bosquet
summary: Une aventure narrative sur le thème de la maladie avec un gameplay du genre auto-battler. Explorez la forêt, affrontez des ennemis et rencontrez de nombreux compagnons aux personnalités uniques !

name: Bootsies
summary: Bootsies is a 1D fighting game focused on fundamentals and reading the opponent. Characters have minimal movesets but make use of a unique space-betting system to increase their risk and reward. Bootsies' main modes include a singleplayer roguelite campaign and local/online multiplayer with rollback netcode.

name: Boombot 2
summary: Boombot 2 is a physics-based sequel puzzle game where players are tasked with guiding the titular character through diverse levels using explosives. The game requires players to strategically position and explode bombs to propel Boombot towards the exit, all the while steering clear of obstacles and pitfalls.

name: Bowmen
summary: a silly little game about shooting arrows at murlocs

name: Book Supermarket: Library Manager Simulator
summary: Build, manage, and grow the ultimate bookstore!

name: Boku no Soushiki ni Youkoso: Happy Rebirthday
Boku ha Kimi dake wo Mitsumeru: I Gaze at Only You
summary:
The protagonist Sahara Takumi was feared as the leader of the juvenile gangster group “Sabre-tooth Tiger”. Some people in the underworld even called him devil’s incarnate, and so far the police has been unable to capture him.

Then suddenly two of his best friends are killed by an assassin employed by the mafia. The event marked the downfall of Sabre-tooth Tiger and Takumi made sure he stayed out of public attention. Despite even all that he receives a request to be the bodyguard for a mysterious diva named Towa. Seeking revenge for his comrades and a way to rise up from this nightmare, the protagonist accepts the job and stands up to act as Towa’s shield.

name: Boku ha Kimi dake wo Mitsumeru: I Gaze at Only You
summary:
The protagonist Sahara Takumi was feared as the leader of the juvenile gangster group “Sabre-tooth Tiger”. Some people in the underworld even called him devil’s incarnate, and so far the police has been unable to capture him.

Then suddenly two of his best friends are killed by an assassin employed by the mafia. The event marked the downfall of Sabre-tooth Tiger and Takumi made sure he stayed out of public attention. Despite even all that he receives a request to be the bodyguard for a mysterious diva named Towa. Seeking revenge for his comrades and a way to rise up from this nightmare, the protagonist accepts the job and stands up to act as Towa’s shield.

name: Boomerforge
summary: Grimdur Stoneheart is an ex-adventurer dwarf, now the manager of the greatest forge on Bramblegate. Stories about a new mine full of ore started to circulate on the city and Grimdur himself decided to explore the mine, using only his trusty bombs to clear the path. Can the dwarf find the legendary ore to create the Ultime Weapon?

name: Boxes Wizard
summary: Boxes Wizard is a platform and puzzle game with 36 challenging levels. You control a wizard with the unique ability to swap with boxes scattered throughout the stage.

name: Bounce Ball
summary: In this casual 2D puzzle platformer, create multiple platforms to bounce the ball into the goal.

name: Board Game Society
summary: Take on an ever-changing tile-based board with up to 6 players, and see just how much treasure you can scavenge before the big bad boss is defeated! Beware though, your friends might want some of that treasure for themselves.

name: Box King
summary: BOXKING - Bounce the box to the target point! Bounce the box by clicking the mouse, avoid obstacles, and reach the target to advance to the next level! 🚀 Collect coins and rubies to upgrade, and enjoy stylish play with unique box skins! ✨ Try BOXKING right now!

name: BoomerPunk
summary: The game takes place in the Far North of Russia in 1997. You play as an investigator who finds themselves in the mysterious settlement of Metallurg-63. Every choice you make affects the course of events and the ending.

name: Boeckham's Football Manager
summary: An old-school football manager in the style of the management games of the 90s. Lead your team through the seasons, shaped by dynamic story events. Develop your club and yourself to gain reputation and conquer your league and the world.

name: Bolsheviktion 3D
summary: Russia, 1918. Bolsheviks are in power. Imprisoned on suspicion of being a spy, you plan to bust out and save the Tsar and his family from certain death. BOLSHEVIKTION 3D is an old-school FPS: an alternate reality Wolf3D. Upgrade weapons, collect royal treasure and blast your way to Ipatiev House.

name: Boutique Builder Simulator
summary: Build your dream clothing store in Boutique Builder Simulator! Design layouts, stock trendy clothing, manage inventory, and satisfy quirky customers. Unlock upgrades, expand your shop, and create the ultimate shopping experience. Can you become the top boutique boss? Play now!

name: Bookshop Simulator
summary: Open your own bookshop! Order books, stock your shelves, and earn revenue. Use your profits to decorate, expand, and hire staff. Collect rare books that give powerful abilities. Adopt a cat to keep you and your customers company along the way!

name: Bouncy Bread
summary: Bouncy Bread is a simple and fun game with 40 challenging and balanced levels, offering a relaxing and accessible experience for players of all ages, with easy-to-learn mechanics and smooth progression.

name: Bombergrounds: Classic
summary: Bombergrounds Classic: Blast your way through action-packed multiplayer mayhem! Drop bombs, swing bats, and outsmart your opponents to rise to the top in this nostalgic arena battle experience. Join the chaos and claim victory!

name: Bondage Mermaids: Fatal Fap
summary: Bondage Mermaids - Fatal Fap is a survival horror horny game in the tradition of 2D-adventure style survival games.

name: Boned
summary: Boned is a silly, fast-paced multiplayer party game, inspired by arcade beloved Killer Queen and other multi-player frenzies. Take the role of a canine cadet and get into space-- collect toys, eliminate opponents, and get that bone!

name: Bonk
summary: A casual musical idler. Ideal for background sounds while focusing on study or work.

name: Bonk It!
summary: Bonk It!: Reaching the Summit Has Never Been This Fun! Find yourself trapped inside a cauldron, armed only with a hammer, as you attempt to overcome the obstacles in your path! Offering a fun yet challenging climbing adventure, Bonk It! can be played solo or with friends.

name: Bonk the Rat
summary: Relax with this goofy clicker, as rats are meant to get bonked!

name: Bohemian Cupid
summary: A cute yaoi romcom featuring two couples!

name: Bouncy Pork Simulator
summary: The baby hippo Moo Deng just wants a carefree life of lettuce and wet puddles, but tourists at the zoo throw trash at her! You must protect her at all costs so she can waddle about in peace.

name: BombTrax
summary: A crank-only game designed for the Playdate. Crank your way around the tracks and learn when to avoid your foes and when to explode right in their faces.

name: Boom
summary: Described by the creators as "Bomberman meets Doom", Boom vigorously thrusts 80 levels directly into your cranium. You and a friend/relative/hostage can traverse 8 different areas populated with creatively devious enemies to highly memorable backing music in this classic arcade thriller.

name: Boogey's Wicked Game
summary: Fight the boogeyman with a flashlight. Discover and flash out any horrors lurking in the shadows, protect your home, keep its lights on, and survive 4 nights straight against him and his varied nightmarish minions. Win to escape his dark grip. Lose, and you’ll be trapped forever in his cruel game.

name: Bonnie Simulator
summary: This is a game where you are playing as Bonnie from Five Nights at Freddy's. It is your quest to get to the office and get the night guard before the clock reaches 6 AM.

name: Boofie's Birthday Adventure
summary: This is a basic sit-and-survive style horror game where you have objectives to complete while handing many mechanics of many enemies at one time. They all spawn very quickly, so be prepared to be overwhelmed! Every time you die by the hands of a new enemy, you can check the 'enemies' button in the Main Menu to read up on how you can prevent it from happening again. This game is meant to be beaten over the period of a few sessions, even though the winning run will only take about six minutes. There are two endings and five hidden lore bits within the game, can you find them and learn the truth about the Chaos Realm Saga?

name: Bookbinding
summary: Try on the role of a bookbinder in a magic world with strict social hierarchy. Design book covers, uncover your customers' secrets, and shape their destinies, but remember: everything comes at a price!

name: Bound Survivor
summary: Bound Survivor is a 2D pixel top-down roguelike action game. Combine weapons with “bond” tags to trigger powerful synergies and create your own combat style. Every run offers fresh challenges!

name: BodyRecords
summary: BodyRecords is a chilling horror experience, blending bodycam immersion,microphone sensitivity to your voice, and eerie spaces. Work together with teammates to solve puzzles, evade lurking horrors, and escape. True cooperative play and unsettling atmosphere make every moment a tense challenge.

name: Bouncy Egg
summary: Bouncy Egg is a physics-based puzzle game where you have to move the springs, platforms, conveyer belts, and more to get your egg into the basket. The game has 40 levels to challenge your brain. Are you smart enough to figure out how to bounce the egg into the basket?

name: Born Into Darkness
summary: Amber Blythe is the night curator at the Bostonian Museum, where she is happily surrounded by artifacts and relics of the past. Considering she's spent the last two hundreds years as a vampire, she feels right at home. When the new assistant curator, Nathaniel Black, invites her to help him find the legendary Shroud of Lazarus, the two embark on a worldwide hidden object adventure that may ultimately result in Amber regaining her humanity.

name: Boutique Boulevard
summary: It's time to upgrade clothing stores and impress customers. Hire staff, pick clothes, and personalize your store with hundreds of decorations. Experiment with fabric and colors to discover new clothing. Train your staff to improve their skills in greeting, sales, and more.

name: Bombshell Blitz
summary: BOMBSHELL BLITZ is an explosive twin-stick tank shooter with minor roguelite elements. Upgrade your tank and ace your combat exams to impress your cute supervisors with the highest scores you can!

name: Bolf: A Golfoxing Game
summary:
Two polar opposite sports meet at last - it's Bolf!

Box your golf ball and try to hit it as close to the hole as possible - only one stroke per hole. Watch for wind, water and bunkers - careful not to get knocked out!

name: Born in Chaos
summary:
Born in Chaos is a mod that adds many new aggressive mobs with their own characteristics, it also adds a new boss, weapons and armor, decorative blocks, as well as new structures. Mod aims to diversify and complicate your survival by adding a variety of opponents that require a specific approach and tactics. With Born in Chaos, you will once again have a sense of fear of going out at night and exploring the dark caves, because now there will be dangers everywhere.
All mobs and structures spawn in all other biomes from other mods.

name: Boxing School II
summary: BOXING SCHOOL 2! Take control of a boxing gym in the 80s. You’ll hire the boxers, teach them to fight and climb the ranks. This is the improved and refined sequel to the management game Boxing School.

name: Bob the Robber 4
summary: Get ready for action! Bob The Robber 4 is an all new sneaking adventure puzzle, built from the ground up to work best on your phone or tablet.

name: Border Police: Contraband & Dinosaur RPG: Dino Survival Simulator
summary: Two worlds, two challenges - only the strongest prevail!

name: Bokeh Adventure
summary: Solve creative challenges with your camera in this puzzle platformer game. Explore a colorful world and join Randy on his journey to become the photographer he has always wanted to be!

name: Bootleg in Wonderland: Pastel Paradise
summary:
Bootleg rookie magician Yuuto Ichika finds herself lost in a strange, yet familiar world, only to be found by the young magician Alice.

What adventures await them in Wonderland?

Journey with Yuuto and Alice through a bullet hell adventure in Bootleg in Wonderland ~ Pastel Paradise!

This game was made in two weeks for the Touhou FnC Jam - Moriya Cleaning Game Jam!

name: Boo Boo Booster
summary: Fly with a fart! Defeat the enemy with a fart! Save Japan!？ Attack and jump are integrated, and you can play with just two buttons! 2D action shooting with easy controls!

name: Bouncing Slime: Impossible Levels
summary:
Do you live for the big challenge?
Play thIs new amazingly addicting game and its impossible levels!
It is deceivingly simple: just one control. Tap the screen to jump, guide your green slime over spikes and jump on platforms to get to the end of the level.
Be careful, any mistake will result in instant death and a respawn at the beginning of the level.

name: Bonebuilder
summary: A roguelike about building the biggest and baddest skeleton to take on challenging bosses. Gather bones and weapons from defeated enemies to change the way your character moves and attacks.

name: Boom Boom Hamster Doom
summary: Strategically maneuver your Combat Hamsters armed with an arsenal of powerful weapons across procedurally generated, fully destructible terrain. Dodge deadly mines, trigger explosive barrels to outsmart your foes, and fight to be the last Coham standing!

name: Booze Shop Simulator
summary: Run your own liquor shop and build your business from the ground up. Stock your shelves with a variety of alcoholic drinks, cigarettes, and other daily essentials. Set your own prices, manage payments. Expand and customize your shop, unlock new items as your business grows.

name: Boku ha Plarail Untenshi: Shinkansen & Joukikikansha-hen
Boku mo Sekai wo Sukuitai: Battle Tournament
Bogey's Report
summary: well, sometimes things just don't come out as you'd like. i'm sorry ma. i'm sorry da. i'm sorry sam. i'm sorry bogey. sorry. sorry. sorry.

name: Bombardiro Crocodilo: Italian Brainrot Simulator
summary: Join Bombardiro Crocodilo, the iconic crocodile-bomber plane, and a roster of absurd meme characters like Bombombini Gusini, Tralalero Tralala, and Lirili Larila in a surreal battle for supremacy across the Croco Nation and beyond!

name: Boobs Hidden Rio De Janeiro
summary: 100 Boobs in all shapes and sizes are waiting for you to be found on the sun-kissed shores of Copacabana Beach in Rio de Janeiro!

name: Boobs
summary: BOOBS is a uniquely soothing and interactive experience, letting you relax and unwind by engaging with realistic boob physics, calming visuals, and immersive gameplay designed to bring peace and comfort.

name: Bonfire Barrage
summary: Play as a Bonfire Spirit, unleashing flaming bullets to fend off relentless waves of shadowy foes. Master dynamic movement, evolve your powers, and adapt to the ever-shifting chaos. Keep your flame burning in this fast-paced, stylized 2D action-roguelike, where every moment is a fight for survival!

name: Boll Tower
summary: Pizza tower parody of boll deluxe

name: Bombshells: Hell’s Belles
summary: These sexy pilots love fast planes, big guns, and shooting TOOL out of the sky.

name: Borderline: Life On The Line
summary: Attention skydivers, race car drivers and crazy storm chasers: THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU!!! How fast can you react? How long can you stay in the line? Try this all new extreme & fast-paced arcade game!

name: Bounce Original
summary:
Can you pass level 7?

For those of you who spent hundred of hours passing levels in classic oldschool Bounce Game, we made this one - Bounce Original. Enjoy 11 teeth-shattering levels, collect all rings and beware of dangerous thorns. Stay in touch with your friends and beat their scores. Most popular game - now on your iPhone and iPad!

name: Boardwalk Builders
summary: Design and expand your boardwalk by building rides, shops, and restaurants to draw in crowds. Manage and combine your attractions to create even grander experiences. Host festivals, attract VIPs and stay ahead of shifting demand influenced by local events and rival businesses.

name: Bombardino Crocodilo vs. Tung Tung Sahur
Bound Destiny 2: Destiny's Requiem
summary: Heroes both old and new must battle against a foe threatening to upend life as they know it. The sequel to Fire Emblem: Bound Destiny takes the series in a bold new direction, featuring tighter and more responsive gameplay. Now more than ever, the lives of the party are in your hands.

name: Bound Destiny 3: Resonance
summary: Return to your roots and challenge fate itself in the final chapter of the Bound Destiny saga! Experience the world and characters of the Bound Destiny series in an entirely new light, featuring fully-choreographed support cutscenes and a new degree of gameplay-story integration. In battle, take advantage of new Talent Arts to plow through even the most devious of challenges.

name: Bow Course: Archery Golf
summary: Nock your arrow and challenge your friends in archery golf! Master realistic arrow physics and challenge your friends for a round in beautiful and challenging 9 target courses. Gain a competitive edge with skillful usage of different arrows, avoid obstacles and utilize shortcuts.

name: Boy Hero Ken: Haunted House Investigation
Bolt & Wahlington
summary: Bolt&Whalington is a Metroidvania game where you play as Bolt, a Siamese cat exploring the floating ruins of Whalington. Reshape abilities and rewrite world rules with the "Setting Machine," switch mecha forms to craft weapons, battle enemies, and uncover the secret of Whalington.

name: Bossfight Tactics
summary: A cute and approachable turn-based tactics roguelike, where you become the Bossfight if you win.

name: Bogos Binted?
summary: Welcome to a sinful night with the wackiest aliens in the galaxy! In this online game for 2-4 players, you'll engage in various tabletop games, devise brilliant strategies, lie, and do whatever it takes to outplay your opponents. Didn't work out? Well, then your head is going to explode.

name: Bomb Hunter
summary:
A fresh new take on a PC classic. Seek out the location of all the bombs using the number clues to track them all down. But be careful, one misstep and boom!

Unique to this version is Animal Mode. A fun way to make the expert difficulty more casual.

name: Book of Abominations
summary: Book of Abominations is a Lovecraftian inspired creature collecting RPG. Capture and battle monsters in snappy turn based combat, explore a mysterious, moody yet vibrant world, and unravel the secrets within the book!

name: Bound by Bones
summary: In Bound by Bones, a supernatural horror experience, you are trapped in the space between life and death—forced to uncover and destroy the cursed remains of violent spirits before they consume you. The only way to survive is to find their scattered bones… and burn them.

name: Boba Cafe Simulator
summary: Reborn at my venture's start. Last life, poor management got my milk tea shop crushed by rivals. At the door, sweet milk scent hit me, fired me up. Now, "Frost Citadel" aims to haunt the milk tea world. With my friend, we’ll set up to rule this street.

name: Bon's Origins
summary:
"There was surprisingly a lot to do today... I'm exhausted."

This short game is the beginning of everything. It tells the story of a lonely man whose evening would turn into a catastrophe if it wasn't for one thing. The events that occurred would not only change his mood, but the life he has been living up until now. Play the game to find out more about his fate.

name: Boxing Machine VR
summary: Step into the gritty, gear driven world of Boxing Machine VR, an exclusive virtual reality experience set in a steampunk inspired gym brimming with robotic pugilists. Your mission? Crush every opponent in the ring and rise as the undisputed champion.

name: Bobbies Evolution
summary: Can you manage a civilisation with taxes, political wars, race wars and pandemics?

name: Bounce, Swing, Slide!: 3 in 1 Bundle
summary: Three unique challenges. One fun-packed bundle.

name: Bound in Time
summary: A two player, co-op horde shooter with a sci-fi, futuristic twist – play as two heroes, a cyborg and a samurai, working together to defend worlds across space and time from invasions of creatures. As levels are explored, upgrade each character’s abilities in order to take on enemies and a boss!

name: Bones: Wandering Soul
summary: Sneak past the living. Speak for the dead. Solve your way through a strange city, limb by limb, as a skeleton with no memory in a story-rich puzzle adventure full of mystery and meaning.

name: Bound Between Desks
summary: A mystical visual novel where ordinary school life intertwines with mysterious phenomena. Every decision you make could lead to uncovering secrets... or plunge you into even greater uncertainty.

name: Bool Capture
summary:
Trapped in a glitching program, your mission in Bool Capture is simple: clear the field of menacing red system balls.

Use physics-based arcade action to hit the red balls and capture the yellow ones.
The COREDROM system is recovering – can you finish before it’s too late?

name: Border Base
summary: Set in a gritty, fictional 1960s universe, it’s a colony sim & base-building hybrid where you rebuild a war-ravaged region, fortify your defenses, and control key trade routes that every convoy depends on.

name: Book Shooter
summary: 《Book Shooter》 is a rougelike game that combines many different gameplays. There are a lot of magic, magic books, and enemies in the game. Come and fight!

name: Boss of FCs
summary: Boss Of FCs is a text-based game that includes strategy, simulation and football/soccer. You will start on this path with a certain budget and move towards success and wealth by making the right moves. Make the best deals and the best transfers, buy and sell clubs and move towards the top...

name: Box Stocks
summary: Box Stocks is a Sokoban game about a robot in space solving puzzles with boxes with unique and peculiar interactions. Sort your way through the galaxy while uncovering the secrets of the mysterious yet inept company that left you and the boxes behind.

name: Bottomless Pitfall
summary: Bottomless Pitfall is a casual arcade game. Where you avoid pillars as you fall thru a bottomless pit. get coins avoid obstacles, break high scores and unlock secret levels. How far can you survive?

name: Bosslife Office Manager
summary: Set up your own office. Expand your office as you wish. Transform from a small office to a large company.Don't forget to make your employees happy too.

name: Bot Colony _redux
summary: Bot Colony _redux is a story-based sci-fi adventure game. You advance in the game by speaking to robotic characters who answer intelligently or execute commands. Interacting with characters who understand you and have unique personalities and emotions is a new, immersive game experience.

name: Bombun
summary: High above the clouds, Bombun, a bomb-throwing rabbit, defends her floating fortress from her former friend turned foe, Robombun.

name: Boxstacker
summary: Welcome to Boxstacker, a game where you pilot your brave ship around obstacles, stack boxes below yourself and close portals with them! Maneuver around meteors, defeat patrolling enemies, stack boxes and close portals below. Try to beat your high score!

name: BouleMan
summary: BouleMan is a fun, family‑friendly game for all ages! With up to 5 save slots, each family member can follow their own adventure and resume where they left off. Simple, charming, and customisable—perfect for both young and old players.

name: Born as a Pirate
summary: Born as a Pirate - Multiplayer PVP game where you explore and fight!

name: Bodycam Stray Kitty
summary: Furry, fun, and full of surprises.

name: Bonjin: An Ordinary Man
summary: When your beloved wants to abandon his personality and become an absolutely ordinary person, what do you do? Bonjin ~ An Ordinary Man is an young adult romantic story about transgender identity, exploration of masculinity, and mutual understanding.

name: Boss, Blind, Brandy
summary: A two-player game using blind and brandy glass controllers.

name: Bodypanic
summary: In BodyPanic, survive in an abandoned house with friends or alone. Every night you will be attacked by unique monsters and you will have to find different strategies to fight them. Learn from mistakes, adapt to situations and immerse yourself in the creepy atmosphere.

name: Book of Myko
summary: Help Myko complete her mushroom foraging journal and get into the Royal Academy in this cozy, self-paced adventure game. Meet a colorful cast of characters in calm natural spaces as you uncover the gentle puzzle of mycology.

name: Boxboyman
summary: This is an experimental game in which you deliver packages to residents in a procedurally generated town.

name: Bonzi's Solitaire
summary:
Bonzi's Solitaire is the Solitaire game built into the 1999 desktop assistant Bonzi Buddy.
Bonzi Buddy is a discontinued freeware desktop virtual assistant created by Joe and Jay Bonzi. Upon a user's choice, it would share jokes and facts, manage downloads, sing songs, and talk, among other functions. People called it spyware after it was found out to have collected user's personal information before serving them pop-up ads. Because of this, it had to pay $75k in fines, and was discontinued in 2004.

name: Bouncy Colors
summary:
Turn the color wheel and jump!

Jump on the platform of the character's color. It's simple but the characters change their colors..

Tap right to turn the wheel clockwise.
Tap left to turn the wheel counterclockwise.

Collect coins and unlock all the characters!

name: Boom Gear
summary: Boom Gear is a demolition derby where you crash and smash your way to victory. Drive and smash your vehicle into others, destroy them and become the king of the demolition pit!

name: Bolek i Lolek: Język angielski dla najmłodszych
Bon Appecheese
summary: Colette the mouse runs her own fromagerie after working years as an affineur for other restaurants. But it's a big world for a small mouse, and she's got to make a name for herself. She wants to curate the best cheese in the world. Will her cheese be CHEDDAR than the rest? Or will it BRIE no GOUDA?

name: Born to Breed
summary: A futanari visual novel set in a world of goblins, centaurs, and more. Features Live2D animation and full voice acting.

name: Boogie Cruise
summary: Boogie Cruise is a fast-paced indie racing game with a wild twist! Blaze through epic tracks, then dive into a mysterious dungeon packed with action-adventure thrills. Face an unforgettable boss battle and prove your skills in this one-of-a-kind racing adventure!

name: Bounce Cat
summary: Bounce Cat is a vertical platformer where every jump matters and every fall hurts. Join Kat, a determined cat on a mission to rescue her companion Mat, as she climbs through a challenging vertical world. There are no traditional checkpoints—just pure skill, precise bounces, and the occasional break… by meowing a little tune.

name: Boost Zero
summary: Boost Zero is a vibrant homage to classic anti-gravity arcade racing games, where excitement and speed merge in adrenaline-fueled futuristic competitions.

name: Bookworm Adventures Deluxe
summary:
Bookworm Adventures Deluxe is an enhanced edition of Bookworm Adventures, combining word puzzle gameplay with turn-based RPG combat. Players form words from a grid of letters to attack enemies, unlocking power-ups, gems, and potions to help Lex the Bookworm on his journey.

The Deluxe version includes:

Improved graphics and visual effects.

A “Hall of Fame” ranking system for tracking high scores.

All original content, including three story books, mini-games, and side modes.

The core gameplay and storyline are the same as the standard version, but the Deluxe release refines the presentation and adds competitive replayability.

name: Bonza Planet
summary: Combine word search, jigsaw, and trivia to solve puzzles as you explore the world of Bonza Planet. This edition of Bonza highlights themes like Animals, Travel, Planet Earth, Humanity, and Science.

name: BoB: Battle of Bots
summary:
Are you ready for a bot-breaking battle?
Dive into the world of BoB - Battle of Bots and test your skills against an endless tide of robotic foes. How long can you survive? How powerful can you become? There's only one way to find out. Download now and join the battle!

name: Boggle Bash 2
summary: Boggle Bash is back and teamwork is the key! Work with other Boggleheads in creating as many words from a 4x4 Letter Dice Grid. Longer words will score your team more points, and unlock more rewards.

name: Bookworm HD
summary: Link letters to form words and feed Lex the Bookworm's voracious appetite. Score bonus points by linking Reward Tiles, but watch out for Burning Tiles – they can spell disaster!

name: Boxing Fighter: Shadow Battle
summary: It's now the rise of the Yokai spirits, and they want to dominate the world. These ghosts are willing to eat human souls. Hordes of Yokai are now coming after you. You are humanity's last hope. Punches, kicks, use of weapons and special combos... Do whatever it takes to destroy them.

name: Bobo's Big Tower
summary:
Bobo is building a Big Tower to reach Heaven and become God! Bibi must conquer Bobo's Big Tower to save the world..

Time only moves when you do, so outsmart your enemies to get past them! Explore the procedurally-generated floors of Bobo's Big Tower to endlessly modify your arsenal for taking on stronger foes. Complete challenges to unlock new shop items and playable characters with their own item pools, bosses, & story endings!

Do you have what it takes to thwart Bobo?

name: Boomer Brawler
summary: A 2D fighting game where you play as old people! Compete to get your wish granted!!! 6 playable characters! 6 wishes to be granted! Simple button mashing controls!

name: Boom Ascent
summary: Use bombs to move around and reach the top of a world full of obstacles and find help to regain your human form. Watch out for falls! Are you ready to take on this challenge?

name: Botsbotsbots
summary: 5 bots, 1 human. can you survive this chatroom? A reverse turing test set in a post-apocalyptic chatroom. 4 bots, 1 human (you). blend in to survive.

name: Boba
summary: Drink boba... efficiently? A boba-themed, grid-based puzzle game.

name: Boggle: Arcade Edition
summary: Flex your brains with this new edition of the timeless word-puzzle game loved by all ages. Enjoy hours of Boggle with friends and family, with two exciting multiplayer modes, an endless solo adventure and a curated course to improve your Boggle skills.

name: Boxing Simulator
summary: The core idea of this game is to simulate a boxer's arms and upper body movement with the movement of your mouse, precisely and intuitively. All you need is a keyboard and a mouse, then you can experience this immersive and hardcore simulation of a real boxing fight!

name: Bodacious Blasteroids
summary: A fast paced arcade shooter where firepower is everything. Build a rotating arsenal of devastating weapons and obliterate waves of evolving enemies. Upgrade your weapons into screen-clearing powerhouses and form unique combinations of weapons to score the most points.

name: Bonfires of Azure
summary: Embark on a cozy journey to settle and thrive on floating islands in the remnants of a ruptured world. Grow your village, manage resources, and become the renowned pioneer of the clouds. A relaxing city-building experience where you build and optimize your serene sanctuary in the skies.

name: BodyCam: Tactical Freelancer
summary: Step into the boots of an elite tactical freelancer in this ultra-realistic first-person shooter that delivers the raw, unfiltered intensity of real police operations. Through authentic bodycam perspective, experience heart-pounding counter-terrorism missions where split-second decisions mean the difference between life and death.

name: Boba Tea Merge
summary: Bubble up, merge the colors, unlock the fun!

name: Bounce 2
summary: Bounce 2, the 1v1 Physics Based Digital Sport built with the warmth and comfort of 2D analog graphics, and the cold precision of modern computing and networking. Challenge your friends, together or online, in the Bounce Arena.

name: Box Building Planet Pack
summary: A mod that adds a dozen new planet types made for building.

name: Bowman
summary:
Bowman is a highly addictive classical game. Even if you've never heard of it before, play it just once and you'll be hooked.

The object of the game is to shoot arrows at your opponent and kill them before they kill you. It's a battle against your opponent to see who can accurately judge the angle and strength of the shot to make the arrow land on your opponents body.

A head shot inflicts the most damage while a shot in the chest takes second place. Everywhere else on the opponents body inflicts less damage.

To shoot your bow, simply drag your finger across the screen and you'll be presented with a trajectory plus angle and strength (power) information. Release your finger to release the bow.

name: Bodies Left Behind
summary: A girl. A store. A silence that never ends. The world outside is broken, but the paths within are worse. Every choice feels right. Until it’s too late.

name: Bold Ideas
summary: Bold Ideas!Bold Ideas!Bold Ideas!

name: Bound City
summary: An action-packed and bittersweet adventure in a city of endless night. Explore the dying city and try to find your way to the tower that seems to be at the heart of it all. Nothing is quite as it appears to be, and only by facing death can you hope to understand the mysteries of Bound City.

name: Bob's Crystals
summary: Tile-based chaos meets crystal-powered mystery in this action-puzzle platformer adventure. Restore the shield. Save the world.

name: Bouncing Missile
summary: “Bouncing Missile” is a 2D strategic shooting game.

name: Bounce Quest
summary: Bounce Quest is a brutally challenging platformer where you explore a treacherous mountain to uncover what lies at the top. But climb carefully, one wrong jump may send you bouncing all the way down.

name: Bomber Hero
summary: BomberHero is a thrilling multiplayer game inspired by Bomberman. Up to 4 players can join online battles or play against bots. Customize your hero, collect power-ups, and dominate diverse arenas. Are you ready for explosive fun? Join the action on Steam!

name: Boxguy Adventure 2
summary: A Rom Hack of the 8-bit version of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Master System that adds new levels and lets you play as Boxguy, features custom levels, graphical changes among other things.

name: Boxguy Adventure
summary: A mod of Kirby's Adventure that adds new levels and lets the player play as Boxguy the Box.

name: Boku no Natsuyasumi Portable: Mushimushi Hakase to Teppenyama no Himitsu!!
summary: An enhanced Playstation Portable port of the original Boku no Natsuyasumi. Essentially a "creator's cut" of the original, doubling the amount of insects able to be caught as well as adding three new characters to the story.

name: Borderlands 4: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Pre-Purchase Borderlands 4 and receive the Gilded Glory Pack featuring a Vault Hunter Skin, a Weapon Skin, and an ECHO-4 Drone Skin!
Take on new areas with unique missions and bosses, earn more rewards with Vault Cards, and collect all kinds of additional loot with the Borderlands 4 Deluxe Edition!

Borderlands 4 Deluxe Edition includes:
• Full base game
• Pre-Purchase Bonus: Gilded Glory Pack*

1 Vault Hunter Skin

1 Weapon Skin

1 ECHO-4 Drone Skin
• Firehawk's Fury Weapon Skin
• Bounty Pack Bundle**

4 unique areas, featuring new missions and unique bosses

4 Vault Cards with unique challenges and rewards

New gear and weapons

New Vault Hunter cosmetics

4 New vehicles with new cosmetics

Borderlands 4 brings intense action, badass Vault Hunters, and billions of wild and deadly weapons to an all-new planet ruled by a ruthless tyrant.

name: Bone Souls
summary: Bone Souls is an action RPG game set in a dark fantasy world. Enter a vast scene, challenge difficult and dangerous situations, and enjoy the sense of accomplishment when overcoming difficulties. The characters you meet on the journey and the stories that happen to the players are not to be missed.

name: Bomb It 6
summary: The mayhem and deafening explosions are back with the sixth game of the wildly popular game series, Bomb It 6! The battleground has become subject to a rain of bombs, and you should turn this weird situation into an advantage by manipulating the explosives to reach your ultimate goal! Step onto the field but watch your head! You can never know where a bomb will land on the battlefield! Do you have the strategic thinking skills and impeccable timing to defeat your opponents before they succeed at reducing you to ashes? If you want to find out, press that start button and let your journey begin!

name: Book of Fei
summary: Lead adorable warriors to form an adventure team to work and adventure on the computer desktop. Defeat the warriors to save the world. Rich nurturing and collection elements, idle and slack off to earn money and fight monsters!

name: Book Head Monster
summary: Book Head Monster is a survival horror game. You find yourself in an empty metro station after falling asleep after long days of work. Find the key to the car and get to home safely from Head Book Monster!

name: Bookie
summary: The horse racing roguelike, with cards. Bookie is a fast paced deckbuilder game, in which you build your own stable of horses and try to figure out which one will win the race. Manipulate the odds by modifying the cards and buying game-changing charms that will help you get all the trophies!

name: Booklet's Big Story
summary: Booklet is the only empty storybook in all of the Grand Library! Journey alongside them as they wrestle with feelings of unbelonging while striving to find their own story in this 3D puzzle platformer.

name: Book of Decisions
summary: A game in the Chatbot Roleplay category.Among the ancient Egyptian ruins, a book is found, and in our game, we talk to this book. The book answers everything we write. The book's general power is that everything written in it becomes real in the world, but we discuss the consequences with the book.

name: Born to Burn: Ash and Flesh - A Tale from Surrealidade
summary: Born to Burn: Ash and Flesh is a surreal, experimental indie game that blends psychological horror, platforming, and exploration as players control an evolving creature through diverse gameplay styles and metaphysical challenges.

name: Bone March
summary: In the March between life and afterlife, the spirits are restless and their numbers are endless. Your watch has begun. Bring as many souls to rest, while you can.

name: Botanic Bits
summary: Work, study, or relax while little robots take care of your farm. Upgrade and customize both the plants and the robots to maximize your production!

name: Bot-Break!
summary: Paddle Pinball Vs a Giant Robot

name: Bofkin Island 2
summary: You've ended up stranded on Bofkin Island... again! There's only one way off the island. Master the art of photography and capture lots of colourful little Bofkins whilst solving the Mystery of Bofkin Island!

name: Bombordiro Crocodilo: Flight Simulator
summary: Let’s get this meme flight started!

name: Bot Slash Bot
summary: You click - You dash - You slash. Bot slash Bot is a fast-paced, top-down Hack n‘ Slash in which you control a rogue robot slashing & dashing through your former co-machines holding you captive! It's all about speed. Time is running out.

name: Bot.vinnik Chess Masters Academy
summary: Listen up, comrade! Tired of feeling like a terrible chess player? Ditch the flashy modern tools. My routine is simple: I teach you a sharp concept, you apply it in a puzzle, then I unveil the secret twist. Survive my training, and become a true Chess Master!

name: Box It! 2
summary: Follow an ancient Inca trail and help Marv the miner unlock the ruins in this sokoban puzzler.

name: Bone Fixer Shop
summary: A simple economic simulator of a repair shop for skeletal minions in the land of demonic creatures. You have to balance between fixing skeletons and gathering materials.

name: Bootloop
summary: Electrocute your enemies and loop around the circuit in this shocking roguelike game! How many viruses will you destroy before perishing?

name: Boned Again: Survivors
summary: This game throws you into a brutal arena where endless hordes rise and only raw skill keeps you alive.

name: Boring Movies: Boring Television
summary:
Why should only movies be boring? Now you can make television boring as well!

This DLC allows you the ability to make lobbies be able to select television shows to describe as boring as possible as well.

name: Boring Movies: Spooky Bunny
summary: Have you ever wanted to hangout with your friends in a creepy bunny costume? Well now you can with everyone's favorite Spooky Bunny. Warning, costume known to be related with falling debris.

name: Boring Movies: Groovy Chainsaw Man
summary: Maybe a more groovy avatar is more your style? Try out Groovy Chainsaw Man, he's got everything you want from a low budget hero!

name: Boring Movies: Friends of Stolen Jewelry
summary: Grab your friends and journey across the world to return some stolen jewelry! Don't forget your wizard, every journey needs an old wizard.

name: Boring Movies: Scientist
summary: Everyone knows a whacky mad scientist who works out of their garage, right? Like they have that weird unpopular car before it was cool?

name: Boring Movies: Public Domainers
summary: What do an Ape, a Mouse, an Archer, a Monster, and a Detective all have in common? They're all in the public domain! Enjoy these classic characters reimagined for Boring Movies!

name: Boring Movies: Metal Action Man
summary: He's metal. He's full of action. He's a man. He's from a time of much violence and needs to protect a boy from other metal action men!

name: Bordermind
summary: Tired of playing fancy games that have lost all their mystery? Looking for something different? Look no further. Bordermind is a retro horror-themed FPS with a PSX/PS1 aesthetic. It takes the player into an intermediary world between the material and the spiritual.

name: Bomcat
summary: Throw bombs and charge ahead! In this stage-clearing action game packed with respect for 80’s arcades, rescue the lady imprisoned in the factory!

name: Bomb Ace
summary: Your headquarters has received a report of enemy tanks rolling towards the border...a massive deployment, an entire armed cavalry ready to attack your city and destroy its buildings. Your only chance is to dispatch your bombers and destroy the tanks and the enemy factory. A game of high-stakes precision bombing runs against a powerful enemy.

name: Book Travelers II: A Royal Story - Collector's Edition
summary: An epic literary adventure awaits!

name: Bounce It
summary: Keep the ball bouncing non-stop, earn high scores, level up, and unlock new skins and cosmetics in this addictive arcade challenge.

name: Boostrush
summary: Fly through challenging floating platforms in BoostRush! Control your jetpack, dodge obstacles, and master your jumps in this fast-paced 3D platformer. Customize your hero and race against gravity across vibrant levels full of excitement and danger.

name: Booster
summary: Open free boosters every 3 hours and collect unique cards straight into your Steam Inventory. Trade, sell, or flex — the choice is yours.

name: BoysQuest Find the Difference
summary: They’re not perfect… and that’s exactly what you need!At first glance, the pictures look identical, but differences are hiding somewhere!Your task is to find them across 70 levels featuring charismatic, fun, and stylish guys.

name: Bouncing Buds
summary: A party minigame like no other. Battle friends and foes while bouncing around the world in fun minigames anyone can learn.

name: Bonemarrow
summary: Bonemarrow is a short action survival horror in which you play a mutant creature created in a lab, destined to be used as a test subject. When the facility you were created in falls into disarray, you finally have your opportunity to escape. You may just make it out alive.

name: BombLink
summary: BombLink is a fast-paced puzzle game where you connect bomb fuses to set off massive chain reactions. Falling flames ignite the linked bombs, rewarding bigger scores for longer chains. With multiple bomb types, three game modes (Endless, 30 Attack, 100 Attack), adjustable difficulty, and support for custom music, it blends explosive action with strategic fuse-linking fun.

name: Boondoggle
summary: Honor is a luxury. Survival is a job.

name: Boyfriend or Cake??
summary: alternatively: caring romantic partner or delicious confectionery dessert?

name: Book Travelers III: A Gothic Story - Collector's Edition
summary: Enter the pages of Dracula and survive a world of vampires, dark magic, and literary betrayal. The collector's edition includes goodies and a bonus gameplay chapter to throw a party that defies the darkness.

name: Bot Rush
summary: Control a small combat bot in this fast-paced arcade shooter. Survive waves of enemies charging in straight lines, upgrade your abilities, and push your limits in an endless fight for survival.

name: Boss Up
summary: Boss Up is a love letter to videogame bosses, from infuriating RPG final bosses, to kart racing rivals, and even dating sim ex-wives. Fight your way through 18 bullet hell bosses with your powerful dodge roll, and try not to break your keyboard in half in this tough as nails action platformer!

name: Bodycam Onrecord
summary: Bodycam Onrecord is a tactical bodycam shooter balancing intense realism and immersion with smooth, intuitive controls. Experience adrenaline-pumping combat as your bodycam captures every critical moment in perilous zones.

name: Boll's Journey
summary: Zoom through the landscape as Boll, a mysterious glowing sphere, uncovering a forgotten past and the truth behind the world they've landed in. Gather all sorts of collectibles, evading Shapes and Nature alike. Uncover the mysteries...

name: Bobobird
summary: Scout the sky with your camera. Crank to power your jetpack. Aim to set your flight path. Launch Bobo into the sky. Crank again while falling to defy gravity and rescue the floating faces.

name: Bodyguard: Cellwars
summary: Take control of the body’s defense system in this fast-paced action shooter. Step into the role of a powerful immune cell and use precise touch controls to target and eliminate waves of invading bacteria and viruses.

name: Boredom Survivors
summary: Survive. Upgrade. Dominate. Step into a relentless roguelike survival shooter where the odds are stacked against you and the clock is always ticking. Hordes of enemies swarm from every direction—your only hope is to adapt, improvise, and annihilate everything that moves.

name: BombMachine Gunzohg
summary: Simple, exhilarating mecha action! Destruction! Destroy!

name: BooBooBooster
summary: Fly with Farts! Take 'em down with Farts! A Cracking Action Shooter!

name: Bouncy Click
summary: Dribble the ball over obstacles and reach the end.

name: Bonaparte's Bluff
summary: Bonaparte's Bluff is a two-player abstract strategy game where players use deception to exert command over the board and attempt to capture their opponents' castles before their own are captured.

name: Bodycam Record Shooter
summary:
Experience raw combat through a bodycam view.
Four unique maps, a vast arsenal,
The most realistic firefights yet.

name: Bonehold
summary: Dungeon Crawler with elements of rogue-like and ARPG games. Kill hordes of enemies, duel mighty bosses, and acquire legendary loot!

name: Bound by Desire
summary: Bound by Desire is a provocative visual novel about a waitress, Mabel, whose life is forever changed when her husband introduces her to a secret fantasy involving his close friend.

name: Boxwrecker Arena
summary: Boxwrecker Arena is a dynamic platformer where the levels try to beat you as much as you try to beat them! Show your wits, skill and style and become the champion!

name: Boobs Hidden Ibiza
summary: 100 Boobs in all shapes and sizes are waiting for you to be found on the sun-kissed shores of Ibiza!

name: Boukyaku no Edicius
summary:
She wants to “end” happily ever after...

Saku Koshimizu, the protagonist of this story, is a victim of power harassment and has no courage to commit suicide.

On the day he skipped work, he met a girl who calls herself Nagisa, and they went out on a one-day date.

name: Boat Racer
summary: Three mini games. "Boat Racer" - high replay ability in that obstacles are spawned randomly each race. No 2 races the same."Knazi Knockout" 3rd person brawler - it's just fun to beat up Nazis, right? "Nazi's in the Mist" FPS that is the crown jewel of this trifecta of minigames

name: Boxes and Cutouts
summary: Bad news: Noisebox, but no noise＞﹏＜ . Good news: The noise box can be deformed (~*▽ *) ~, all the gameplay becomes a beautiful clip art on the deformed box, (ps: cut art can be from your collection!) (❁´ v '❁))

name: Boxel 3D
summary: Boxel 3D is a speedrunning game packed with challenging levels, custom skins, online multiplayer, and a creative level editor.

name: Bomb Magic Tower
summary: The game will be removed soon, please do not download

name: Boobs VR
summary: You can really touch, fondle and poke the breasts of beautiful ladies with huge breasts! This erotic experience can only be savored via VR!

name: Boomcestors
summary: Boomcestors is a top-down arena shooter game with rogue-lite elements, where players command a squad of up to six soldiers, battling various enemies in the medieval era using modern weaponry, artillery, and air support.

name: Borderlands 4: Ornate Order Pack
summary: Customize your Borderlands 4 Vault Hunters with the regal styles of the Ornate Order Pack!

name: Borderlands 4: Firehawk's Fury Weapon Skin
summary: Customize your Borderlands 4 weapons with the Firehawk's Fury Weapon Skin!

name: BodyCam 2025
summary: BodyCam 2025 throws you into the heart of intense conflict, where speed and precision matter more than ever. Explore realistic environments and react quickly to every critical situation, using your arsenal to overcome dangerous challenges. Each mission tests your reflexes and strategy, and fast decisions can make the difference between success and failure. Face every obstacle head-on. Adapt or be defeated.

name: Boobs 'em up
summary:
Embark on a provocative journey in Boobs 'em up, a unique beat 'em up where you play as a determined newcomer navigating the ruthless world of street hustling. Your mission: secure the best location to attract clients and climb the ranks. But be warned, you're not alone! Dozens of other, equally ambitious, characters will fight you for dominance.

Prepare for intense, unapologetic action as a fierce warrior, ready to take on all challengers. Succeed and unlock the club, where stunning characters celebrate their victories with seductive dances.

name: Boogie Fungi
summary: Build and maintain a colony of Mushrooms, keep them happy with constant parties and make sure to deploy some defenses to deal with foragers

name: Bobcos
summary: Bobcos is a 2D multiplayer sandbox game where you can build your own world, trade with others, fish, chat, and customize your avatar. Create personal worlds, run shops, and explore a persistent online world with seasonal events and regular updates.

name: Boom Buddy
summary: Hold on tight—Boom Buddy is about to drop you into the action!

name: Bombardiro Crocodilo: The Naked Clue
summary: A visual novel in the "noir story" genre, where the grit of Sin City meets the humor of The Naked Gun, the madness of Archer, and a dose of Italian brainrot!

name: Bobrkur
summary: "Bobr Kur" is a clicker game where players control beavers gathering resources to build a dam. Earn money to upgrade beavers and buy boosts to speed up progress. The goal is to finish the construction faster.

name: Bombunter
summary: Bombunter is a 2D platformer where you play as a fearless treasure hunter exploring mysterious underground dungeons.

name: BoltHead
summary: Take control of a scavenger robot, venture amidst the wreckage of an ancient man-made structure, and attempt to find and gather power cells! BoltHead is a speedy 3D platformer with an expressive moveset, where only mastery of your servomotors will ensure your success!

name: Bop It! The Video Game
summary: BOP IT! TWIST IT! PULL IT! The same great game you remember, now featuring pulse-pounding music, far-out backgrounds, and global leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to stay in the game?

name: Bounty Brawl: Most Wanted
summary: Welcome to Hunter Haven! Bounty Brawl is a top-down action roguelite shooter for 1-4 players. Here, the hunt is fierce, and betrayal is inevitable. Will you form a fragile alliance with other hunters under the galaxy's most notorious bounties, or go it alone? Who will emerge as the ultimate victor?

name: Boost Vector EX
summary: RUN FAST. Faster than any other. Take control of a Vector Master and sprint in uncompromising pure parkour racing. Hone your style with responsive, flowing controls and break limits in the Premier Vector World Cup. The race, your friends, and victory beckon your arrival... Did I mention it was fast?

name: Body Pay “OMG! The Girl With the Big Titties Is Too Hitting on Me!”
summary: Body Pay OMG! is a game with animations and voices in story, and puzzles of various difficulty levels.

name: Bob Don't Sleep!
summary: You are Bob, when you wake up, your memory is gone, and the room is pitch dark. Using your quirky yet surprisingly useful big head, embark on an adventure. Find four batteries to light up four lamps and uncover the hidden truth. Puzzles, traps, and mysteries await. Don't sleep now, Bob!

name: Bowlatro
summary: Bowlatro is a rogue-lite bowling game where every run offers new challenges. Unlock powerful relics, purchase different items, experiment with modifiers, and master unique balls that alter gameplay. Ascend through increasingly difficult mo

name: Bom-eul Buleuneun Seolnyeo: Yuna Seupin-opeu
summary: I received a love confession from a doctor I met in a peaceful countryside village I came down to find peace in.

name: Boundless
summary: A 2.5D sci-fi platformer where you play as Shirley on a solo rescue mission. Unlock new abilities like jet-assisted jumps and magnetic powers to solve puzzles, avoid traps, and overcome enemy challenges. No microtransactions.

name: Box Hustle
summary: Box Hustle is a 3D isometric Sokoban-inspired puzzle game where strategic movement is key. Push wooden crates onto target spots while navigating tight spaces and avoiding dead ends. Every move counts as you hustle to solve increasingly challenging levels.

name: Bookbound
summary: Bookbound is the power of imagination. Every level — a new world, new rules. From space to ancient ruins. From black hole to wild jungle.

name: BombMaze
summary: Blast through mazes in this modern take on classic bomb placing gameplay. Strategically place bombs, outsmart AI opponents, and collect power-ups in thrilling single-player action!

name: Bottle Collector Run
summary: "Bottle Collector Run" is a dynamic and addictive endless runner game where the player has to control a character continuously running forward. The goal of the game is to run as far as possible, collecting bottles along the way and avoiding various obstacles.

name: Bombardiro Crocodilo Mission
summary: In this fun and frenetic shooter, you'll play as Bombardiro Crocodilo, who's trying to save Ballerina Capuchina from Tralalero Tralala's shoed fins. Embark on an action-packed journey with tons of shooting, different weapons, and skins from the Brainrot universe!

name: Boom and Rum
summary: "Boom and Rum" is an exciting action-puzzle game with elements of arcade 3D, where players immerse themselves in the world of complex mazes. Your task is to find the exit, overcoming obstacles and using explosives to destroy walls and enemies standing in your way.

name: Borderlands 4: Vault Hunter Pack
summary: Explore all-new regions of Kairos with two new Vault Hunters with the Borderlands 4 Vault Hunter Pack. Experience all new story and side missions, and take on new challenges and fearsome foes!

name: Bouncemasters
summary: Bouncemasters is a physics-based arcade launcher in which you smack an unlucky penguin skyward, then chain bounces off seals, orcas, trampolines, and other hazards to keep it airborne for as many meters and laughs as possible. Inspired by the classic YetiSports flash games, it mixes slapstick ragdoll comedy with skill-based timing, angle control, and mid-air power-ups.

name: Bomb Kitten
summary: Get frisky with explosives and blast your way through tricky mazelike puzzle stages!

name: Boss Battle Arena
summary:
Boss Battle Arena is a 2D survivors-like roguelike where you step into the role of the boss instead of the hero. Heroes invade your arena in endless waves, and it’s your job to survive as long as possible.

Choose from 10 different bosses, each with their own stats and playstyle. Collect gold and items during each run to unlock weapons, stack passives, and combine gear into stronger forms. Every wave increases the challenge, pushing you to experiment with different builds and strategies.

Fast, chaotic, and designed for replayability, Boss Battle Arena offers a new twist on the survival action genre by letting you experience the fight from the other side.

name: Born for the Light: Wavelength Radiant Collapse
summary: Endless world. Endless sky. Endless light. Will the shadows be cast upon all Children dwelling on the Treetops? Regardless, I spread my prosthetic wings, taking a leap of faith.

name: Boomer Grandma
summary: This is a boomer shooter where you shoot, dodge, and defeat demons! Play as the "Boomer Grandma" and fire heavy guns to turn Hell into a sea of blood.

name: Bones
summary: Bones is a FPS Horror game .You're an agent being sent to an island to find an independent scientist team. They told you it's an abandoned island but that is not the case. There is something on the loose. - The game is made on Unreal Engine 5

name: Bonfire Simulator
summary: Light, manage, and enjoy realistic campfires as you experience changing weather and unexpected events in this relaxing simulation game

name: BoobyRogue: Tumor Takedown
summary: BoobyRogue: Tumor Takedown is a fast-paced 2D roguelike where you choose your hero and fight through waves of enemies in a symbolic battle against breast cancer. Collect weapons and items, create unique builds, and survive until the final Tumor.

name: Bounce Up!
summary: A physics-based platformer where you guide a bouncing robot through challenging levels using precise jumps. Master 480 stages across 8 worlds, each beatable in just 4 jumps. Features mini-golf physics, 3 difficulty modes, online leaderboards, and level editor.

name: Bottom-up Beatdown: Hostile Takeover
summary: Bottom-Up Beatdown: Hostile Takeover is an intense 2D character action game set in a world dominated by corporations led by monsters! The only way out is up! Become a star solo or share the spotlight with friends in co-op mode!

name: Boxhead: A Halloween Special
summary: The original Boxhead Flash game. Fight a horde of zombies in the suburbs to bring civilians to safety.

name: Bob Saves the Princess
summary: Bob Saves the Princess is a Roguelite about controlling the roguelite elements themselves. Control rooms, items, aid in battles and summon creatures to help Bob reach the end alive.

name: Bound in a Nutshell in Infinite Space
summary: Explore a claustrophobic space station floating above the Earth, fix critical systems in the vacuum of space as they begin to fail, and discover the truth about what happened to the mysterious sole survivor of a disaster from another station. A first-person space horror mystery story.

name: Bomberrage
summary: Bomberrage has no classic rules - it's a fast and exciting game where you fight strong opponents or friends in explosive multiplayer battles!

name: Bouncemasters 2: Pengu Throw
summary: Bouncemasters 2: Pengu Throw is a sequel to the 300-million-downloads fun arcade hit and a successor of the legendary Yetisports! Grab your bat, line up the perfect swing and bounce your way around Levels Map. Chase glory while branching biomes packed with hazards, boosters and memes!

name: Bob the Builder: Festival of Fun
Bow Hunter
summary: A prehistoric pixel art top-down survival-hunting roguelike with a first person shooting mechanic, where you attempt to survive in a chain of islands, to gather resources for yourself and your family, and hunt for rare trophies.

name: Boat Together
summary: Hop on kayaks and boats for a fun adventure with up to 8 friends! Work together to paddle through cool waters, overcome obstacles and bosses, and reach new islands. If the legend is true, a hidden treasure awaits on the final island. Can you make it without sinking?

name: Bob's Island
summary: Fight your way across the island in this open world survival crafting game! Explore, craft, and mine in order to defeat the cursed monstrosities that inhabit the land, uncovering ancient secrets as you face off against strange creatures and challenging bosses!

name: B.O.D.E.
summary: From the creators of Devil's Drizzle, B.O.D.E. is a pixel art metroidvania lite shooter with a satanic theme (and a healthy dose of blasphemy). Use your shotgun to move around and annihilate everything in your path. Destroy hell in search of revenge!

name: Bound to The Dark World
summary: A ROM hack of EarthBound that recreates Deltarune Chapter 1 in its entirety. Experience Deltarune as if it had been made in the 90's.

name: Boardfall
summary: Progressively harder waves of enemies fall from the sky. Capture them to earn gold, and then purchase your own reinforcements to drop onto the board. 10 brand new chess pieces to master. How many waves can you survive?

name: Boardfall zero
summary: Try Boardfall for free! Progressively harder waves of enemies fall from the sky. Capture them to earn gold, and then purchase your own reinforcements to drop onto the board.

name: Boardlike
summary: Classic tabletop games meet roguelite elements and card-based combat. Dice rolls, fate cards, deadly encounters, minigames, and countless unknowns await you in this strange adventure.

name: Bounce
summary: An exciting 2D arcade game where you control a ball to the rhythm of music. Break through a kaleidoscope of colorful obstacles using just one rule: click to jump up. Conquer new heights and prove your skills in this hypnotic challenge!

name: Bounty Fusion
summary: Suit up as a mecha bounty hunter in a gritty faraway galaxy! Fuse cards to unleash powerful combos, chase high-stakes bounties, and build the ultimate deck in this action-packed roguelike deckbuilder.

name: Boomliner
summary: Boomliner – Bomb your way to a safe landing! A fast-paced retro arcade game where each round drops you lower. Destroy buildings to clear your path, but beware—less altitude means tighter moves and higher stakes!

name: Bodycam Recorded
summary: Bodycam Recorded is a multiplayer, hyper-realistic FPS. You play the game through the lens of a bodycam, experiencing intense, action-packed maps and game modes like FFA, TDM, and co-op zombies. Play online with your friends or solo offline against AI opponents.

name: Bots N-Bloom
summary: Delve through a mysterious ruin alongside your adorable robot friend, and discover ancient secrets that could help rebuild your town in Bots N-Bloom, a unique solarcore turn-based dungeon crawler.

name: Bob the Brick Breaker
summary: A game inspired by old arcade games, where waves of bricks make the climb to the top increasingly difficult. Adding to the challenge are minions and bosses, who will put us to the test.

name: Bourbon Risky
summary: Bourbon Risky is a simple but deep boss rush action game with retro style graphics. Smash all enemies in your way with your eternal companion that blasting bullets and lasers!

name: Bottom Squad
summary: An idle defense game at the bottom of your screen. Build your squad, upgrade your base, and hold the line against relentless alien waves while you work or browse.

name: Bonegrinder
summary: Bonegrinder is an action-packed ARPG. Looting legendary equipment and finding the perfect item combination is key to surviving the ever-growing hordes of zombies, wild animals and other foes. It can be played either solo or in online-coop with up to 4 players.

name: Book Shop Simulator
summary:
Breathe in that fresh book smell. Book Shop Simulator puts you in charge of your very own cozy corner of literary heaven. Start with a single shelf, a few dusty paperbacks, and a dream big enough to fill the whole store. Buy stock, run the register, and charm customers into leaving with a bag full of stories.

Upgrade your shelves, expand your selection, and create the perfect reading nooks where customers can lose hours between the pages. Whether you’re selling hot-off-the-press bestsellers or quirky comics nobody saw coming, every sale brings you closer to bookstore glory.

Decorate like a true book lover: plants in every corner, walls that tell their own stories. Still, nothing beats the smell of fresh pages and sweet, sweet profit—except maybe catching a customer secretly sniffing the books.

name: Boxville Collection
summary: Two adventures. One whimsical world.

name: Bombastar
summary: Bombastar is an explosive grid-based puzzle game with a variety of game modes that you can enjoy. This game contains a variety of endless game modes and 50 handcrafted puzzles that you can play to your heart content. Build up combo and reach new height in this affordable Single-Z quality game!

name: Box Box Box!
summary: BoxBoxBox is a racing management game with a rich cast of quirky and unique characters, each one with its own skills and abilities. Manage your team, plan the development of the car, decide your pit stop strategy and root for your drivers while they overtake anyone during the race! Box Box Box!

name: Bonk the Boykisser
summary: Survive endless waves of Boykissers! Fend off the Boykissers, gain XP, and choose upgrades to survive as long as possible!

name: Bouncy Butt Castle
summary: Its all about Butts and Bouncy Castles. Launch in with your friends or foes. Collect star power-ups and squash your opponents with your rear! Make yourself stand out against the competition in style!

name: Bouncemasters: Aiming Assist
summary: Unlock a visual aiming aid - the Aiming Assist, a small comfort feature for players who want extra precision while launching Pengu!

name: Bonds Defiled
summary: A dark fantasy visual novel of transformation, temptation, and choice. Shape your fate through branching paths of corruption, desire, and power. Nearly all adult content is optional and choice-driven.

name: Boundless Evil: Awakening
summary: A first-person horror experience set in a desolate highlands village. Track your missing archaeologist sister, unravel her clues through exploration and puzzles, scavange for loot and face the dark force she accidentally unleashed.

name: Bone Fire Effigy
summary: The horror of relationships passed. Collect old discarded things from the woods and burn them. Avoid the Effigy's fiery embrace.

name: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk: Exclusive Edition
summary:
Bomb Rush Cyberfunk, an indie action-adventure platformer, features 1 second per second of highly advanced funkstyle. In a world where self-styled crews are equipped with personal boostpacks, new heights of graffiti are reached. Start your own cypher and dance, paint, trick, face off with the cops and stake your claim to the extrusions and cavities of a sprawling metropolis in an alternate future.

- iam8bit Exclusive Edition
- Includes a graffiti art booklet including art from the game
- Collectible O-Sleeve
- The first collaboration between iam8bit & Team Reptile
- Exclusive Edition cover including art from Tan Zhi Hui
- 6 Graffiti stickers
- Digital download code for DLC (North America Only)
- Region Free - Worldwide Compatibility

name: Bobo: In Animia
summary: "BOBO"​​ is a cozy life-simulation game set in a vibrant animal metropolis. Here, you can freely live in harmony with animals in ​​ANIMIA, the world's largest animal city! Engage in battles, run restaurant, build your dream home, and make friends with animals—experience a lively animal world.

name: Bonds
summary: Escape from a psychopath's death trap!

name: Bounceback
summary: Bounceback is a short but challenging climb to the top. You play as a bouncing ball with limited movement and any mistake could potentially be your downfall. Only by mastering the movement will you succeed.

name: Bob To The Top
summary: Bob to the Top is sound like Hop to the top. This is a Rage PhysicBase Platformer where you use mouse to control everything. Swing, Jump, and Stick your tongue to reach the top.

name: Boars in Rome
summary: Parkour-on-anything movement through painterly, post-apocalyptic environments and dystopian factories. Create your own stylish lines, achieve the best times, or just vibe to the dynamic post-rock soundtrack.

name: Bolt Action
summary: Step into the boots of a battlefield commander in Bolt Action, a turn-based WWII strategy inspired by Warlord Games tabletop classic.

name: Bonetox
summary: A fast-paced arena shooter where you grind demons into piles of bones and meat. Choose your favorite weapon and unleash uncompromising carnage. Survive as long as you can, break your limits, and drown the arena in blood.

name: Bonfire Stories: Faceless Gravedigger - Collector's Edition
Bogwater
summary: Fish and Survive. Your dream home is just on the horizon, and your only method of profit is...fish?! Fish your way to a better life in this "sit and survive" game, BOGWATER! Beware of the leech infestation though. This game was originally made for the Toxic Terror Gamejam.

name: Bounty Sisters
summary: A slapstick adventure featuring three bounty hunter sisters and a group of villains! Introducing a brand new vertical-scrolling shooter! "Bounty Sisters" is a brand new vertical-scrolling shooter where you control three sisters' unique mechs, using their main and sub-weapons, help from the sisters, and special techniques (bombs) to progress through the game. The comedic adventure of the three sisters and their villains is fully voiced.

name: Bountiful Hunters
summary: Fight by yourself or with friends to survive a gauntlet of enemies in set stages. Collect items to empower your character and take down enemies quicker. Play as multiple different characters with varying play styles. Fight strong bosses that reward you handsomely with more money than normal enemies.

name: Bouncy's Abyssal Excursion
summary: Explore a festive sunken structure in a tiny submursible and collect mysterious presents for your friends

name: Bounce95
summary: Incremental game where you bounce balls on stages you create

name: Bob's Beaker Blobs
summary: Bob’s Beaker Blobs is a physics-based Suika-like merge puzzle. Use reagents to manipulate the blobs in your beaker, but be careful of Bob. He's trying to sabotage your experiment with his own reagents.

name: Bouncy Basketball
summary: Bouncy Basketball is a one-button, 2D physics-based, pixel art basketball game. * Perform breathtaking, screen-shaking slam dunks

name: Book of Hours: Anthology Edition
summary:
The complete, definitive edition of BOOK OF HOURS! This bundle includes:

BOOK OF HOURS, a narrative crafting RPG
HOUSE OF LIGHT, a story-focused expansion
The BOOK OF HOURS soundtrack

name: Boar Farm
summary: Boar Farm is a 3D semi-horror game inspired by creepypastas and it's predecessor, skebalious.exe. It has multiple endings, which you access by obtaining clues and putting the pieces together.

name: Bouncing Agency
summary: Become the most influential agent of bouncing models ! Have you always dreamed of creating the most prestigious modelling agency in the world specialized in buxom women? Now's your chance!

name: Bonsai '98
summary: Craft tiny bonsai scenes for people on a cozy 90s internet forum. Grow trees, decorate scenes, unlock new items, and personalize your space as you unwind to lofi beats. No pressure, just chill positive retro vibes.

name: Boldly Forward
summary: Join a roguelike battle immediately, where you need to recruit human warriors, activate bonds, purchase divine equipment, and form a powerful combat team.
