Facing waves of growing undead, elf, and orc teams, lead your warriors to charge happily and enjoy the fun of electronic cricket fighting!

name: Bowlers
summary: Bowlers is THE bowling simulation. Create your character, live an adventure, and progress from amateur games to the most prestigious professional tournaments!

name: Bound By Havoc
summary: Bound By Havoc is a rogue-like twist to flappy bird style gameplay. Survive curses, get upgrades, and survive entities.

name: Boxed Out
summary: Boxed Out is a fast-paced VR puzzle-arcade game where colourful cubes close in from all sides. Create colour matches to trigger explosive chain reactions and survive as the pressure builds. Play endless Survival or relaxed Solitaire, customise difficulty across 36 variations, climb leaderboards, and challenge your friends.

name: Boba Buba
summary: BobaBuba Is the Boba Bubble-Pop Puzzle Adventure with story mode featuring cute beverages and an endless mode for huge replay value. With global leaderboards from launch!

name: Born from the Soil
summary: Conquer the apocalypse using gritty dirt bikes and explosive ordnances in Born from the Soil, a blend of classic turn-based tactics, modern gameplay polish, and 16-bit retro charm.

name: Box of Broken Nails
summary: First-person psychological horror about ignorance and attempts. Protect yourself as a lone carpenter, hastily look for materials in your house to board up a door that shouldn't exist. At any cost.

name: Bokyaku Zenya
summary: “Boukyaku Zenya” is a game released as the Japanese localized edition of the highly acclaimed “Morimens,” following meticulous refinements to its worldbuilding, presentation, and game systems.

name: Botinator
summary: Descend into the depths of the facility to uncover the cause behind the madness. Blow robotic creatures into pieces and fight through mind bending environmental challenges. Use various physics based mechanics to force your way through a lethal mixture of combat and puzzles.

name: Bomboban
summary: Bomboban is a classic Sokoban-style puzzle game with an explosive twist: instead of pushing crates, you push enemy robots into bombs to defeat them and clear each stag

name: Bottle of Sickness
summary:
You play as a protagonist trapped in the final moments of a tragedy. As the drugs wear off and reality starts to distort, you must confront what lies before you.

Is it just a pile of scrap metal, a biocomponent... or is it something else?

name: Bobble Shop Simulator
summary: Take control of your very own bobble head shop. Sell, buy, trade, and repair a large variety of bobble heads and related merchandise. Stock shelves, hire employees, and grow your business. Pay attention though, as these bobble heads sometimes have a mind of their own.

name: Boomerang Survivor 3
summary: The action of controlling the boomerang has been powered up! Defeat the evil "Dark Acero" and aim to escape from the spaceship "Magenta Jolokia". It's even more fun with two-player mode, new items, gimmicks, a challenge battle mode, and more! There is also a "Easy Mode" for beginners.

name: Bobble and the Tri-Crystal
summary: Swim, shoot, and save the ocean! Play as a detective fish in this fast-paced 2D retro shoot 'em up! Unlock multiple weapons, defeat enemy hordes, and capture bosses before it's too late!

name: Boykisser Collection
summary: A bundle on Steam featuring akhsotoen's Boykisser games.

name: Borewicz
summary:
Welcome to Borewicz! A simulator of the harsh Poland of the 1990s!

- Build a 1.5 OHV engine in a POLDOSZROT 1500
- Experience the potholes on Silesian roads
- Fish from the morning while sipping a cold beer
- Work, earn, and tune your car
- Adjust the carburetor, then smash everything
- Buy a car from the market and see what's hiding under the hood
- Go to the market
- Experience the theft of your car's radio
- Drain the fuel from every vehicle
- Make a mistake at a roundabout

Write your biography – will you be the king of the doughnuts, an everyday mechanic, or a Renaissance thief?
